Join up to three friends or play on your own with AI teammates against hordes of ravenous zombies in intense story episodes across new zombie-ravaged locations around the world: Rome, Vatican City and Russia’s Kamchatka peninsula.

All-new story episodes in Rome, Vatican City, and the Russian far east at Kamchatka. Play as both new and returning characters as you take the fight to the undead with a brutal new melee system, decimating zekes with unique moves, perks and dual-wield weapon options like the sickle and cleaver. Fend off new undead monstrosities, including swarms of flesh-hungry rats that will unleash total chaos on your team.

name: Worth Life
summary:
It's a world like a picture book. A slow-life fantasy action game.
The brilliance of the crystal has been lost, and things are happening in various places.
The protagonist cultivates vacant lots obtained during the trip to grow crops, build fishing ponds, build houses and rent them out to people in need, sometimes with swords and bows.

name: Wood Block Escape Puzzles 2
summary: Wood block escape puzzles a fun and simple way to relax and challenge your logical reasining and concentration.

name: Wood Killer
summary: Lost in a dark house, you try to escape from a bloodthirsty cannibal in an entirely unknown area, where many murders have already occurred. As a cop, try to figure out how to escape the clutches of the wood killer

name: Woute
summary: We play for small shaman in the world of dreams, which moves in a static world to move to the next level

name: World End Diner
summary: Run a diner on the last island in the world after the destruction of humankind! For the cute animals and robots that survived, cook delicious food, run a farm, explore the forest, and create the best diner!

name: Women's Quiz
summary: Women’s Quiz is a videogame with questions about the life and work of famous women. You could find more than 200 questions about 50 relevant women in history such as Marie Curie, Amelia Earhart or Virginia Woolf.

name: Word Escape
summary: Create words to remove letters and flee through a procedurally generated dungeon. Armed with a customisable loadout of powerups, puzzle-solving and quick-thinking are required to escape the incoming wave of lava.

name: Word of Mouth Stories
summary: A collection of scary stories that go around a small town. Word of Mouth Stories. Vol 1 is a third-person survival horror game inspired by the classics of the genre. Formidable enemies, atmospheric levels, and the style of old games and movies from the VHS era.

name: World Quiz
summary: World Quiz is a quiz game that will help you learn everything about geography in easy and enjoyable way. Challenge yourself in World Quiz and test your knowledge.

name: Wordland 3
summary: The continuation of the successful Wordland. This game is a mix of puzzles and crosswords. Answer the clues, arrange the pieces and discover the words.

name: Wonders of Aether
summary: Wonders of Aether is a free-to-play anime-inspired open-world MMORPG by Japanese developer MEKASMITH.

name: Women of Xal
summary: A political intrigue visual novel with romanceable elements. Player decisions weigh heavy as consequences can easily lead to hurt and trouble.

name: Word Lanes
summary: PLAY WORD LANES and have an experience like no other! This is the ultimate combination of challenging, yet relaxing word puzzles! Our trivia is nestled in picturesque landscapes and soothing sounds. With over 5,000 levels of fun and just 10 minutes a day, this game will sharpen your knowledge and help you unwind.

name: Word Factori
summary: Word Factori is a word-building game where your only resource is the letter "i". Build a chain of factories to bend, rotate, reflect, and merge "i" into more complex letters. Discover secret letter recipes, unlock hidden word art, and optimize your factory chains for high scores.

name: World War 2: Operation Husky
summary: WW2 Operation Husky is easy to learn. 24 scenarios, Paratroopers, Tanks, Infantries, Anti-Aircraft, Artillery Support, Air Support. Hills, Light and Dense forest. Single and Multi-players. PC or Mac. 4K and Touch Screen.

name: Worms: The Director's Cut
summary: Worms: The Director's Cut is a significantly improved version of the original Worms for the Amiga, with new features and weapons not found in the 1995 version of the game.

name: World of Airports
summary: World of Airports is a strategy game that focuses on managing airports. Become an air traffic controller as you develop one of the many international airports, accurately rendered in realistic 3D.

name: Word Farm Adventure
summary:
Save the farm animals on this FREE word scrabble puzzle game!

In our new challenging and super fun word game for adults and kids, you will word-swipe your way into becoming the beloved hero of the farm.

Word Farm Adventure is not just about solving cross word puzzles - it's also about enjoying a great story while fighting the evil forces that want to destroy the farm.

You also get to fix, build, paint and design your farm!

So let’s get going - the animals need you at your best!

name: Worms 2011: Armageddon
summary: Worms 2011: Armaggedon is the latest edition (for mobile devices) of the popular multiplayer military strategy and artillery video game series Worms. This installment, along with its predecessor Worms 2010, was developed by Electronic Arts, unlike other editions that have been developed by THQ Wireless.

name: Woodcutter
summary: Embark on a magical adventure through the land of Aaran and help Woodcutter retrieve his firstborn.

name: Word Crush Hidden
summary: Word Crush Hidden is a fun word search puzzle game where you need to connect each letter to the words searched for. Daily challenges, achievements and over 1399 levels bring you an enjoyable word search experience and if you are stuck the power ups help you to find the words.

name: Wolfenstein II: The Freedom Chronicles - Episode 3
summary: Gun down Nazi enemies as US Army Captain Gerald Wilkins! On the run since the Nazi war machine leveled Manhattan with an atom bomb, Wilkins returns home to reunite with an old comrade and dismantle the deadliest weapon ever made: the Sun Gun.

name: Wolfenstein II: The Freedom Chronicles - Episode 2
summary: Play as former OSS agent and assassin, Jessica Valiant, AKA Agent Silent Death! Hot on the trail of a sinister plot, Valiant finds herself in the offices of Paragon Pictures, Tinseltown film studio turned Nazi propaganda machine.

name: Wolfenstein II: The Freedom Chronicles - Episode 1
summary: Play as the unbreakable Joseph Stallion, a former professional quarterback forced to play soccer by the Nazis! Using your Ram Shackles ability, smash through hordes of Nazi soldiers from the ruins of Chicago to the vastness of space!

name: World of Fantasy: Zero
summary: World of Fantasy is a round action Stratigie game with crafting system and you can get in gear crystals puregive to make them even stronger it also has a day-night system

name: World of Warships: Anshan Pack
summary: The Soviet-designed destroyer Anshan sports powerful stealth-torpedoing capabilities and an improved AA defense to deal with those pesky bombers that get too close! Add her to your Port today together with 1,500 Doubloons and a skilled Commander!

name: World of Guns VR: Guns Full Access
summary: World of Guns VR: Guns Full Access unlocks all existing and future released gun models for World of Guns: VR Currently there are 190 +gun models in the game. Attention! Full Access does not unlock Bonus models!

name: World's Worst Handyman
summary: Suit up as the "World's Worst Handyman" in this comedy stealth game where every job is a chaotic adventure! Dodge disgruntled clients, bungle repairs, and save your beloved animal shelter from bankruptcy.

name: Wotheguel
summary: Do the tasks given in the tropical forest and get all the magic diamonds. Kill the resulting creatures and continue your mission. Protect yourself in the open world and remember that you are alone.

name: World of Soccer Reloaded
summary: Unlike other similar soccer games, the user controls a single player instead of an entire team! World of Soccer RELOADED combines individuality and team play!

name: Wolf Territory
summary: Wolf Territory is a survival adventure game. It's the story of Kyle and his friends who lost their way in the forest.

name: Wonder Cave
summary: The Wonder Cave. Inspired by tales of Aladdin, Ali Baba, and more, this magical adventure puts you on the trail of a certain magic lamp, taking you through a puzzling series of challenges in the process.

name: World of Warships: Huanghe Pack
summary: Huanghe is a Pan-Asian cruiser that preserves many traits of her British origins. Little wonder, as in the reality this ship began her combat life in the Royal Navy. Like most British cruisers, Huanghe carries a rich array of consumables.

name: World Process
summary: The world is roughly a futuristic game in which you play as a "human will" rather than God. The main description of the game is an uncertain fate, macro diversity of the future world.

name: Wonderful Girls
summary: A puzzle game where you need to assemble a complete image from several pieces.

name: Would You Like to Run an Idol Café?
summary: After failing to get into the university of his choice, Naoya puts his further education on hold to take a job at a quaint seaside café. There, he meets two cute waitresses, and he becomes more intimately involved in their lives than he anticipated.

name: World Puzzle
summary: World Puzzle - a classic puzzle with several levels of difficulty, more than a dozen different author's drawings in the style of pixel art, limited time and limit of lives, all for the perfect game in a relaxing manner.

name: Word Wise
summary: Word Wise is designed to be a simple game where you sit back, relax, and make words by selecting tiles. There are nearly half a million words you can make, and over 7 hours of music over 5 genres including Cinematic, Lo-Fi, and Vaporwave. Happy word making!

name: Wordle 2
summary: Wordle 2 is a challenging and addictive word game that will put your vocabulary and spelling skills to the test with exciting new levels and hidden bonus words.

name: Wonderland Online
summary: Wonderland Online is an MMO where players are tasked with surviving a shipwreck for an extended amount of time.

name: Woodland Empire
summary: Woodland Empire is an anti-citybuilder; a natural take on the typical city building game. Instead of building roads and power lines, you'll control the wind, rain and sunlight to help your forest grow. Employ the help of woodland creatures to manage, upgrade and grow your empire.

name: Wood Block Escape Puzzles 3
summary: Wood block escape puzzles a fun and simple way to relax and challenge your logical reasining and concentration.

name: Work and Girls
summary: This is the puzzle with a several levels of difficulty and beautiful artbook. All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years of age.

name: Wordle 4
summary: Wordle 4 is a new format puzzle game from the Wordle series. 29 new categories scattered across the English alphabet from A to Z.

name: Worms Armageddon
summary: A Game Boy Color port of the Standalone Expansion to Worms 2 of the same name.

name: World Pirate Wars
summary: World Pirate Wars is an open world pirate survival game. Defeat enemy hordes in horde mode or fight against npcs and players on the open world (open world coming soon).

name: World End Coed
summary: 在河北省，核大战后孤独的世界末日，机器人守卫在尘封的考场。 长久的等待之后，全国最后一名考生探出了路口。 再过一年的六月六，高考结束之后，在这个一片荒芜的世界，两人又该何去何从……

name: WormJuice Skateboarding Olympics
summary: WormJuice Skateboarding Olympics is the island of arcade skateboarding fun. Build & Compete in the Obstacle Arena, or fly to the finish in the speedrun track! However you get your wormcoin, you are guaranteed to have hours of fun. Full level editor with up & downloading. And hours of great music.

name: Wolfriders A Sniper Adventure
summary: Wolfriders is a sniper game with a comic book style storytelling. Read the comic book chapters and play the short sniper and assault levels to unveil the immersive story.

name: WoodHeart
summary: Explore a vast world in this 2D top-down Zelda-like adventure. Find treasures as you slash enemies, swing them around, and throw them at the bosses. Talk and laugh with people, animals, and even tree stumps. With no destined fate, will you slay the evil demon Firerom or just jump in puddles?

name: Woo Wop Da Bam
summary: Woo Wop Da Bam is a battle royale game where the player uses flying cars that emit barriers to crash other players.

name: Woody Chopper
summary: In Woody Chopper you help Woody chop down the endless tree on his way to becoming a lumberjack millionaire. Whether in spring, summer, autumn or winter, it's the perfect casual game for in-between. Now with Achievements! Play Woody Chopper today and help Woody get the legendary axe.

name: Worlds of Magic: Titans
summary: Let loose the Titans, the most powerful creatures in the Worlds of Magic and try to defeat them or coerce to join your empire!

name: Word Game
summary: Word game is literally a game of words. Player controls "I" to find clues between lines, delete words to change the meaning of sentences, or shift words to rewrite facts. “I” must be wise and brave enough complete the mission of words. May the best "I” win!

name: Wolfie's Break Out
summary: A retro-inspired brick breaker game that takes players on a nostalgic trip down memory lane. With its classic arcade-style graphics and upbeat chiptune soundtrack, the game is designed to transport players back to the golden age of video gaming.

name: World of Art: Learn with Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: Play and Learn. World of Art - learn with Jigsaw Puzzles is great for adult`s brain training, fantastic learning experience for kids and seniors can keep their minds sharp!

name: Women's Prison
summary: Women's Prison is a first-person adventure. In this game you are put in a women's prison and you have to spend more than one year of your life here. You will need to solve puzzles and complete various tasks to undress your cellmate. Take off all her clothes!

name: Wolfenstein 3D TC
summary: Wolfenstein 3D Total Conversion for Doom is a total conversion of Wolfenstein 3D to the Doom engine. The main objective of the project was to recreate Wolfenstein 3D in a more modern 2.5D engine, while still preserving the original gameplay, weapons, enemies, etc.

name: Worms Reloaded: Puzzle Pack
summary: The Worms Reloaded "Puzzle Pack" features 20 mind-boggling single-player puzzle missions, designed to test even the most cunning Worms players. The "Puzzle Pack" also includes 3 new hats, 3 new speech banks, 3 new gravestones, a new "puzzle" landscape theme and 12 new Achievements.

name: World of bombs
summary: World of bombs is a game for 2 to 4 players. The goal of the game is to remain the only survivor. Place a bomb to destroy the environment. Сollect upgrades and win friends. There are 3 arenas in the game. For 2, 3 and 4 players.

name: World of Fundo
summary: World of FUNDO is a game of learning, adventure and fun where players travel around the globe as a famous scientist or personality visiting landmarks and historic sites such as the White House, Roman Colosseum or Taj Mahal in search of five magical letters, F U N D O.

name: Worn Thin
summary: Worn Thin is totally, definitely, absolutely not a rage game. You play as a medical pill, on a 3-D platforming quest to heal someone. Travel through a 100% totally accurate representation of the human body, in hopes to reach you're goal!

name: World Legends
summary: World Legends Best game and high Graphic and great Gameplay

name: Worms Reloaded: Forts Pack
summary: The Worms Reloaded "Forts Pack" features 20 addictive and challenging single-player levels, based upon a variety of fort-based mission objectives. The "Forts Pack" also includes 10 brand new forts for multi-player battles, 3 new hats, 3 new speech banks, 3 new gravestones, a new "Fort" landscape theme and...

name: Worms Reloaded: Retro Pack
summary: The Worms Reloaded "Retro Pack" features 15 single-player missions that have been hand-picked from the classic Worms: Armageddon game and re-worked exclusively for this downloadable content pack. The "Retro Pack" also includes 3 new hats, 3 new gravestones, a new landscape theme and 10 new Achievements.

name: Worms Reloaded: Time Attack Pack
summary: The Worms Reloaded "Time Attack" pack features 20 new heart-pounding single-player race missions designed to test players’ Rope and Jet Pack skills to the limit! The "Time Attack" pack also includes 3 new hats, 3 new speech banks, 3 new gravestones, a new "Time Attack" landscape theme and 12 new...

name: Wolf Adventures
summary: Interactive novel in pixel style about the king HappyWolf. You will find a lot of references, jokes, memes, and characters associated with Happy Wolf. Being in the role of the king, you have to investigate a conspiracy against yourself, the result of this investigation will depend on your choices

name: WordTactics
summary: WordTactics is a single-player strategic word puzzle game. You place letter tiles in a grid, then select adjacent letters to form words and score points. WordTactics is more strategic than most word puzzle games because it requires players to think critically to obtain the highest scores.

name: Worms Rumble: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: The Digital Deluxe Edition includes: • Worms Rumble Base Game • Legends Pack: 6 Outfits, Retro Commando, Sheep, Donkey, Skunk, Cow and Pigeon (each with 3 colour variants!) 6 Weapon Skins - Retro, Wooly, Concrete, Poison, Bovine, Feathers and 6 Banners

name: World of Pets
summary: Build your pet collection using potions, eggs and by completing quests! Made by the Norris Nuts.

name: Wowowow Korone Box
summary: WOWOWOW KORONE BOX is a fangame based off of Cover Corporation’s hololive property. It features Inugami Korone, member of hololive GAMERS. The game is a top-down shooter with the objective of collecting as many Korone Boxes as possible without getting hit even once. Korone must contend with many enemies and boss battles, but is given a variety of weapons to help her survive. The game is inspired by Vlambeer’s Super Crate Box and Nuclear Throne.

name: World Cricket Championship 2
summary: Welcome to the Next Generation in Mobile Cricket Gaming! Every cricket lover can now have the most advanced 3D mobile cricket game in the palm of their hands! You can play the maximum number of cricket shots including the famous Dil-scoop, the Helicopter shot and the Uper-Cut! This is a game built for you the cricket fan! You have loads to look forward to! You can customize your players and cheer your team with customized banners! You can also look forward to scintillating animations, more cricketing venues, new controls, and new camera angles! ‘World Cricket Championship 2’ has features that make it the most dynamic and versatile game in the world of mobile cricket. Be prepared for insane fun!!

name: World Cricket Championship 3
summary: WCC3 is a next-gen sequel to the World’s No. 1 mobile cricket game - World Cricket Championship 2 (WCC2), the most downloaded & awarded game. WCC3 takes the excitement of realism in mobile cricket a notch higher with cutting-edge gameplay features, brand new controls, multiplayer, professional commentary, exciting animations, real-time motion capture of professional cricketers, & advanced AI. The most realistic cricket game on a phone! WCC3 is a game by cricket lovers for cricket lovers!

name: Wolf Attack
summary: Wolf Attack is a VR FPS Game that offers you different modes, solo and multiplayer. Play one of the Three Little Pigs and face the wolves that threaten the village in solo mode or destroy the other animals in multiplayer mode in epic PvP encounters!

name: World Champions: Decathlon
summary: World Champs is a series of retro style sports games for whole Family. Includes all favorite disciplines: 100 m, Long jump, Shot put, High jump, 400 m, 110 m hurdles, Discus throw, Pole vault, Javelin throw and 1500 m. Compete with time in Single Player or in PvP Mode both - Online and Local!

name: Wonder Defense: Chapter Earth
summary: Wonder Defense: Chapter Earth is a strategy game based on Earth and Aliens in which you act as a General to accomplish survive and move to Mars.

name: World of MiniMonsters
summary: World of MiniMonsters is a game of collecting and leveling creatures where you will reach the glory fighting in fast-paced battles.

name: World of Paranoia
summary: WORLD OF PARANOIA is a management game where the player controls a supercomputer that is in charge of governing an utopia.

name: World Soccer Winning Eleven 5: Final Evolution
summary: World Soccer Winning Eleven 5: Final Evolution is a soccer video game published by Konami released on December 13th, 2001, for the Sony PlayStation 2.

name: Wonky Ship: Black Hole Down
summary: Rock the Cat Ship with some purr-fect extras!

name: Worms Revolution: Funfair Pack
summary: Roll up, roll up. Enjoy all the fun of the fair with these 5 new puzzles and theme. Experience new puzzles, weapons, customization and more.Funfair Pack includes:New Puzzle Missions. 5 new single player puzzle missions set in the new Funfair theme.Funfair theme.

name: Worms Revolution: Mars Pack
summary: Extend your single player experience as you take on more missions in this one giant leap for wormkind. Experience new missions, weapons, customization and more.Mars Pack includes:New Campaign Missions. 5 new single player campaign missions set in the new Mars theme.Mars Theme.

name: Worms Revolution: Medieval Tales
summary: Tony Bluster-Comb is Don Keystone’s spineless assistant and with his boss in hiding he needs your help to further document the life of Wormius-Fistycuffius. Now’s your chance to do so and become a legendry hero! Storm a series of puzzle-laden castles in these 10 all-new medieval single-player quest missions.

name: Worlds of the Future
summary: Worlds Of The Future is a sci-fi open world, action/adventure game. Explore a fully seamless solar system full of adventures, mysteries and colorful characters. Build your space delivery company, climb the company rankings and become a legend among the worlds!

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Deluxe Edition
summary: World War Z: Aftermath is the ultimate co-op zombie shooter and the next evolution of the original hit World War Z that has now captivated over 15 million players. Fight off hordes of ravenous zombies in intense story episodes across new zombie-ravaged locations around the world.

name: World of Asgabas
summary: What happens when a Viking meets a Cowboy? He fights him, of course! The World is not big enough for both of them. World of Asgabas is a turn-based strategy game opposing multiple factions fighting to dominate the world!

name: Worlds Align: Deadly Dream - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you and your friends save all the worlds in time?

name: World War Academy: Commander 1
summary: The Alliance Army and the Group Army have almost officially broken up, and the war is imminent. I was ordered to come to the Central South Theater command, and that's where the story begins...

name: Worlds Series Battle Grand Master Endgame
summary: Unleash on other players in battle royale mode where its every man for themselves. Get to the guns and health first to outwit your opponents in this small world until you remain the victor by most kills. Loot. Kill. Survive.

name: World of Tanks: Blitz - Mega Pack
summary: Break into World of Tanks: Blitz with the tornadic Strv 74A2 and a pile of bonuses! Use its three-shell magazine-fed gun to show who owns the battlefield now!

name: World of Tanks: Blitz - Grand Pack
summary: Tier VIII FCM 50 t medium tank + 30 days of Premium Account + 1,000,000 credits + 100 of each XP type and Epic Credit boosters + Graphite Rare camouflage + CVC Helmet unique avatar

name: World of Tanks: Blitz - Free Pack
summary: Three days of increased profitability! Get 50% more XP and credits, enjoy the improved Garage, and acquire the Undeniable Advantage special camouflage.

name: World of Tanks: Blitz - Resource Pack
summary: 7 days of Premium Account + 500 gold + 500,000 credits + 50 of each XP type and Rare Credit boosters + CVC Helmet unique avatar. Speed up your research!

name: World of Tanks: Blitz - Space Pack
summary: Enjoy cosmic wealth at a down-to-earth price! There's the D.W. 2 Collector tank in an animated camouflage of celestial beauty. Get it all at a favorable price!

name: Wolfsbane
summary: Wolfsbane is predominantly an adventure game, which plays for the most part similarly to point-and-click examples of the genre, despite the unusual side-scrolling perspective. The player must explore the town, talk to its inhabitants, and gather information and items in order to solve the mystery. The game utilizes a branching dialogue system. It also has action elements, present in the sporadic combat and a health meter for Axel.

name: World Warfare & Economic
summary: Control Any Country and Lead Her to Greatness. Modify Laws, Control The Economy, Build Facilities, Produce and Trade Resources, Make Diplomatic Relations With Other Countries, Build Military Bases, Fight Wars, Conquer Regions and Lead Your Population.

name: Woods: David's Story
summary:
The first game in the Woods series is about David’s story, based on the book with the same title.
After The Awakening struck, a huge forest at the foot of a mountain in Colorado has now become an island and it’s here we will find David, alone, trying to survive. Equipped with an ax, a guitar, and a lantern, he is trying to get back to his family but a voice is strangely guiding to the mountain.

On a long, tough journey like this one, the effects of being alone would get to anybody, but David has someone to talk to. Making his way from camp to camp trying to stay alive in order to reach his family but he unknowingly gets closer and closer to the mountain.

As you play the game, you take the ax in your hands, place the log on the tree stump, and chop it into firewood. Feed the campfire and shelter the rest to save it from the elements but be careful to not overwork yourself. Fatigue can become just as dangerous as the cold.
Do you have what it takes to survive in the woodlands? Can you survive long enough to figure out how you ended up all alone in the Woods in the first place?

name: World Series Baseball
summary:
Sega Sports' World Series Baseball, or simply World Series Baseball, is a sports game developed by BlueSky Software and published by Sega for the Genesis/Mega Drive. It is the first game in the series and was originally released in 1994. A Sega CD version was planned, but later cancelled.

The game was a major advancement in Sega baseball games in that it included licensed MLB players and teams (the first baseball video game to have both such licenses [previous baseball video games only had one license]; they are based on the rosters for the 1994 MLB season), and relatively accurate gameplay.

San Diego Padres broadcaster Jerry Coleman provides the play-by-play for the game.

name: World of Pets
summary: Go in search of pets who have escaped from the shelter, help them find a new home and find friends. An interesting journey full of adventures and unexpected encounters awaits you.

name: Wonderful Everyday: Down the Rabbit-Hole
summary:
What will you do when the last sky comes? The story follows a group of Tokyo high school students through a mystery revolving around a prophecy about the end of the world and they try to find their own "Wonderful Everyday".

Wonderful Everyday: Down the Rabbit-Hole is a visual novel with multiple routes which develops a story based on a few concepts: "the sky and the world", "the beginning and the end", "literature and science", "savior and hero", "brother and sister".

name: World Of Stalkers
summary: World Of Stalkers is an exciting online first-person shooter, Stalker-style, in which you have to fight the strongest Stalkers of Cordona. An unforgettable multiplayer experience awaits you in the Exclusion Zone, where not only skill and accuracy, but also the ability to play as a team, decides.

name: World Order
summary: World order is revolutionary sci-fi real-time strategy, the main feature of which are modular units

name: Would You Like to Run an Idol Café? 2
summary: Hoping to save the café he works at from being closed, Naoya enlists the help of his cute maid co-workers, Ichigo, Kuu, Mayuki. The three girls form an idol unit, Sweet Shoreline, to popularize The Seaside Café - but becoming an idol isn't that easy!

name: Wordding
summary: Fill in the blanks in this quick based trivia game!

name: Wonhon: The Beginning
summary: A paranormal stealth-action and tactics game about a young Korean girl who was killed in a military conflict and returned from the dead with the ability to turn into a ghost and possess living creatures to exact her revenge.

name: Word Game: Episode 0
summary: Word game is literally a game of words. Player controls "I" to find clues between lines, delete words to change the meaning of sentences, or shift words to rewrite facts. “I” must be wise and brave enough complete the mission of words. May the best "I” win!

name: World War Touch
summary: WWTouch is a comprehensive 3-D map-based, strategy game that was built specifically with the amazing functionality of the iPad in mind. If you are into immersive strategy games like Axis & Allies, WWTouch is exactly what you have been waiting for.

name: Word Colors
summary: Word Colors is a new type of word game that allows you to form words, match colors, and multiply your scores. Play against your friends, chat, view statistics, and see how you rank against the people you play the most!

name: Word Ring
summary:
Create words quickly as you progress through levels of increasing difficulty.
Rings of letters and blocks will fall more and more rapidly.
Find as many words as possible in 2 minutes. For every word you find
you'll gain more time.

Test your skills against the world !
Each dictionnary has more then 80 000 words. It's up to you to chain a
maximum number of words or take your time to find complex ones.

name: Word Explorer!
summary:
It's a word game, it's a puzzle game, it's Word Explorer!
Find your way through hundreds of levels and thousands of hidden words with this hidden word search puzzle game.

name: WormsZone.io
summary:
A fun, dynamic game with cool graphics! Get growing your worm right now!

You love games with tons of real fun and dynamic action? Then welcome to the Worms Zone.io, an awesome arcade, where you can become the great champion of the arena! Collect yummies and different powerups, defeat enemies, and become the biggest worm of them all!

You think it's hard? Relax, the rules are simple - explore the arena, collect all the food you see, and grow your worms as big as you can imagine - there are no limits!

Stand out from the other players, choose a skin from the wardrobe, or create your own unique style. The further you go, the more skins you unlock.

Worms Zone is also a PVP action game! Watch out for other players and try not to bump into them, otherwise you'll have to start from scratch. However, if you manage to sneak and encircle them, you'll get more points and all the food they had. It is so yummy!

There are several tactics for becoming a champion: "fighter," "trickster" or "builder." Which one will you be?

Worms Zone also has unique graphics! We keep it minimalistic and simple and you'll love it!

name: World Cup
summary: A soccer-themed ball-and-paddle game by Atari released in conjuction with the 1974 FIFA World Cup held in West Germany. It was the first Atari arcade game to be produced in a cocktail format.

name: World of Mines!
summary:
World of Mines is a classic, throwback PC game with a World Map twist.
Inspired by the original game written for many computing platforms since the 1960s.

Team Cogoo has created World of Mines as a small and humble campaign to help promote 2025 Completion Challenge and to raise awareness in our community. Whether you have 10 minutes, one hour, or plenty of time, you can help build a world free of land mines and promote the rights of landmine victims too!

name: Wooden Labyrinth 3D
summary:
Wooden Labyrinth 3D is the premium "marble in a maze" experience on the iOS. The goal of the game is simple - guide the metal ball to the end by tilting your device. However, WL3D mixes it up with some challenging obstacles - holes and walls - you must maneuver around or even jump over. Now with unlockable marble types, you can take on the levels with a stylish golden marble, or even a gliding ice cube! The addition of Game Center achievements and leaderboards allows your to test your skill globally!
Wooden Labyrinth 3D is a polished package that combines high quality presentation with spot-on playability and abundant content. You get 190 custom crafted levels with challenge times on top of the near infinite auto-generated levels with customizable difficulty. If you still crave for more, you can make your own levels with the online level editor - or download some of the hundreds of levels created by the community. Suffice to say that with the high degree of customization - to cater to everyone from the beginner to the pro - and the sheer volume of levels and challenges, your addiction to the game may last for quite a while. Join the over five million people who have already experienced Wooden Labyrinth 3D.

name: Wonderful mini golf
summary: Minigolf - sport grown on special tracks to play. It consists in placing the ball in the holes at the end of each track, using a special stick (putter in classical golf). The player's goal is to place the ball in the hole with the least number of strokes.

name: Wordspionage
summary: Wordspionage is a multiplayer, turn-based word game with exciting spy moves that will drive your friends crazy.

name: World War Armies
summary:
World War Armies is the ultimate PvP real-time strategy game. Command advanced war machines and compete for free against other players worldwide. Revolutionary mechanics reduce downtime and focus on direct engagement with the enemy, you get to the fun parts of RTS faster.

Dive into a gripping cross-platform real-time strategy experience, navigating through a turbulent gaming landscape. Build up your unit deck, command advanced war machines, outsmart your foes, and forge your legacy in the gaming world.

name: World War Polygon
summary:
World War Polygon is a first-person shooter from WW2. When the world falls into the hell called war, it needs heroes who will stand against evil. World War Polygon allows you to be such a hero! The single player campaign is full of epic moments, story cutscenes and heroic deeds. Become a brave soldier that will go from D-Day in Normandy, through the Battle of Bulge in Ardennes and finally to Berlin. Experience also the Eastern Front in the skin of a Soviet soldier that will have to endure the Battle of Stalingrad and fight in Eastern Europe. Help ending the World War in 1945 during fall of Berlin as a part of allied military force.
Traditional single-player first person shooter missions are accompanied by special tasks, like shooting planes with AA guns, defending your position with mortar fire, destroying tanks or bunkers with a bazooka and sniping enemies at long distances.

name: Word 2
summary:
Word² is a challenging game where you must unscramble each word not just once, but twice!
Inspired by word squares which date well into ancient times, each square contains words in pairs that can be read both horizontally and vertically. Words are scrambled and your objective is to use hints, clues and logic to decipher each square.

name: World Class Fussball/Soccer
summary: In World Class Fussball/Soccer you can choose from over 100 different countries to play with. The premise of the game is you have made it to the "World Class Finals" and are facing against the defending World Champions.

name: World's Largest Pac-Man
summary: World's Largest Pac-Man is an arcade game. It is an enhanced version of the original Pac-Man. The cabinet also plays Galaga, and the machine can be set to play either of them or only one of them. However, Galaga does not seem to be enhanced in any way.

name: Working Tidal
summary:
Working Tidal is a Sega Dreamcast inspired, loot grabbing, time attack game built for Haunted PS1's Summer of Shivers game jam.

In it, you'll be given control of a submarine with a limited fuel supply and tasked with diving into various oceanic locations for lost, forgotten, and valuable artifacts as part of a gig for a salvage company.

You can return to locations you've previously unlocked, upgrade your submarine, and view detailed descriptions and models of the items you've found in-game from the main menu.

There are several locations to explore, as well as some narrative segments to see. Total runtime should come in at under an hour, unless you really enjoy your new job.

name: Worlds Within Worlds
summary: A retro 2D platformer with an emphasis on variety and accessibility. Play solo, or invite a friend to lend a helping hand with a time-freezing Butterfly.

name: Wolf's Wool
summary: An abstract visual novel about wondering what you are under the crumbling cover.

name: Wood for the Trees
summary: A short adventure game, made for Ludum Dare 35

name: Wormhole Warfare
summary: Your tank driver is stupid.

name: Worth Waiting
summary: You could have sworn someone else was here.

name: Wolfenstache: The New Censorship
summary: A satirical mini-game about game censorship. The game is a first person shooter where the player has to shoot hordes of Hitler mustaches. This is accompanied by Wagner's "Ride of the Valkyries"

name: Words Can Kill
summary: Words Can Kill is a fusion of roguelike deckbuilders and word games. Travel through the world trying to find the perfect combination of letters, weapons and armor. And remember, here your decisions matter, not your vocabulary!

name: Wordimagesoundplay
summary: wordimagesoundplay is a collection of experiences for the PS2 console. Human and strange. Animal and familiar. Happy and sad. Music made from people. Stories crossing each other. Japanese and English. Language and translation. Sound and shapes. Seeing stories and hearing tales. Films and pictures. Music and sound. There is gameplay on WISP, but there are no games. There is no story that holds the whole thing together, but there are stories. wordimagesoundplay isn't a music title but it's filled with music.

name: Wordfish
summary: Discover new words and learn how to spell them through six different minigames in Wordfish.

name: Wobble Pole
summary: Balance a pole on a cart! How much weight can you balance?

name: Wolf & Eggs!
summary: Catch all eggs! :)

name: Worst Dating Sim
summary:
In modern day Japan there lives two rival gangs: Spurious and Kosher.

The Kosher gang demands justice while Spurious demands freedom. While these two gangs are causing a ruckus, there is a lonesome boy caught up in all of it. It's you! A total loser who is deathly afraid of thugs. But perhaps you can overcome your fear? Maybe you can even ... fall in love?! Or get punched a lot accompanied by a voice grumbling "MRGRGR."

WORST DATING SIM is a shitpost dating sim involving thugs, hugs, and ughs. I hope you enjoy!

name: Wolfskin's Curse
summary: A forsaken nun must prove a monster's innocence. He is offered no voice, but she will lend hers.

name: Word Whip
summary: Word Whip is a challenging word puzzle game. Fill in the blank tiles to create words until you reach the goal, across 180 different puzzles. For an additional challenge, you can try finding the most valuable words for each puzzle, as each letter has a point value attached.

name: Wonderful My Race
summary: A simple racing game for the Satellaview, developed by students from the HAL University.

name: WordKiller: Revolution
summary:
Play the bloody arcade game and learn to type!
Combining useful with pleasant, WordKiller: Revolution is a good way to learn typing much faster.
Easy, Useful and Bloody!

name: Woodfarer
summary: Lost in the Right Direction

name: Wobolob Classic
summary: Quick and fun paddle game made with Pico 8!

name: World War Robot
summary: Defend the Trenches Against Hordes of Robots

name: Wolfgun
summary: Go on a rampage as a gun-wielding werewolf!

name: Wonky Wizard
summary: In this relaxed indie adventure game, you play a wizard that can shoot 'mouse-pointer' spells at little mushroom enemies, and whatever else lurks in the forrests... Explore the map, and enjoy the 3D, level based gameplay!

name: World Map Quiz
summary: A mobile game where players identify world countries, capitals, flags, and more. Players can submit their completion times for different geographic regions to weekly and all-time leaderboards.

name: World Soccer Jikkyou Winning Eleven 3: World Cup France '98
summary:
World Soccer Jikkyou Winning Eleven 3 World Cup France '98, is a soccer game published by Konami Sports. This game itself, looks like more an enhanced version of Konami's recent games Goal Storm and a world series revised of J-League WE3.

You're able to select your favourite team among the 32-qualified team in the World Cup 1998, and even some other 8 good teams. Play in the real World Cup, selfmade tournament, international league, or just in a friendship exhibition.

The game features audio comments in six lenguages : English ,French, German , Italian , Spanish and Japanese.

name: World Minigolf
summary: Mini Golf Around the World

name: Wounded Winter: A Lakota Story
summary: An action western game with a beautiful low poly graphic

name: World of Bitsy
summary: the tilesets of bitsy converge and devour each other

name: Wolfenstein 3D VR
summary:
On May 5, 1992, id Software released Wolfenstein 3D. Known as the grandfather of modern first-person shooters and groundbreaking in it's design, Wolfenstein 3D set a new, higher standard for action games.

In 1993, Alternate Worlds Technology, Inc. (AWT) first attempted to bring Wolfenstein to virtual reality. With the use of Polhemus tracker technology, they created an arcade-style head-mounted display version of Wolf3D aptly named "Wolfenstein VR."

Now, modern virtual reality tech allows us to step inside the castle once again in this tribute to one of the greatest games ever made.

Presented here is the "shareware release" of Wolfenstein 3D as you've never experienced it before. Brave ten levels of labyrinth-like halls, killer dogs, secret passages, and an army of Nazi forces as you try to make your daring escape in Wolfenstein 3D VR!

name: Words With Foes: Quest for the Lexinomicon
summary: Crawl through this dungeon, using your word skills to defeat the monsters!

name: Worldwide Arts Society
summary: Playable History of Arts

name: Worm Nom Nom
summary:
You are a worm. Worms love eating fruit, even though it makes them poop. But this is a good thing: poop becomes flowers and flowers bring much joy to the world.

Eat fruit, avoid poop, flowers increase the score multiplier, eating flowers makes the multiplier smaller.

name: Wonderful Duck
summary: A marvellous duck little adventures

name: Wormholes n' chill
summary: Ever want to chill n' drop some wormholes? This is the game for you!

name: Won't you come knocking
summary: a game about doing something terrible

name: Worst Chess: Esther Sauce
summary: chess-y videojoke gamegames

name: Woofice Chair!
summary: Welcome to Goodboi Park! Help the park defenders defend it from body-builders with their swivelling chairs!

name: Wolfpack Island
summary: Explore an island, meet others wolves in a multiplayer world, mine for resources, plant and harvest crops and take part in a wide-range of mini-games and activities! Dazzle friends with rare clothes and complete quests to find rare items!

name: Wonder Woman
summary:
This single-player open-world action game will introduce an original story set in the DC Universe and allow players to become Diana of Themyscira in the fight to unite her Amazon family and the humans from the modern world.

On Feburary 25th 2025, Warner Bros. announced it had canceled its planned Wonder Woman game along with shutting down three studios: Monolith Productions, Player First Games, and WB San Diego.

name: World Turtles
summary: A wholesome colony builder where you help Meeps save the life of the World Turtle they live on. Construct buildings, harvest resources, allocate and prioritise tasks, research and develop, and cooperate with other Meeps. And who knows? You may even meet others from different worlds.

name: World League Live! Football
summary: Join World League Live, the fastest-paced and craziest social multiplayer football game where you can challenge your friends and thousands of real opponents around the world. Strike and score incredible goals with super and power-ups! Show who’s the G.O.A.T.!

name: Wordle
summary: A daily puzzle game in which players must guess the five-letter word of the day within six attempts, with each failed guess giving them information as to whether the letters they have used appear in the correct word, and where.

name: Wolfstride: Golden God Edition
summary: The ultimate prize for aspiring Golden God champions: this bundle includes the Wolfstride base game, exclusive wallpapers showcasing the game's stunning art, the OST featuring over fifty unique tracks, and a script giving fans unique insights into the game.

name: Wonder Trek
summary: Wonder Trek is a puzzler action game only released in Japan for the PS1. You play as two zoologists: professor Fable and Nick. They are stranded on an island after a plane crash and you and have to find a giant phoenix egg.

name: Worst World
summary: Worst World is a Hardcore zombie multiplayer survival game. Survive in a post apocalyptic world, collect resources and set up camps. Make friends or join a micro society of survivors. The World does not give you a gift. No crosshair, menu, life bar. You can be happy to breathe and to have spent the night every day.

name: WordFall
summary: Make words using the letter tiles that drop down the grid. Used letters will disappear from the grid, and you're on a timer, so be quick! Play against other viewers, on stream, and battle for the highest score for the game and the season leaderboard.

name: WonderHero
summary: WonderHero is a Play To Earn Mobile RPG, featuring exciting tactical turn-based battles, where players can earn game tokens and NFTs.

name: World War 2: Strategy Simulator
summary: Tactics & Collocations 30+ Historical Campaigns: Normandy Landing, Operation Market Garden 2 Warfare Conflict Camps: Allies faction and ally Axis 30+ large battlefield maps are provide in this strategy games Omni-directional combat space: naval battle, air combat, land battle.

name: Word of the Law: Death Mask - Collector's Edition
summary: Investigate serial crimes and city government secrets! You're the only one who can get on the trail and break the chain of murders. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Work It Out! Job Challenge
summary: Become a firefighter, comic book artist, train conductor, and more! Everyone grab your Joy-Con! Up to four players can join in the fun! There are collectibles, motion controls, and loads more to enjoy!

name: Worland: Dungeons
summary: Worland is an adventure game, where you can build your own base, and clear dungeons.

name: Wordish
summary: Wordish takes word games to the next level! Find the proper words in this challenging and customizable puzzle game. Challenge your friends through codes or even with live multiplayer!

name: Wonderputt Forever
summary:
Available exclusively for Netflix members.

Windmills, schwindmills! In this mini-golf game, bizarre and beautifully constructed courses shift and evolve before your eyes.

Wonderputt Forever brings a pocketable nostalgia trip to places you've never been before. A mini-golf game where you must plan your shots carefully and sink the ball into each unique hole. With each completed level, the courses come to life, shifting and changing to prepare for the next. Play in Par Mode, then keep the fun going through hundreds of geometric-themed holes as you unlock rewards in the Geometry Trips mode.

name: Worlds Align: Beginning
summary: When the game worlds collapse, help can only come from one place. The real world!

name: Worlds Align: Deadly Dream
summary: Can you and your friends save all the worlds in time?

name: World of Towers
summary: World of Towers combines puzzles with tower defense. Design your base in order to collect all of the puzzle pieces and destroy your enemies. Create and share your own worlds on the Steam Workshop using the World of Towers World Builder

name: Wood Brothers Flying Colours
summary: Flying Colours is an arena-based multiplayer dogfighting game for VR. The game features a highly realistic aerodynamic and physics-based flight model and some of the most exhilarating, chaotic, and hilarious air battles you can experience with your headset.

name: Wonderbirds
summary: Meet new Lemmings that meets Xonix. Escort dozens of nestlings to save them from the global flood and furious predators. Use your magic wisely and carefully. Coop with your friends and family to have more fun.

name: Wonky Works!
summary: Unite the fellas and fight for freedom!

name: Wordle 5
summary: Wordle 5 is the culmination of the Wordle series with brand new puzzles 10 new categories, 500 puzzles

name: Worlds Builder
summary: WORLDS Builder is game about alchemy, controlling forces of nature, creating worlds, building, researching and trading! Create new lands, mountains and forests, build houses, farms and workshops, discover new technologies. Start with a small mining village and grow it into a rich city!

name: World Boss
summary: A new FPS from Fresh and LazarBeam. Take on 15 other players in fast-paced arena combat. Level up to unlock upgradeable weapons and perks. Customise your Gladiator with unique builds for every playstyle. Delete your enemies. Climb the leaderboard. Take on the world.

name: World Tree
summary: A non-violent puzzle adventure where world peace has been achieved on Earth and it is up to you to discover the secrets of humanity and initiate open contact with the friendly races of the cosmic spheres.

name: Workshop Simulator
summary: Workshop Simulator allows you to repair and refurbish items using a range of restoration mechanics such as disassembling, cleaning, sanding and painting. The accompanying story will immerse you in the nostalgia of tinkering with your grandfather.

name: Word of Kitchen
summary: This is a word search game. Theme: kitchen. You are presented with several letters and your task is to add words from these letters.

name: Wormatozoa
summary: A gross 2D point-and-click precision platformer about parasitic worms. Guide them through a human body in this tough-as-nails arcade slither-em-up!

name: World Empire 2027
summary: Lead your empire in turn based strategy war game. Select your country and start to play.

name: World of Barn
summary: World of Bärn is an RPG game where you fight from your village that is under attack you have to do quests to get ahead in the game

name: World Nations Game
summary: World Nations Game is an online MMO game in which you can have your own virtual life. You can join a nation, buy vehicles, items, properties, open a political party, fight in international battlefields, participate in races, take part in special agent fights between agents from other countries, attack other citizens space colonies on any country map, be a nation senator or president, be part of the world congress, vote on nation issues and you can do many other activities.

name: World Titans War
summary:
Tactical survival inspired by WWII.
The action is guaranteed from the first moment. You will start out as a civilian forced to seek resources to survive, you will be able to join an army and fight, with or without allies. In time of war there will be no mercy.

name: Wordsmyth
summary:
Wordsmyth is simple - one new puzzle, every day you play.

No timers, no levels and no distracting adverts - just you and todays 9 letters. Focus on them, absorb them and find as many words as you can. There's no pressure, so sit back and take your time.

The beautiful, dynamic scenery flows with every interaction, while the mellow soundscapes help draw you deeper into the experience.

With over 18 years worth of puzzles, Wordsmyth will provide you with a peaceful, meditative puzzling experience for years to come.

name: World Piece and Peace
summary: World Piece and Peace is a feature-length dark fantasy RPG. Each of the 3 battle systems require a different set of controls and tactics - it's up to you to grasp their characteristics and defeat the powerful enemies that stand in your way.

name: Wonder Boy Collection
summary: Four classic games from SEGA's influential platforming series

name: Word Chef
summary: Word Chef is the easy and fun word puzzle game. Link letters together to form different words. Earn rubies at each level that will unlock the most difficult words in the form of hints. You'll quickly become addicted to word search and it will be a real pleasure.

name: World War: Tank Battle
summary: Tank game to participate in the famous battle of World War II. Win the battle and strengthen your own tank! Destroy enemies with friendly tanks! "World War: Tank Battle" allows you to participate in the battle by choosing the famous tanks of World War II. Various tanks of the Allied Forces and Axis Forces can be selected and played, you can enjoy the fun of development and the joy of destruction by upgrading tanks to make them stronger.

name: Wordies
summary: Wordies is bringing a word game you've most likely played & enjoyed to Steam. But it's harder than before, with only 5 guesses you're given the not so easy task of guessing a common American word! Guess the daily word & build up highstreaks to compete against the world in our global leaderboards!

name: Would You Like to Run an Idol Café? 3
summary: After their first music video goes viral, the girls of Sweet Shoreline, plus Naoya, are invited to a competition in Tokyo, where they can prove their worth against numerous famous idol groups. Will Sweet Shoreline prevail, or will their first big concert end in disaster?

name: Words With Freds
summary: Guess the word in six tries or less!

name: Wobbl
summary: Wobbl is a charming platformer about editing the level while playing it, to your advantage. The level is your playground - use Edit Wands in a selection of colourful levels to help you carve a path.

name: World of Retailing
summary: It is your mission to open a new store in that town, but wait... are you gonna create a monopoly? Don't you dare! Okay, we understand, it is your fate. Go ahead.

name: Wolf Riot
summary: Survive the night. Play as Frank the Werewolf for a wave based cage fight for survival. Tear through a convenience store to fend off a mechanized infantry platoon of mercenaries.

name: Worldle
summary:
Guess the Worldle in 6 guesses.
Each guess must be a valid country, territory, ...
After each guess, you will have the distance, the direction and the proximity from your guess and the target country.

name: World Seed
summary: A simple game with big ambitions. Fight creatures, explore the world and progress your character in this ever changing world.

name: World of Robots
summary: World of Robots is the tactical online shooter with simple controls

name: Woodle Tree 2: Deluxe Plus
summary: The second and presumably final re-release of Woodle Tree 2 Deluxe. Contains new levels and features, and makes some changes to the existing levels.

name: Word Peaks
summary: A daily word guessing game where players have 6 guesses to find a 5-letter mystery word. Each guess narrows down the possible letters of the mystery word by whether they precede or follow the letters in your guess in the alphabet. Includes a daily and a free-play mode.

name: Wormhole
summary: Jump and dash across space as you race against time in this punishing, fast-paced platformer. Be careful where you land, as the path ahead is filled with portals that will send you back. Will you beat the clock and escape the loop?

name: Word Crystal
summary: A daily word guessing game with four linked words of five letters apiece.

name: World of Epicia
summary: Short rougelike where you have to fight beasts, make equipment, and stay good in the world of Epicia

name: World of Warships: Aurora Steam Edition
summary: Besides the equal-parts beautiful and historic Soviet Tier III Premium cruiser Aurora, this exclusive deal will set you up with a Port slot, a Commander, 40 equippable signal flags, and 5 Steam camouflages to boot. Don’t wait too long to decide—this bundle will expire on February 14, 2022.

name: Wormventures: Barrier 51
summary: A classic 3D cartoon point & click adventure game. Help Looky the worm to save planet Vermis!

name: Worm Run
summary: Worm Run is an exciting endless arcade game in which you move the worm right or left, trying to avoid obstacles standing in your way, break the blocks to achieve the goal, collects the worm body items to increase its length, collect coins to unlocks new worms and complete the levels. 20 different characters to unlock and infinite levels guarantees you long hours of fun!

name: Wordbreaker by Powgi
summary: Wordbreaker is a code-breaking game using letters. Each word’ll tell you which letters are used, and which are in the correct place. Your reward for solving each puzzle is a terrible joke!

name: Wonderland Days Sim Date
summary: Wonderland Days Sim Date is a free online dating simulation by Pacthesis, released March 30, 2010.

name: World Robot Boxing 2
summary: The sequel to Real Steel World Robot Boxing. In this new entry, you'll take part in battles across quests, with robots that now have 6 unique classes.

name: Wolf of the Mountain
summary: FIght the physical and supernatural elements as Wolf to save her friend, Hunter in this 2D precision/puzzle platformer.

name: World Soccer Kid
summary: A difficult but addictive soccer game!

name: World of Haiku
summary: Entering the World of Haiku is the first step to acquiring the critical, real-world skills needed to become a cybersecurity professional. In this first and only gamified cyberpunk experience, you gain real-world hacking skills as you advance through the game missions.

name: World of Busking
summary: World of Busking is an independently developed, MMO Social Game. Meet other players, interact with AI characters, play music, form bands, attend concerts and try to release your singles to become the #1 songwriter in Music City.

name: Worm Slayer
summary: Worm Slayer is a Fast-Paced Bullet Hell Roguelike where you must fight your way through the dungeon that is the Worm King's den to finally reach and then defeat the Worm King.

name: Words
summary: A slow-paced, story-driven, first-person game that offers an abstract and surrealistic exploration of a troubled mind in its journey towards acceptance.

name: World War ToonZ
summary: Navigate across the city while surviving wave after wave of spectacular zombie attacks in this dramatic, high-action zombie apocalypse. As you progress deeper into the apocalypse, join your fellow troops in multiplayer to discover who will reign supreme as the final survivor.

name: World War II: Battle combat
summary:
Play the cool WW2 weapons game to get real shooter game experience.
If you like war games with world war setting, then you must play this cool game. Incredible graphics, exciting gameplay, lots of historical weapons and armor will give you the opportunity to immerse yourself in the world of heroes.
You can choose between different online action games, such as Team Deathmatch, Deathmatch, Capture Position, Arms Race, Knife Only and even Bomb Mode.
Use different FPS strategies on different maps, be smart and don't forget the tactics aspect.

name: World of Warcraft: Dragonflight
summary:
The dragonflights of Azeroth have returned, called upon to defend their ancestral home, the Dragon Isles. Surging with elemental magic and the life energies of Azeroth, the Isles are awakening once more, and it's up to you to explore their primordial wonder and discover long-forgotten secrets.
Master the art of Dragonriding, with a new form of aerial movement, venture into the ancient prison of the Primal Incarnates before their malevolent power can be unleashed against the Dragon Aspects in the new raid.
Fight to reclaim Neltharus, stronghold of the black dragonflight, explore previously unknown chambers of Uldaman, defend the Life Pools of the red dragonflight, and more! In new dungeons!

name: World of Warcraft: Wrath of the Lich King Classic
summary: The Lich King's forces await you in the icy continent of Northrend. World of Warcraft: Wrath of the Lich King Classic is coming, and with it another chance to relive the legend and face one of Azeroth's greatest villains.

name: WooLoop
summary: Wrap, weave, and wind your wool! Build works of art strand by strand, one loop at a time, in this tranquil game of craftsmanship. Draw inspiration from the large exhibition of levels available and unwind with the soothing soundtrack.

name: Wormhole Adventurer
summary: Explore the wormhole network, defeat the hostiles, mine and craft to rebuild your space station. customize your ship to your playstyle

name: World of Music Interactive Simulator
summary: Find and collect over 50 fully-playable musical instruments scattered throughout the World of Music! In this musical platformer sandbox, use your ears to solve puzzles and clamber to places heretofore undiscovered.

name: Word to your Sensei
summary: Word! Are you ready for a new take on an old classic?

name: Word Weasel
summary:
Word Weasel is the fun, fast-paced word game for all ages that's easy to pick up, but impossible to put down!
Form words from letters anywhere on the game board to unlock the vault and collect the treasure! But uh-oh, It looks like you've got a mole in your midst! Watch out for Shades the Spy Mole as he tries to put a hole in your plans and steal the treasure for himself!

name: Wonder Pot
summary: Are you tired of existing poker games? Then try Wonder Pot Texas Holdem.

name: World Championship Boxing Manager 2
summary:
The boxing world is at your fingertips in this deeply detailed and outrageously entertaining sports management simulation. Enlist competitive fighters, recruit top-notch staff, and ride the hype train all the way to endorsement city! Watch your fighter rise to the top, or get KO’d trying.

An official sequel to 1991’s highly-applauded World Championship Boxing Manager, this iteration captures the essence of the original and expands upon it. Offering updated visuals, deeper gameplay, and new characters that extend the World Championship Boxing Manager franchise, WCBM2 provides fun for grizzled veterans and lightweight fans. Go toe to toe with fantasy characters, or take the main stage with historical boxing legends including Rocky Marciano, Sugar Ray Robinson, and more!

name: World of Mechs
summary: World of Mechs delivers an online VR experience where players can select from 32 different mechs and jump into colossal online VR battles. Take advantage of unique mech abilities including high-tech cloaking devices, piercing particle cannons, and earth-shattering melee attacks in this futuristic spectacle of giant steel gladiators.

name: World Heroes 2 Jet
summary: Game Boy port of World Heroes 2 Jet.

name: Wood Cuter
summary: The trees outside the village began to grow wildly, blocking the road and occupying the farmland.， Explore the deepest part of the forest, unlock the secrets of the wild growth of trees, and restore the forest to its former calm

name: Worddate
summary: Daily word guessing puzzles for the Playdate console. Inspired by the viral hit Wordle.

name: World Map: Crafted City Builder
summary: Enjoy an exciting puzzle! An addictive game where you will have to prove your ability to fit the pieces at the right time. Be careful! The monument may collapse.

name: World Fighting
summary: World Fighting is a 3D versus fighting game offering several diffrent fighting styles from around the world. Thai boxing meets kung fu meets karate meets wrestling in four different "fighting arenas" actually being regular boxing rings with varying colours. Ten different fighters with individual and unique characteristics can be selected for a versus match against a friend, the tournament or a survival match. There also exists a training mode to exercise techniques and moves before entering true fights.

name: Worker Riot
summary: A worker who has been left without a salary is a dangerous opponent. Armed with a hammer, he will not leave them alone. Help him defeat them all. Beat out of them everything they owe you for your work

name: Wonderful Waking World
summary: A simplistic, dynamic Touhou fangame bullet hell shmup with a pixel art esthetic. Shoot down your enemies and dodge your way through an incessant barrage of projectiles!

name: Wolves on the Westwind: The Vampire of Havena
summary: The Vampire of Havena is a analog solo adventure that you can play without a master or teammates. Take on the role of a stray who grew up and was born in Havena. Set the new challenges and use all your skills to survive!

name: World of Cube
summary: A first-person puzzle game. Explore the world of cube and solve the puzzles.

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty
summary:
Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty is a historical fantasy action role-playing video game developed by Team Ninja and published by Koei Tecmo.

Set during a fictionalised version of the fall of the Han Dynasty, the plot follows an unnamed protagonist who battles historical characters and Chinese mythological creatures corrupted by demonic qi.

name: World of Cubes
summary: This is a small childhood game.

name: Wordland: Let's Travel
summary: Must-visit places in the world! Test your knowledge about places and monuments around the world, arrange the pieces and discover the words.

name: Worlds of Billy 2
summary:
Worlds of Billy 2 is a simple 2D platformer, with strong inspiration from Lode Runner. A young boy, Billy, has a problem with his imagination. In his dreams he is in magic worlds, that he has to travel across and fight against imaginary enemies. For this Billy has to dig holes, wait for enemies, and when creature falls into the hole, Billy can bury it. When Billy defeats all enemies he can go to a teleport. The young hero can't jump, only climb on ladder.

Ten different worlds are waiting for the player, for example a pirate island and a spaceship.

name: World Championship Games: A Track & Field Event
World Championship Paintball
summary: World Championship Paintball offers unprecedented game depth and paintball realism for the PlayStation 2. Advance your team bunker by bunker to World Championship supremacy. You can play in 6 different styles on over 20 different fields, or use the Playfield builder to continually generate new fields so no game will ever be the same.

name: WordZap Deluxe
summary: An updated version of WordZap for Windows 98 SE. It was distributed as Shareware.

name: WordJong
summary: Enter a lush world and combine the tranquility of Mahjong with the challenge of a word puzzle, and what do you get ... WordJong! Grab tiles and remove them from the board Mahjong-style to spell the BIG words for bonus points. Can you clear all the tiles? Longer words mean big token bonuses! Challenge a friend or a clever cast of in-game Masters.

name: Wonder Pets!: Save the Puppy!
summary: A puzzle activity game in which players save a puppy and take special care of it. Mini-games include coloring activities, matching, and basic traveling games.

name: WonderRun
summary: A pixel art run action RPG where you can explore the world of fairy tales, a bit different than the ones we know.

name: Word Up
summary: Challenge your brain with Word Up, a collection of classic word games that will keep your gray matter busy for hours! Includes fast paced favorites like WordBlast, Pickletter, and updated versions of Hangman and Wordfinder. Experience the very best "pick-up-and-play" word games with "challenge mode" and over 100,000 words to take your word puzzle experience to a different level!

name: World War 2
summary: If you like war games in World War setting, you will definitely need to play this shooter game. Amazing graphics, exciting gameplay, lots of historic weapons and armor will give you an ability to plunge into the world of shooting games.

name: World End Girlfriend
summary:
You've lived in Bunker 612 your entire life. After a devastating war brought the world to its knees, you're all that's left of humanity... right?

Everything you thought you knew is destroyed after your bunker is attacked. Now it's up to you and your best friends to scout the surface and secure a new home for the remaining humans. The road will be dangerous, but the companions you meet along the way will spark new hope and, maybe even romance...

name: Wolverine: Adamantium Rage
summary: Released in 1994 for both the Super NES and the Sega Genesis, Wolverine: Adamantium Rage is a platform-action video game. Teeny Weeny Games developed the Genesis version, while the Super NES version was created by Bits Studios. Despite being developed independently, the two versions share a common opening storyline and gameplay, though they differ in certain key aspects. Notably, it is one of the pioneering video games to incorporate a recharging health system.

name: Worm Runner
summary: Endless runner game where are 6 different maps with obstacles

name: Woodlock Manor
summary: Woodlock Manor is a grid-based puzzle game where you must dodge and outsmart various traps to uncover the secrets hidden in the depths below.

name: WordMaster
summary: Create as many words long words as possible within a minute using 7 random letters.

name: Wormmy
summary: Venture out to the planet core to save your cute friends from hunger! Jump, eat and explore, in this platformer game with infinite horizontal levels!

name: Workaholic
summary: Workaholic is a frantic rouge-lite FPS where you go on a rampage through a hellish office space as your grasp on reality crumbles.

name: Worldsmith
summary:
Worldsmith is an exciting, immersive text game. Type in commands and explore the World, solve puzzles, talk to people and play the Game of Worlds. In Worldsmith, you control the story.

With over 150,000 words of text, Worldsmith is a full, novel length, Interactive Fable.

As you explore the world of the Septem Tower, you will create solar systems and Life, unearth ancient mysteries, and discover the secrets behind the Tower and its billion year mission.

Worldsmith is an Interactive Fable and is part novel, part adventure, part puzzle and part strategy game.

name: Worm Visitor
summary: A game released for the Mega Duck/Cougar Boy in 1993.

name: Woody Poco
summary: Woody Poco, an 8-bit action-RPG about a wooden boy (or girl, depending on the version) who wants to become human

name: Wonderland Adventures: Mysteries of Fire Island
summary: Mysteries of Fire Island is the exciting sequel to the award-winning Wonderland Adventures. Once again, the magical world of Wonderland is in danger. Travel to the mysterious Fire Island and unravel an ancient mystery in order to save the day.

name: World Serpent
summary: Take control of giant snake monster consuming everything in its way! Nowhere is safe from you on this planet! Not even in space.

name: Woe
summary: Dismantle horrific monsters in real-time gallery combat, descending through random dungeons in search of new weapons, tools, and bizarre artifacts to stave off death a little longer. Woe to all who enter...

name: WordBed
summary: WordBed is a word search game that pits you against WordBed for the highest score. Find as many words as you can then have your words eliminated from the board over and over until you can find no more words. Then watch WordBed play the same board. But you have an advantage you can use.

name: World War II Europe 1939-1945
summary: World War II – Europe (WWII-E) is an operational level wargame that covers combat between the Axis and Allies from 1 September 1939 to 5May 1945.

name: Worlds of Aria
summary: Lead your own adventuring party on an epic exploit inspired by tabletop role-playing games. Invite your friends to the group with the Friends Pass, or strike out on your own. Collaboration, betrayal, and the luck of the dice…what wild escapades will you and your companions embark on?

name: World War II: Underground
summary: In this first person stealth game you play the role of a partisan in a Nazi occupied Europe. Steal documents, blow up bridges, sabotage factories and more. Use your wit and a set of make-shift tools to accomplish your goals. Become the Underground Soldier of the Second World War.

name: World War Battleship: The Hunting in Deep Sea
WordHue
summary: A new word game experience! Inspired by classic word games, WordHue gives finding words a decidedly colorful twist. WordHue was written exclusively for iOS, contains Game Center support, and is universal for iOS and iPad. WordHue contains 2 different modes: Zen Mode, and Time Attack. For those looking for a more leisurely game, Zen Mode lets you find words at your own pace. For a more visceral experience, Time Attack mode will put your brain to the test. Each mode is available in Random mode, as well as a Daily, where everyone in the world is given the exact same puzzle.

name: Wood & Weather
summary: Wood & Weather is a silly god-game game about pizza- but we've just been told the developers have pivoted the game to be about climate change instead.

name: Wonder Boy
summary: Wonder Boy was ported to the Sega Mark III/Master System video game console by Sega. The game is also known as Super Wonder Boy for its Sega Mark III release in Japan.

name: Wonder Boy
summary: The home computer port of Wonder Boy.

name: Wonder Boy
summary: The first home version of Wonder Boy was released exclusively in Japan for the SG-1000 (Sega's first video game console) during the same year the arcade version was released. The game was released in a "My Card" format, which required the "Card Catcher" peripheral. Because of the severe hardware differences, the game was remade completely for the SG-1000 with an all new set of stages. Certain enemies, stages, and items were also omitted, such as the skateboard.

name: Wonder Boy in Monster World
summary: The Master System port of Wonder Boy in Monster World is somewhat different. It features re-drawn graphics, fewer and shorter stages, and a complex password system (approximately 40 digits in length) rather than battery-backed save data.

name: Wonder Boy in Monster Land
summary: The Sega Master System/Sega Mark III port of Wonder Boy in Monster Land.

name: Wonder Boy: The Dragon's Trap
summary: The Game Gear port of Wonder Boy: The Dragon's Trap, a direct sequel to Wonder Boy in Monster Land, you wander through the lands using multiple forms that each have different abilities. Each defeated boss unlocks a new form that has to be used to advance to a new area, while shops give you access to new equipment for money.

name: Wonder Boy: Monster Land
summary: A cell phone port of Wonder Boy: Monster Land released only in Japan.

name: Wonder Boy
summary: A cell phone port of Wonder Boy, released only in Japan.

name: World of Talesworth: Idle MMO Simulator
summary: Explore new lands, slay monsters, gather loot and level up in this idle MMO simulation experience. Packed with unique and meaningful upgrades, moments of discovery, and gaming nostalgia, World of Talesworth is an homage to all our favorite RPGs.

name: WorldWide FlightSimulator
summary: Take off and land on more than 10.000 real airports all over the world. Choose one of 7 different airplanes to start your journey with.

name: WordSearch Story: Chapter 1
summary: Reveal a hidden story in between the words as you solve each WordSearch. 30 puzzles included.

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing
summary:
Start as a local track racer and work your way up the ranks to become the next World of Outlaws champion. Upgrade your car, team, and facilities to stay competitive with the best of the best.

Race in both the premier World of Outlaws Sprint Car and Late Model Series, as well as 4 additional DIRTcar classes across more than 40 tracks.

Race at iconic real-world venues like Eldora, Volusia, Williams Grove, and more! World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing features 14 officially licensed tracks and many others inspired by real world venues!

name: Wolfstar Adventures in the Inu System
summary: A sci-fi action-adventure platformer. Travel the Inu System and talk to a colorful cast of NPCs across various worlds. Explore maze-like levels by running, double jumping, and dashing. Fight off various robotic enemies using special melee attacks, and eventually take down the boss of each dungeon.

name: Woodoku
summary: Woodoku is a tile-based puzzle game. It has a two dimensional board with squares divided evenly into nine by nine lines. The player uses pieces (of various combinations of connected squares) to fill in the board. When the board is filled in specific patterns pieces disappear and the player receives points. The game ends when the player cannot play another piece.

name: Wolf Game: The Wild Kingdom
summary: Team up with wolves from all over the world to fight with other wolf packs - to survive, explore, hunt, challenge, and revenge. As the Alpha of your packs, you will lead your wolves to defend your den and rise to the top of the food chain in the wild!

name: World Fighting Soccer 22
summary: Compete with your friends in an exciting new style of Soccer! Dazzle your fans and confuse your foes all with the press of a button! From the ground or high in the sky, strike and win the day!

name: Worldless
summary: Worldless is a stylised 2D Adventure Platformer with turn-based combat and a mind-bending, interpretative narrative. Players will walk the line between physical and astral planes within a shapeless world, embarking on a journey of self-growth and understanding.

name: World Grand Prix: Pole to Finish
World of Anterra
summary: Inspired by modern and classic games, World of Anterra is a highly interactive, nonlinear, open world RPG. The game features an endlessly explorable open world, deep progression systems, fast paced combat, and rich lore, all wrapped in a satisfying and accessible interface.

name: World Geography
summary: Become an expert in geography with World Geography - Quiz Game. World Geography is a quiz game that will help you to learn everything about countries - maps, flags, emblems, capitals, population, religion, languages, currencies, and much more. This game will help you learn all about geography in an easy and enjoyable way.

name: World of Trains
summary: Discover the magic of the railway in the game World of Trains on the iPhone and iPad. Build your own railway and control the trains.

name: World War 3: Card Battler
summary: Play as your favorite country, in a card battle for world domination.

name: World At War 85 Digital
summary: World At War 85 Digital is a dynamic platoon-level combat computer game based on the award-winning board games of the same series name. World At War 85 Digital series centered on armor, artillery, and infantry combat during 1985 World War 3.

name: Wonderland Quest
