summary: Wonderland Quest is a casual point & click adventure game. Travel across Wonderland teeming with colorful challenges, surprises and creatures, brought to life with beautiful artwork.

name: Wonder Land
summary: An crazy platformer where every thing you collect can have a an impact on the game.

name: Wormwood
summary: WORMWOOD is a narrative-driven strategy game where your goal is to govern an infected city. Become an Arbiter that has arrived to stop the spread of an unknown disease and delve deep into the mysteries of a small mining town. Give out orders and fight the pestilence while searching for its origin.

name: Worm Goes to Hell
summary: Worm Goes to Hell is a short, first-person adventure horror game. You’ve been dropped into Designation: Hell - a strange town in the middle of nowhere where some seriously weird stuff is going down. Buildings are merging, there are bodies everywhere, and you can sense something following you.

name: World of Buh
summary: Take control of the destiny of a Buh as he makes his way through an adventurous retro wave world populated by many other Buhs. Some may help you to find what's this all about... but most of them will try to get in the way and do what only the one and only choosen of the Buhs can do.

name: WorldsKeeper
summary: In Worlds Keeper, you have the opportunity to interact with different worlds in different universes and times. Your mission is to protect these different worlds from waves of increasingly formidable enemies and obtain the title of Worlds Keeper.

name: World II World
summary: A new RPG made for iOS and Android.

name: Work from Home
summary:
“Work from Home” is a co-op party game for 1 to 4 players.
Players act as workers who slack off behind their boss and pretend to work when their boss is around.
Appropriate allocation of "slacking" and "pretending to work" is the workplace survival rule in "Work from Home".
Use all the things you can reach in the workplace to slack off and have fun with colleagues.

name: Worms Forts 3D
summary: A turn-based artillery game for mobile phones.

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing - Gold Edition
summary: The Greatest Show on Dirt makes its video game return!

name: World Flight
summary:
Fly around the world without limits with your Meta Quest 2 headset.
Feel the freedom, travel anywhere in the planet and enjoy all its beauty and diversity.
Plan your flight on the map with a powerful search engine and fly a plane or a helicopter with totally different gameplays.

name: Wolverine: Adamantium Redux
summary: Wolverine: Adamantium Redux is a massive improvement patch to the 1994 Sega Genesis game Wolverine: Adamantium Rage.

name: World of Deadliest Catch
summary:
In Deadliest Catch, you will have the opportunity to take part in dangerous sea races for prey and catch as many crabs as you could not imagine! Your task is not an easy one - you will have to struggle with time, catch quotas, migration of crabs, and, most importantly, with the sea itself. This is your destiny in the waters of Alaska!

Your ship will be in the same conditions as any ship sailing out of Dutch Harbor every autumn in the hope that the deep sea will bestow its treasures on it. He will be afloat in any weather - like a breeze, a strong wind and even a storm - you don't care. The restless sea, the soaking wet deck, the ship swaying on the waves - you can handle everything!

name: World Zero
summary: World Zero is a simple easy to pick up turn based rpg with not too many gimmicks. Traverse the world and meet a diverse cast of characters who some may even join your party. Different party members can change up on the dialogue.

name: Wonder Mu: Mu to Unmei no Monster
Wok Planet
summary: The great confrontation between two civilizations!

name: World War Battle Simulator
summary: WWBS is a strategy game where you can assume first-person control over any unit fighting on the field of battle. Apply the right strategy to different maps and directly support your troops on the frontlines!

name: Word Attack
summary: A board game which challenges you to form words from sets of letters. Play at your own pace or against the clock, on your own or against other players.

name: World Mahjong: Original
summary: This board game is a mahjong game played by 4 people or computer.learn and play by this App about the Traditional Chinese Mahjong and Japan Riich Mahjong Game.

name: World of Motors 2
summary: world of motors 2. A game tailored to your requirements. Multiplayer, Car modification, Compete with anyone else, Racing and Drifting with friends, Real world and real cars, Multiple maps, and Real multi cars.

name: Woten DX: Traveller's Dream
summary: Woten DX: Traveller's Dream is a 2D puzzle-platformer imbued with the spirit of discovery! Dive headfirst into a rich and enchanting world full of charm, challenge and intrigue!

name: World War Z: Deluxe Edition
summary: World War Z is a third-person shooter inspired by the 2013 movie of the same name. The game focuses on four-player cooperative combat in story-driven missions against large numbers of zombies. Other human survivors can also be fought in Player vs Player vs Zombies competitive modes. The game launched with six different character classes with their own upgrades and weapons and persistent levelling. The included classes are Exterminator, Fixer, Gunslinger, Hellraiser, Medic and Slasher.

name: World Soccer: Winning Eleven 8 - Liveware Evolution
summary:
World Soccer: Winning Eleven 8: Liveware Evolution is an enhanced version of Winning Eleven 8 developed by Konami and released exclusively in Japan in 2005 for the PlayStation 2. This edition introduced online multiplayer functionality, making it one of the first entries in the series to support online play.

It features updated team rosters, slight gameplay refinements, and the core mechanics of Winning Eleven 8.

name: World Soccer Winning Eleven 9
summary:
PSP Port of Winning Eleven 9.

Pro Evolution Soccer 5 (known as World Soccer: Winning Eleven 9 in North America and Japan, sometimes mislabeled as World Soccer Winning Eleven 9 International) is a football video game developed and produced by Konami as part of the Pro Evolution Soccer series. With featuring Arsenal and Chelsea it is the first release of the series which offered fully licensed clubs from the Premier League, which is one of the 3 unlicensed leagues of the game. There are also 3 licensed leagues just like in the predecessor Pro Evolution Soccer 4. The game also includes 3 fully licensed leagues, which are the Spanish Liga Española, the Dutch Eredivisie and the Italian Serie A. As with previous versions, the game features an edit mode allowing the player to edit certain elements of the game. It was the last release to feature the German Bundesliga (in the game as German League) before it was replaced by a generic league because of losing the license for the following releases. Pro Evolution Soccer 5 marked the series' first appearance on the PSP. The game was also the first in the series to feature online play for the PlayStation 2. Within online play, statistics and league points are stored on the server for each game played. These points determine a team's (player's) position within the five online divisions.

name: World Soccer Winning Eleven 9: Liveware Evolution
summary: World Soccer: Winning Eleven 9: Liveware Evolution is an updated version of Winning Eleven 9, developed by Konami and released exclusively in Japan for the PlayStation 2 in 2006. This edition focuses on online multiplayer functionality, enhancing the competitive aspect of the game for Japanese players.

name: World Soccer: Winning Eleven 10 - Liveware Evolution
summary: An expanded version of World Soccer: Winning Eleven 10 with online capabilites.

name: World Soccer Winning Eleven 2010: Aoki Samurai no Chousen
summary: A Japan-exclusive version of Pro Evolution Soccer 2010 which focuses on making a career to go up rankings in the Japanese league.

name: World Soccer Winning Eleven 2014: Aoki Samurai no Chousen
summary: A Japan-exclusive port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2014. This version centers on career progression with the Japan national team, offering modes that guide players through international competition and national representation.

name: World Soccer: Winning Eleven 2014
summary: The Nintendo 3DS port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2014, released only in Japan.

name: World Soccer Winning Eleven Arcade Game Style
World Soccer Winning Eleven Arcade Game Style 2003
World Soccer Winning Eleven 2006 Arcade Championship
World Soccer Winning Eleven Arcade Championship 2008
World Soccer Winning Eleven Arcade Championship 2014
World Soccer Winning Eleven Arcade Championship 2012
Woods of Disturbance
summary: You woke up in the middle of the forest, next to you is a freshly dug grave, your hands are tied and you don't remember how you ended up here. You must survive and get out of this forest at any cost.

name: Words Plus
summary: Words Plus is a third-person narrative game. In the game, you will play the role of a daze AI boy, through a total of 9 scenes, including caves, galleries, theaters and so on, using the language of the concrete text model to interact with the scene, and experience the extremes of online language.

name: Wojak This Game
summary: Simple rules apply! Be a Wojak and stay away from any traps! It won't be that simple, though. Will you be able to get beyond the irksome challenges and terrains that keep appearing in your path?

name: WonderWorld
summary: WONDERWORLD is an adventure-RPG game inspired by UNDERTALE

name: World Soccer Cup 2022
summary: Play the world national teams soccer cup while it is played by your favourite national team. With its fast action and intense gameplay, this soccer game will provide you long hours of fun especially if you are a soccer fan.

name: World Eternal Online
summary: Player-driven Sandbox MMO featuring Massive Raid Boss Battles, Guilds, and Territorial PvP

name: World of Naples
summary: Play single player or local co-op. Challenge your friends to local PVP. Simple mechanics. 20 levels, 4 bosses, 6 PVP arenas.

name: World of Warships: Starter Pack - Ishizuchi
summary: Have you just started out on your way in World of Warships? Dip your toes in the water with a Premium battleship and a set of sweet bonuses.

name: World to Conquer
summary:
World to Conquer is a turn-based game of swords and sorcery. Command brave soldiers, fierce samurai, archers, and sneaky ninja in tactical battles. Smite foes with fiery blasts of magic and lightning. Breath life into trees and rocks.
World to Conquer, Shadow of the Kraul is a follow-up to the award winning 2002 udev games contest entry, lovingly redesigned from the ground up for tactical on-the-go gaming.

name: Words Puzzles 3 in 1
summary: Three word puzzle game variations in one game to enjoy!

name: World of Tanks: Blitz - Type 64 Comic Bundle
summary: World of Tanks Blitz - Type 64 Comic Bundle

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Zeke Hunter Weapons Pack
summary: Get up close and personal to make a stand against the undead. The Zeke Hunter Pack includes the unique Sledgehammer and Dual Cleavers melee weapons. Slice and dice the zombie horde with Dual Cleavers. Bring a two-handed dose of pain against the zeke with the Sledgehammer.

name: WorldShards
summary: WorldShards is a Sandbox-RPG with a levelless progress system. Explore the mysterious fantasy world of Murrlandia, solve its mysteries, and help its tiny inhabitants to rebuild their home!

name: Wordsmith
summary: Harness the power of your wits and vocabulary to conquer the rich fantasy world of Wordsmith! A word-game based roguelike with a plethora of enemies, biomes, events, items, and more to make every playthrough unique and compelling.

name: Worms Revolution: Customization Pack
summary: Stand out from the crowd in Worms Revolution with the Customisation Pack.Customisation Pack Includes Exclusive new theme - The Junkyard. 5 new lethal physics objects - Car Battery, Pliers, Toxic Canister, Hot Air Gun & Anti-Freeze. 7 new hats - Bandana, Gear Stick, Tyre, Afro, Flat Cap, Rapper Hat & Backwards Baseball Hat.

name: Worms Rumble: Bank Heist Double Pack
summary: Tool up with the Bank Heist Double Pack! Equipping you with outfits, emotes, banners and weapon skins to pull the ultimate bank job.

name: Worms Rumble: Captain & Shark Double Pack
summary: Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the arena… Land the Captain and Shark Double Pack today to receive new outfits, weapon skins, titles, banners and emotes to use on the battlefield in salty style!

name: Worms Rumble: Honor & Death Pack
summary: Rekindle your hunger for battle and glory with the Honor and Death Pack. As the forces of good and evil clash, where will you swear allegiance?

name: Worms: Ultimate Mayhem - Customization Pack
summary: The Worms Ultimate Mayhem “Customization Pack” features hilarious new additions to extend the already vast array of customization options available in the game, including a number of crazy new hats, glasses, gloves, 5 new speech-banks and 5 new gravestones.

name: World Class Champion Soccer
summary: The festival in which the whole world is united by soccer will begin! Win the game and get a variety of equipment, grow up and become a world class player!

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Steelbook Launch Edition
summary:
Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty is a historical fantasy action role-playing video game developed by Team Ninja and published by Koei Tecmo.

Set during a fictionalised version of the fall of the Han Dynasty, the plot follows an unnamed protagonist who battles historical characters and Chinese mythological creatures corrupted by demonic qi.

The Steelbook Launch Edition includes:
- Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty game
- Exclusive Steelbook collectable case
- Bonus DLC items “Crown of Zhurong” and “Crown of Gonggong”

name: World of Warships: Admiral Graf Spee Pack
summary: Take home the famed German 'pocket battleship' Graf Spee, a skilled Commander for her helm, and a sprinkling of Doubloons!

name: Worms: Ultimate Mayhem - Multiplayer Pack
summary: The Worms Ultimate Mayhem “Multi-player Pack” features 5 fantastic new multi-player maps for use across the numerous multi-player modes. The “Multi-player Pack” also includes 6 brand new achievements. 1 new Construction multi-player map - “Towering Infernal”1 new Medieval multi-player map - “A Hard Day’s Knight”1 new Wild West...

name: Worms: Ultimate Mayhem - Single Player Pack
summary: The Worms Ultimate Mayhem “Single-player Pack” features brand new additions to the existing single-player challenge modes, with 8 new single-player challenges, including Sniper, Jet Pack, Super Sheep and Shotgun challenges. The “Single-player Pack” also includes 1 new multi-player map and 6 new achievements.

name: Worlds of Magic: Sorcerer Lords Pack
summary: Unveil five new Sorcerer Lords to fight as or against them!

name: Worms Rumble: Legends Pack
summary: Celebrate 25 years of Worms icons with the Legends Pack! Customise your Worm with these awesome outfits, weapon skins and banners.

name: WordSpiral
summary: Find words on the WordSpiral to eliminate them from the game board.

name: World War Battle Heroes Field Armies Call of Prison Duty Simulator
summary: A game in which you can get acquainted with the hardships faced by soldiers in the world war.

name: Wolf Night Evening
summary:
You just came home from an extra-long day of work, and you're starving!
Of course, you are what you eat after all, especially on a full moon...

name: Wonderful Pink
summary: Play as Momoko, the superheroine known as Wonderful Pink, and fight to save Earth from an evil invasion in this exploration-based 18+ action game.

name: World Cup 98
summary: Game Boy port of World Cup 98.

name: Woodland Walker
summary: Explore a peaceful woodland area at night and see what secrets it stores.

name: Word Worm
summary: Help the Word Worm reach the finish line by making English words from the letters stacked in his way.

name: Wonderland Adventures: Planet of the Z-Bots
summary: Planet of the Z-Bots is the epic conclusion to the Wonderland Adventures trilogy, and the largest Wonderland Adventures game yet. Travel to distant planets, meet new characters, solve new puzzles, and save Wonderland from the menace of the Z-Bots.

name: Wolf Girl With You: Full Moon Edition
summary: Guess who's back? Back again. Liru is back! Tell a friend!! The DLC for that flirtalicious cohabitation simulation title "Wolf girl with you" is finally here! So what are you waiting for? Get ready to start a new life with Liru! Doggo!!

name: World in a Moment
summary:
*click* makes the stopwatch as you press its button. The last sound you hear before the world becomes silent and motionless. Wind no longer blows, rain no longer falls. The world has become free of humans, animals and everything else that attests to the flow of time. Without a material body you traverse trough this new realm frozen in time. Days, weeks or perhaps even years go by as you lose yourself on this new adventure before even a moment in you old world passes.

Welcome to World in a Moment, a photo collage exploration game.

name: World War Toons: Tank Arena VR
summary:
Rev up your engines, load the shells…and get ready to roll out your tanks in a cartoon-style, no-holds-barred 4v4 joyful mayhem between engines of pure mischief and destruction!

Choose from various historical tanks, each spiced up with perky specialties and wacky strengths. Fling Mr. Bomb from your slingshot and watch him make a mad dash towards enemy tanks! KABOOM!
Will you choose a speedy M5 Stuart and maneuver around the battlefield to whittle down your foes, or stomp your enemies one by one with the thundering shots of a King Tiger? Mix and match the strengths and weaknesses of your tank squad to crush your opponents! Seize the strategic moment to rain down fire with the unique special ammo of your tanks! Victory belongs to the quickest, the strongest and the devious – may the best tank win!

The desert, snowfields and towns of the battlefield tremble with the roar of your machines…It’s a good day to rumble with steel and fire!

name: World of Football
summary: World of Football offers an authentic team-based football physics experience. Dive into straightforward gameplay that's challenging to master, ensuring a competitive edge. Experience true control with intuitive mechanics, devoid of randomness or luck!

name: Wolverine and the X-Men
summary: Wolverine and the X-Men is a video game released for the educational handheld game console Leapster.

name: Woodland
summary: Explore an ancient island and learn it's history. Discover secrets along your way, but watch out for bad-tempered crabs.

name: World of Titans
summary: Explore a thrilling, open-world MMO full of adventure, pve, pvp, raids, dungeons and so much more! This new MMORPG brings a whole new play style to the mmo genre.

name: World of Mystery
summary: Jump into the World Of Mystery and become the best Supernatural Detective! Uncover all the mysteries of every monsters and spirits to unlock the secrets of this mysterious land.

name: Words in Word
summary:
Words in Word is a word collecting game familiar to many since childhood. Have intellectual fun and make words from over 1000 word puzzles.
In addition, in a special mode you will compete with computer opponents.

name: Worm Game
summary: Play the game that came to Stadia before Stadia came to the world. “Worm Game” is a humble title we used to test many of Stadia’s features, starting well before our 2019 public launch, right through 2022. It won’t win Game of the Year, but the Stadia team spent a LOT of time playing it, and we thought we’d share it with you. Thanks for playing, and for everything.

name: World Racing 2: Champion Edition
summary: World Racing 2 is back - revamped with a new look! The highly acclaimed racing spectacle makes the streets on your screen glow like never before! The new Champion Edition offers modding and Steam Workshop support. Are you ready to start the race of your life? The roads are waiting for you!

name: Wolf Boot Camp
summary:
Do you know the three little pigs and the wolf story? Do you know the story about the wolf after it? If you know or do not know, Come and try this game. If you are looking for a fun game, Come and try this game.
Wolf Boot Camp is a young wolf on the story of growth and exercise.

name: WordPlus: Unique Word Game
summary:
WordPlus is a word search build game to test your word power and analytical thinking power.
You have to plan your moves wisely to defeat your opponent.

name: Word Cafe 21
summary:
Are you looking for a unique and challenging word game? In Word Cafe 21 you are presented with words related to a topic. The letters are all scrambled and you have to move them into the right places to guess the words. Sounds easy, right? Wait until you give it a try.
Categories include: Box of Chocolates, Movies and Things, Famous Authors and Lyrical Lane.
Easy, Medium and Hard levels control the words presented per topic. Move the pieces by tapping on letter and then space or pushing them around. Get more points for getting the words on earlier tries!

name: Word Strike
summary:
What's the word we are looking for?
Each puzzle contains four words that are associated to the answer, can you figure it out?
For instance, what do Superhero, Joker, Robin and Alfred associate to? Or, can you figure out what Antarctica, Ice, Water and Titanic have in common?

name: Word Pop: Endless Brain Game
summary:
Challenge your vocabulary and speed with this awesome word game!
Find as many words as you can while you race against the clock. Every word you find earns you points and adds more time, while more letters are added to the grid. The longer the word, the more points you get!

name: Wolf Game: Wild Animal Wars
summary: Team up with wolves from all over the world to fight with other wild animals - to survive, explore, hunt, challenge, and revenge. As the Alpha of your wolf packs, you will lead your wolves to defend your den and rise to the top of the food chain in the wild!

name: Woozzle Reborn
summary: Woozzle is a puzzle game about finding the right path for crazy marbles. You have to be smart to understand the labyrinth of cross-roads and quickly set the right path for each color marble to its correct dock. This game brings a steady dose of fresh techniques and puzzles coming at you at all times. Tens of different obstacles and features allowed us to create amazing levels with many different mechanics and twists. Try Woozzle for free and buy full game later, no ads, no disruptions. Just pay once and play forever. We have plenty of new ideas and pile of new levels in the queue.

name: Word Tactics
summary:
A real competitive online word game is finally available!
Discover the Word Tactics application, adaptation of the famous word game.
Practice in solo mode to warm up and then challenge other players around the world by creating or joining duels. Try to beat your opponents and take the top of the leaderboard to become the Word Tactics champion!
The object of the game is to find a word made up of a fixed number of letters. Well-placed letters are marked green, existing but misplaced letters are marked yellow.
Play as many word grids as possible in single player mode.
In multiplayer mode, you win the duel if you manage to find more words than your opponent.
Download the free Word Tactics app available on iPhones and iPads.
Accessible to all, the application will delight lovers of words, the French and English language and respect for spelling rules!

name: Word Peril Free
summary:
Word Peril Free combines elements of multiple game genres and packs them into one addictive, fast-paced, and fun game.
Guess the puzzle (without going bankrupt) by using visual and textual cues from within the game. You begin with 00 virtual dollars. You are rewarded 0 for each correct guess. If you guess incorrectly, you'll put yourself in jeopardy by losing 0 for each missed letter. Successfully completing the mystery word or phrase nets you 0.
Use your Free Letter and Skip Puzzle tokens sparingly, as they are only refreshed upon reaching the next level.
Personal High Scores and Global High Scores (participation optional) are available so you can compete against yourself as well as the world!

name: Wordspie
summary:
Love word games?
Wordspie is a game to make you adept at words.
Wordspie is an addictive word search game. The game presents to you 8 letters in each level. Keep forming words using those letters till you complete a level. You complete a level by earning points needed to complete the level in the provided time. You earn points by forming words having 3 or more letters. Each letter carries a point and the points you earn with a word is the sum of those individual letter points.
Improve your word search skills

name: Word Life: Crossword puzzle
summary:
Thousands of levels, three different game modes, and regular special events to play! Download Word Life for free and start training your brain today.
Your daily brain training is now called Word Life! Discover stunning landscapes while you sit back, relax, and play word puzzles.
Unveil hidden words by combining letters and learn new ones with the app's dictionary. Puzzles start easy, but get challenging fast! Do you feel like refreshing your French? In Word Life, you can have different progress paths in several languages.
If you feel like going for an extra challenge, you can try out the Multiplayer mode, in which you'll be able to outsmart your opponent. Keep your brain fit and bask in the beauty of nature with Word Life.
Embark on this beautiful journey and level up your mental agility while you progress.

name: Wordium
summary:
Wordium is a free-to-play asynchronous, turn-based word game where players take turns building the highest-scoring words using adjacent letter tiles.
As players score a word, the used letter tiles disappear and new ones drop onto the board, resulting in a constantly moving, always surprising gameplay experience! Players compete for 10 rounds: high score wins!

name: Word of Prey
summary:
Battle against others to be the first to get the word right!
Word of Prey is a game featuring head to head match-ups where you race against your opponent for every word. Speed is the name of the game; once you get a word right it switches to the next word for you and your opponent. Compete for every word to come out on top!
As you win more games, you unlock lobbies that feature harder words with more letters- think you have what it takes figure out a scrambled eight letter word?
Download Word of Prey, and let the games begin!

name: Word-O-Mania
summary:
A fast-paced global multiplayer game where you need to fight your way up to the top of the leaderboard trying to guess as many words as you can in a limited period of time.
Enjoy hours of fun gameplay and improve your word-finding and vocabulary skill!

name: Word Vs Picture
summary:
Play and guess hundreds of words!
New puzzle - crossword with picture.
Play and guess hundreds of words!
New puzzle - crossword with picture.
The game - for real geniuses, check your vocabulary.
If you like crosswords, puzzles, the gallows, the word with words, riddles and other games of this genre - then the "Word / picture" is what you need!
At each level, make come true 4 words, each shown in the picture. As in any crossword they intersect, guess one word - opens a one letter the next, and so on!

name: Word Invaders!
summary:
Make words before the invaders destroy your tiles. Think quick to unlock special tiles and bonuses, challenge nasty bosses and test your vocabulary in this challenging and addictive arcade word game.
If you’re a fan of Words with Friends or Scrabble you’re going to love word invaders. The scoring is surprisingly familiar but the game play is from another planet. It’s a frenzied word-lovers delight with 30 levels of dictionary busting fun.

name: WooLoop: Fantasy Pack
summary: This Fantasy-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Mystical Beasts, Magical scenes and Medieval Castles! Get your imagination flowing with this dive into the Fantastical!

name: Word Trails
summary:
Discover a world of sumptuous semantics, luxurious literacy and phonological freshness in Word Trails, a word-building game for the grammatically gifted and non-gifted alike.
By creating a trail of words you’ll traverse a world of mysterious islands and explore new modes of letter-hunting in tranquil and natural settings.
Where will the trail lead you? Start your journey today!

name: Wojak Rush
summary: Are you ready to embark on a relentless struggle to wake the Wojak, who has had a strange dream, from his dream? Wojak Rush is a cartoon themed adventure game that combines parkour and rogue-like game mechanics that you will use against hundreds of monsters that come upon you.

name: Worry_Bead
summary: Restful, Relaxing, Fun at a low, low price. Flip, Spin or Fiddle the Beads in manner that suits you. Use a two finger motion to set the bead size. This sole use or "pass around on a single device" game will show at least one virtual bead that the user can fiddle with single finger actions. There will be more beads on devices with larger screens. There is no demand to move fast or slow, so the APP could be used to burn off excess energy or stress. As a game, multiple users can pass the device around and try to mimic the bead arrangement on the other tab. The APP could also be used as a dexterity test, where someone would make requested changes to all the beads within a certain time.

name: Wonder Wheel
summary:
Discover the Wonders of the Wheel! Each Wonder contains three images which, when combined correctly, reveal a movie, artist or famous person.
A British flag? A knee? Some old spears? Brit.. knee.. spears..
To master the Wonder Wheel you'll need to solve cryptic clues, use phonetic phrases and twist your tongue. Can you solve them all and discover all the Wonders?

name: Word Adventure
summary:
If you like word games, you have to take a look at Word Adventure. It's a brand new kind of Word Game!
Join us in this exciting adventure spanning through many different fantasy worlds. Travel through magical lands, visit amazing places and meet all kinds of cute creatures along the way.
Word Adventure is a single player word game that combines puzzle elements with a word game. You tap squares of letters to create words, but what really makes it stand out from other similar games is the possibility to move letters horizontally & vertically. You have never seen anything like this before, brand new gameplay mechanism!

name: Word Boxing
summary: Improve your reaction speed and basic knowledge!

name: Word Safe
summary:
Love word games, but bored with Boggle clones? Give Word Safe a try, it is a simple but addictive game of combining letters to make words. Instead of using the typical grid of letters, use the combination lock to make as many words as possible.
Words must be at least 3 letters long. Longer words are worth more points than short words so plan accordingly.

name: Wordgraphy
summary: Wordgraphy is a new word game experience that limits your possible moves with letter groups to push you to think different words.

name: Worded!
summary:
Worded! is a fun new word game that is easy to learn and challenging to master. If you like word games then you will love this amazing indie game. It combines word search with board and tile spelling games and real world physics to create a unique and entertaining word game experience.
You select the letters that can spell a word and then you arrange them into the word that you want to spell. More tiles will fall with each word that you find so your words must be long enough to prevent the board from filling up. Earn coins by finding longer words with rarer letters to buy powerups that destroy tiles and help you find even longer words.

name: Word Choices
summary:
Have you ever thought about what it would be like to have all your favorite and new word games at one place? Well! Look no further.
Word Choices offers a collection of the best of Word Searching, Crosswords, Anagram & Picture crossword games. Find the hidden words, test your vocabulary, spelling & puzzle solving skills with this incredibly addicting bouquet of word games.

name: Word Search Puzzle: Word Balls
summary:
Sit back, take a deep breath, relax and challenge yourself with Word Balls, the best word puzzle game.
Every level has a unique subject with many words that are split into different balls. Your goal is to combine the letters in order to find the words! Simple and understandable but at the same time challenging and amusing, Word Balls delivers your daily brain training!

name: Words Scramble
summary: Swap letters to unscramble words in this fun app. The letters are all laid out and all you have to do is decipher the words describing the beautiful images. So what are you waiting for, challenge yourself with a great combination of words and pictures. You also get to build your vocabulary on the way!

name: Word Stitch
summary:
Word Stitch is a charming crossword game that’s way more than it “seams.” The words you find become patches for knitting beautiful and charming quilts! Fun and appropriate for all ages, you can play alone or cozied up to the same screen together. Make it a nightly spelling regimine for your kids, or just challenge yourself to the game’s hundreds of tailored levels. Sewing and crochet are the world’s most popular hobby, and now it’s in lovable word game form on your phone!
Privacy Notice: Word Stitch collects your device’s IP address, advertising ID, and other partner specific identifiers. These identifiers enable personalized ads and analytics to improve our game. Opt-out or learn more by visiting our Privacy Center, accessible from the game's settings.

name: Words with AI
summary: English version of famous Russian word game Erudite, originally inspired by Scrabble. The game is meant to enrich vocabulary and develop logical thinking. You need to compose words on a game field with tiles of different value. Unlike original game there are some differences: you can put several words at a turn, starting 7-letter word is always placed on start, etc.

name: Word Search & Learn
summary: It's time to WORD SEARCH & LEARN: The new FREE game from Mobnyx!!! A whole new experience in Word Search games: you will challenge your brain and learn at the same time!

name: Woodroid HD+
summary: Woodroid mix the brick breaker gameplay, pixelart graphics and awesome visual effects to enjoy breaking all the pixels for free during more than 100 levels.

name: Wonder Boy: Anniversary Collection
summary: One SEGA icon. Six perfect games. 21 different versions!

name: Wobbuffet's Puzzle Pack
summary: Wobbuffet's Puzzle Pack! was a Flash game on Pokémon.com. It was a jigsaw puzzle where the player put togther Pokémon-related images.

name: Worm AR
summary: Move the worm through the sand box using the 2 control buttons. Navigate to the fruits. Do not move onto the walls and do not bite the worm itself! Watch the time!

name: World Annihilation Operations Parts I-IV
summary: Explore this set of 4 distinct short experimental games and experience impossible worlds filled with audiovisual and narrative contradictions.

name: World of Mines: Creators Edition
summary: World of Mines is a classic, throwback PC game with a twist. Create and design your own workshop maps and share your creations to other players of the World of Mines community! Enjoy hiding pixel art and messages to make an impression on other players in the community.

name: World of Fate
summary: World of Fate is a massive strategy game where you spend your time taking over real life buildings and establishing your empire on the real life map. The game uses super advanced tech to provide real time street data and building data to create all the terrain and play space.

name: WolfQuest: Anniversary Edition - Lost River
summary: A fictional area in the Mountain West, featuring both expansive wilderness and a mysteriously-abandoned town.

name: Wormhole Cafe
summary: A fantastic sex simulator is here! Wormhole Cafe is a passionate addition bringing an ignored genre to Steam. Engage with 4 unique characters in different situations using wormholes. No matter where they are or what they're doing, they're ready to satisfy you!

name: Woman Communication
summary: It often happens that lewd words are inadvertently made up in conversation, doesn't it? This game is probably the world's first adventure game where you will find such "inadvertent lewd words" to advance the game!

name: Wolfteam: Reboot
summary: Wolfteam is a game where you can enjoy a variety of team formations and battlefield situations that change from moment to moment, such as humans and wolves, wolves and wolves, through the keyword werewolves, beyond human-to-human battles.

name: Word x Word
summary: A battle of wits against a friend, or the computer! Reveal words to discover their common theme; gain enough points, and you'll secure a place on the hall of fame!

name: World Boxing Challenge
summary: World Boxing Challenge puts pure iron in your hands, with the ultimate 3D, multi-device boxing experience. Train your boxers, grow your gym, and earn glory and money.

name: WordSplit
summary:
Complete the broken words to increase vocabulary in this best word game ever.
Thousands of words are broken so you need to complete and fix them. Enjoy connecting broken words to complete and it will help to increase your broken vocabulary.

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty is a historical fantasy action role-playing video game developed by Team Ninja and published by Koei Tecmo.

Set during a fictionalised version of the fall of the Han Dynasty, the plot follows an unnamed protagonist who battles historical characters and Chinese mythological creatures corrupted by demonic qi.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty (full game)
- Digital Art Book
- Digital Mini Soundtrack
- Season Pass (which includes additional DLCs Battle of Zhongyuan, Conqueror of
Jiangdong, Upheaval in Jingxiang, and Season Pass Bonus Qinglong Armor)

name: Woodventure: Mahjong Connect
summary:
Take a weekend trip through forest full of cute animals in this classic mahjong connect game. Mahjong connect games have simple rule: two tiles can be connected if path between them has maximum of two turns. Your target is to clear whole board.
Woodventure has 18 levels and you are traveling from one to next on map of the wood.

name: Wordism
summary: Wordism is a fun, new and relaxing word game that is going to light up your inner passion for words. Challenge yourself with six different play modes ranging from word searches to time challenges and infinite combo tricks. Discover how to get more points with unusual combinations, climb the leaderboards and complete the crazy 100 questions challenge.

name: Wonder Trips
summary: Wonder Trips is designed to take you into different lands to enjoy many trips and activities. Have Lot Of Fun by riding, racing, para-sailing and more... It's time to discover different wonderlands and enjoy your own trips.

name: World of Mana
summary: You can play with many people with a map made with the map editor and share the created map. You can set up individual or team battles and become a team together to catch monsters, escape mazes, or fight each other. Create a map using the map editor in World of Mana and enjoy it together.

name: World of Prandis
summary:
Let's join with all the users from all over the world
You become one of the two camps Femina or Virr.
You can roam freely in this massively multiplayer online game.
If you are tired of mass-produced auto games, you’ll enjoy this, it’s known as the pocket WoW of its time.

name: Word Search: World's Biggest
summary:
Find thousands of words in the biggest and best wordsearch puzzle ever! Explore a giant grid of puzzles, with dozens of quests, trophies and secrets to discover.
Hours and hours of entertainment for the dedicated wordsearch fan!

name: Words N Words
summary: Do you love word games? Do you want something more challenging? Do you consider yourself an expert? Then give Words N Words a try. This word game is one where you find words within another word. How many words can you make from the base word? We’ve included every word we could think of and we’d love for you to play. Start with Beginner where you’ll search for 3 and 4 letter words, move on to Intermediate to search for 3, 4, and 5 letter words, and play Advanced, if you dare. We’re welcoming all Worders to play. Words N Words, Get the Word out!

name: Word Trip
summary: Word Trip is a light-action word-building game with three levels of difficulty, daily challenges, and a stress-free free play mode. Includes online leaderboards! The goal of the game is to get from the top word to the bottom one by making new four letter words.

name: Worms v Lemmings
summary: Worms v Lemmings is a cancelled game that was in development in 2006, however was cancelled very shortly into development with only a PC prototype being made.

name: Word Cats
summary:
A word search game for everyone!
Meow! Make as many words as you can in 30 seconds. Earn cat coins to complete your collection of cats and share your favourite words with your loved ones.

name: Word Monsters
summary: Word up, Word Monsters! Play this social word game with your friends and compete with players around the world to see who’s the top monster of them all!

name: Word Twist!
summary:
Word Twist! is a fast-paced and dynamic word game. You build words from a limited but changing selections of letters to gain as many points as you can in one minute.
A perfect way to challenge your vocabulary while waiting for the buss or watching a bad TV show.

name: Word Wreck
summary:
Word Wreck is a fast-paced word game. The letters just keep falling and you have to make a word out of them before they fill your screen! If you're not quick enough the letters will turn into stone and you can't use them anymore!
Some letters have bombs which will clear a nice chunk of the board. If that's not enough, collect gold coins and buy some help! You can destroy the bottom row, freeze time or increase the lives of every tile on the board.

name: Word Chef: Letter Pop
summary:
Slide your finger over the bubbles to find words in this new word scramble game!
Turn your words into wild soup flavors and share them with your friends -- make them smile, laugh or gross them out, it's up to you!

name: Word Trace
summary: Word Trace is easy and relaxing word game where you slide letter blocks up and down in order to find the hidden word. There are 16 different categories of words to choose from. It starts very easy but gets more challenging in later levels.

name: Words & Magic
summary:
Words & Magic is a RPG and fight with typing.
To find a better item while defeat the enemy, it is a hack-and-slash type game.
While promoting the game, you can practice typing with fun.
In addition, even in the case of those who are not familiar with the typing, it has been designed to be clear by growing the character and finding better item to equip.
It is also possible to using bluetooth keyboard.
There is no contents fee.
Application uses connection to the internet for ads, but you can also enjoy in offline.

name: Wolcen: Lords of Mayhem - Deluxe Edition
summary: A bold and beautiful hack n' slash ARPG with no class restrictions and satisfying brutal combat. Forge a bloody path through a dark fantasy world in an epic story campaign, paving the way to a truly dynamic endgame, master your skills, and become The Ascended.

name: Words of Wisdom
summary: Poetic, philosophical and challenging platformer experience? That's all about Words of Wisdow — innovative mix of hardcore platformer with text riddles and word puzzles.

name: Word War Vi
summary: Word War vi is your basic side-scrolling shoot 'em up '80s style arcade game. You pilot your "vi"per craft through core memory, rescuing lost .swp files, avoiding OS defenses, and wiping out those memory hogging emacs processes. When all the lost .swp files are rescued, head for the socket which will take you to the next node in the cluster.

name: Worldquiz
summary:
Test and improve your knowledge about the world! Play in multiple singleplayer games or challenge your friends and other players online.
You know where to find New York? Even locating the Mount Everest is easy for you? But where is Timbuktu?
Prove yourself in 60 questions around the world in the level game, find the right balance between speed and accuracy in the timeattack game or repeat your weakest answers in the training mode.

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Rat Packs Weapon Skins
summary: Show those rat hordes that you fear no enemy with the Rat Packs Weapon Skins Bundle, featuring 4 premium rodent-themed skins, one for each weapon.

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Deadly Vice Weapon Skins
summary: Light up the zombie-filled streets with the Deadly Vice Weapon Skins Pack, featuring 4 premium neon skins, one for each weapon.

name: Woven Words
summary:
The Woven Words puzzle grids come in all different shapes and sizes, and when you’re done every row and every column will spell out complete words! Each game board is a mix of letters and blank tiles.
Can you find the right letters for the blank tiles so that every line spells a word both down and across?
The free app includes 6 basic puzzles so you can get your feet wet – and then 12 more challenging puzzles to test your skills. In addition, over five hundred more puzzles are available for purchase.
We’ve worked hard to make Woven Words fully accessible with VoiceOver.

name: Wojak Wants Hentai
summary: Fight the furies to gain access to a naughty gallery!Elon gives you missions to unlock Skins.Get help from Trump.And find many secrets.

name: Word Solitaire
summary: A Solitaire-like game where the objective is to clear the card columns by forming five letter words.

name: Wonder Wool
summary: Wonder Wool is a new lighthearted action adventure game. Its flocking, vibrant environment and evolving gameplay will draw you into a world filled with Greek myths and wonders.

name: Woodland Hike
summary: Immerse yourself in the serenity of nature with Woodland Hike, a hiking-infused walking simulator that takes you on a journey through lush forests, babbling brooks, and picturesque landscapes.

name: World Class
summary: World Class is an RPG that uses stylized, anime-like, art. You create your character and define your story with customized ability sets with modifications that make the overall feel more personalized.

name: World Zombies Cup
summary: Have you got the football or soccer fever? Crazy things are going down in the world football or soccer cup series. Play for your favorite team and infect all the players in this funny parody game. Be responsible for a mass zombie invasion but watch out for the vigilant referees. A funny sport zombie game with a viral twist.

name: World of Blade: Zombie Slasher
summary:
Are you ready to become a blade master? Get started now!
Very simple! but addictive game! World of Blade!
Compete other gladiators around the world!
And you must survive the battle with the zombies!

name: Words Scramble: Cities
summary: A superb combination of guessing the city/place name and unscrambling words will keep you hooked for hours together. Look at the beautiful real life pictures from around the world and guess the words that are a part of that picture. So keep playing till you get them all!

name: Wondersnake
summary: A homebrew version of Snake developer for the Wonderswan Color.

name: Worms W.M.D Mobilize
summary:
The worms are back in their most destructive game yet. With a gorgeous, hand-drawn 2D look, brand new weapons, vehicles and buildings plus the return of some much-loved classic weapons and gameplay, Worms W.M.D: Mobilize is the best worms experience ever.

Work your way through 10 training and 20 campaign missions of increasing difficulty using the huge arsenal of new and classic weapons at your disposal. Use new vehicles to cause chaos amongst the enemy ranks and use buildings to gain the tactical advantage as you try to dominate the battlefield!

Take on opponents in hilarious all-out tactical worm warfare either in local or online multiplayer. Flatten your opponents with the Concrete Donkey. Turn them into chunks of worm meat with the Holy Hand Grenade. Rain down hell from above in helicopters or pound them into oblivion with the tank. With 50 weapons and utilities at your fingertips, this is Worms at its chaotic best!

name: WordyBuilder
summary: WordyBuilder is a word guessing game in German. Reassemble the given letters to form words that are valid under official scrabble rules. You play it via Twitch Chat.

name: Words of Yendor
summary: A word puzzle roguelike set in a steamgoth world of amalgamated steam-age technology and antediluvian sorcery. Collect resources, solve dangerous situations and prepare for a showdown with each Master Villain to discover the meaning behind the Word of Yendor!

name: Wobble
summary: The player controls a monkey somewhat resembling Diddy Kong, and must attempt to balance a glass of juice without letting it spill.

name: Worms Rumble: Cats & Dogs Double Pack
summary:
To celebrate the arrival of Team Deathmatch, we’re introducing the longest-standing rivalry in history, Cats vs Dogs!
Are you Team Cat or Team Dog?
This pack includes:
• Cat Outfit x 3
• Dog Outfit x 3
• Cat Banner
• Dog Banner
• Kitty Weapon Skin
• Bones Weapon Skin
• Nine Lives Title
• Good Boy Title
• Meow Emote
• Panting Emote

name: Worms Rumble: Spaceworm and Alien Double Pack
summary: Worms in Spaaaaaace! Kit out your Worm with outfits, banners, emotes, weapon skins and titles that are out of this world!

name: Wooden Battles: Spec Ops
summary: Wooden Battles: Spec Ops is a stealth action strategy game. Take control of a group of 4 special forces units with unique abilities, infiltrate the enemy base and complete the mission objectives. Use the in-game level editor to create your own missions and upload them to the Steam Workshop.

name: Worms Blast
summary: Worms Blast is a puzzle game similar in concept to Puzzle Bobble, with several important distinctions and gameplay features taken from Worms games. Instead of releasing and matching bubbles, the player has to color blocks on a hexagonal grid. Unlike most Bust-A-Move variants, the player character can move right and left, sailing in a boat. Various weapons, such as bazooka, grenades, dynamite, and others, can be used to fire at the blocks, coloring them on impact. Like in the main, artillery-based Worms games, holding down the fire button increases the power of the weapon, affecting the distance it travels.

name: Worms
summary: Team17 planned on producing Worms for the Virtual Boy back in 1995. Though, after a few weeks, they cancelled this plan due to the lack of interest of the publisher and the expected failure of the Virtual Boy.

name: Worldship: A Board Game Edition
summary: Worldship: A Board Game Edition is a role-playing area control board game about a group of children who are forced into competing against each other in a spaceship.

name: Wolf Souls
summary: Dark and unforgiving world of Wolf Souls, a Souls-like RPG where you play as a strong woman battling challenging bosses with magic and a variety of weapons.

name: Word Tracky
summary:
Word Tracky is the game where you drag and swipe to hunt for the nine letter words. Set over a range of different animated environments, use powerups to help seek out all the words, including special cash and bonus words.
Relaxing and addictive, Word Tracky can also be played in a more fast paced way to achieve combos and high scores.

name: Wolfhound: The Way of the Warrior
summary: Is a Russian computer game in the Action/RPG genre, developed by Gaijin Entertainment for the Microsoft Windows platform. The game is based on novels by Russian writer Maria Semyonova and the movie "Wolfhound", which was released in 2006.

name: Wolfhound: The Last of the Grey Dogs
summary: A Russian Top-down Action-RPG game based on novels of Russian writer Maria Semyonova and 2006's film "Wolfhound".

name: Wobbledogs: Console Edition
summary: Raise your own hive of mutating dogs, physically simulated down to their guts!

name: Woodcutter
summary: Woodcutter is a VR simulator that makes everyone feel like a real carpenter. The simulator reproduces the main stages of the production of window architraves: creating a workpiece blank, choosing the shape of the future architraves, sawing, milling, painting, etc.

name: World of Goo Remastered
summary:
They're squirmy and curious! Drag and drop living Goo Balls to build everything from bridges to giant tongues in this physics-based puzzle game.
The millions of Goo Balls that live in the beautiful World of Goo are curious to explore — but they don't know that they're in a game, or that they're extremely delicious. Connect the Goo Balls to build a wide range of jiggly architecture, including: bridges, cannonballs, and zeppelins.

name: Wolf in the City
summary: A lone wolf whose children have been kidnapped from an animal shelter and is looking for his children in a Big city. He will need to find food and track to survive. As the wolf, run through the streets and interact with cars and people. Sleep and recharge, or talk to other animals. This is a ThirdPerson game about story and tracking.

name: World War: Combat Guardian
summary: Part 2 of a Reality single play FPS game set in World War II! Defeat your enemies and get your weapons! Team up with our soldiers to complete the battlefield mission!

name: Woodla: The Tower
summary: Woodla: The Tower - the first game of Woodla augmented reality game series. Explore the world around you. Collect magical sets to get powerful spells. Fight the Astral creatures. Collaborate with your friends helping each other to progress. Go deeper in the Great Tower worlds to find the evil source and eliminate it.

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Battle of Zhongyuan
summary: The first DLC for Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty. It includes new stages, difficulty levels, weapon types, enemies and more, promising an exciting experience for Wo Long experts and novices alike.

name: Worlds War 1
summary: Worlds War 1 is a shooter sci-fi game where you fight against all odds in a battle to save the earth from the aliens who started attacking the earth - and your home.

name: Wonder Wars
summary: Wonder Wars is a strategy mobile-first videogame. Choose your hero and six troops and conquer Mundo Maravilla! Go PVP or PVE and collect all characters to create the best team.

name: World War 0x
summary:
World War 0x is a multiplayer FPS game set during a World War 3 conflict with a low poly art style.

The game features real world locations such as Odesa Port.

Tons of weapon options to choose from like rifles, snipers, shotguns, RPGs and pistols.

Vehicles like armored cars, tanks, helicopters and fighter jets help you get around fast.

name: Wonderland of Carbuncle
summary: This is a comical action game starring Carbuncle. Part of MSX2 Disc Station volume #25.

name: Worrrm Rebirth
summary:
Keep escaping from the expanding and contracting worm.
You can move the character by tilting the device (mobile phone). When entering a round stage, points will be added. Compete how much points you can overlap without being caught by the worm.

name: Wordsock Classic
summary: Compete in local or online word battles. Supports solo mode with or without AI players.

name: Wolf Simulator
summary:
Wolf Simulator is an amazing game with spectacular hunts and alpha battles. Become a wild wolf, fight for new territories so that the wild world would know who is a real Alpha.

The main action of the game lays around realistic hunting of a variety of animals and beating the Alphas on each territory of the vast open world map. But be careful! Some animals might be very attentive, so you have to silently crawl to catch them.
You may also grow your pups which will help you hunt down big and fierce animals, like bears and even tigers! On the other hand, you simply can explore numerous stunning locations with your fellas, once they are grown ups.

name: WooLoop: Space Pack
summary: This Space-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is of things from out of this world! Travel into the great beyond with this gallery.

name: Word Whisper
summary:
Word Whisper is a New Word Puzzle,Word Finder,Spelling game. Where you have to Swipe Letters and Pictures to complete words, challenge your self and complete Inspirational Quotes about Life,Weird Facts and Trivia .
It is a brain teaser and at the same time educational.
For hint you can check the pop up text to see which words needs to be filled to complete the text.

name: Words Collide
summary: Play by yourself or cooperatively with friends. Relax in Zen Mode, or challenge yourself with Adventure Mode. Carefully construct combos to achieve high scores! Discover and learn new words using our in game dictionary. Arrange letters to spell words; your friends can reuse your words to spell bigger words. Earn coins to unlock upgrades like extra letters, hints and combos. Start playing Words Collide today!

name: World of Grimm
summary: A fast-paced 5-minute digital collectible card game in the Brothers Grimm universe.

name: World of JumpStart
summary:
Are your little learners ready to embark on an enchanting journey through the World of JumpStart? Invite them to create and customize their very own Jumpee, settle into a friendly neighborhood, complete exciting missions, raise magical pets and more in an interactive and adventure-filled world where knowledge is key and learning is fun.

Play now to get started with Frankie and the JumpStart friends!

name: World of Art: Learn with Jigsaw Puzzles - Pixel Art by Numbers
summary: All Your favorite Paintings from "World of Art - learn with Jigsaw Puzzle" Collection! Choose Your favorite Pixel Art resolution, a number of colors in Your color palette and start painting!

name: Word Search Explorer
summary:
A new twist on the classic word search. Use your skills of deduction to uncover the letters that make up each word. Every word found gives you additional moves to work with. How many moves will it take you to solve each puzzle?
Collect animal friends along the way to assist you as you navigate this world of words. Each has a different power that will help you solve the puzzle and increase your score. Challenge your friends and the world with your best high scores on the leader-boards.

name: Worlds Align: Beginning - Collector's Edition
summary: The game worlds are in danger, and some of your favorite characters have come together to ask an outsider for help. That's where you come in! Will you answer their call?

name: WorMoon: Awakening
summary:
Embark on an epic journey in worMoon Awakening - A fast paced card battle game with some RPG and innovative roguelite mechanics to create a simple, fun and replayable game.
Build your deck of nine cards by combining the power of your team of heroes. Unleash the forces of nature with Bo, wield powerful magic with Ash, and uncover the enigmatic hero Jomei's secrets.

name: World Soccer Challenge
summary:
Inspired by classic footie games of the 90's, World Soccer Challenge offers an exciting opportunity to replay and be part of the history of international soccer.
Qualify your national team and try to win the International Cup at Russia. You can even go back to Mexico 86 and play as West Germany, Yugoslavia or the Soviet Union.

name: Working Noir
summary:
How far will one man go to prove his innocence?

Working Title Noir Game is an action adventure game featuring a hard-boiled detective framed for murder. Play in your own style, stealth, melee, action shooter... Different styles will reveal different endings.

name: WorldNeverland: Daily Life in the Elnea Kingdom - Pioneer Summer Outfit Set: Citrus
summary:
Comes with:
- Pioneer Summer Outfit: Citrus "Refreshingly cool summer wear often seen around the Nak Peninsula's southern frontier."
- Summer Pioneer Kid's Wear: Cit "Refreshingly cool kid's summer wear often seen around the Nak Peninsula's southern frontier."

name: World of Smile
summary:
Why don't these cute creatures ever smile? They need more sweets to build the tallest tower in this amazing new world. And this is not casual - after all, they decided to go into outer space!
Use the non-smiling creatures' springy arms to collect all the sweets using the drag and drop mechanics. Build the highest tower - and finally let them see space.

name: W.O.L.F
summary: Become Wolf, a research staff member, and get to the "place to return". This is an action game that can be played easily with only the mouse! Clear about 50 challenging action scenes while repeating failures over and over again!

name: Wogger
summary: The complete story of woggers adventures is waiting for you! 12 levels lead you through woggers own world and strange creatures will appear. Sometimes it might be easy sometimes it can be very tuff to find a solution.

name: Wood Cube Block: Classic Casual Puzzle
summary:
A classic puzzle with blocks for training logic in a modern version!
Meet the classic puzzle in a modern version! Show the skills of strategic thinking and logic to score as many points as possible!

name: Worldwide Battle Royale
summary: Battle royale game with realistic world maps and characters.

name: WordHopper
summary: An arcade-style word game in which the player spells words starting at the center of a letter grid.

name: Working Hard Collection
summary: Command a construction project or sabotage it? Your choice!

name: Wormgrubber
summary: A loser vampire girl who would end the world over a pointless crush.

name: World of Machines: Tanks War Operation
summary: World of Machines - Tanks War Operation is an immersive tank warfare game that thrusts you into the heart of epic battles across diverse landscapes and environments. Take control of a wide array of formidable tanks, explore different locations, tackle challenging missions, and customize your vehicles with unique camouflages. Prepare for intense armored combat and become a legendary commander on the front lines.

name: WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - Challenge Dungeon Collection
summary:
The Challenge Dungeon Collection includes:
- Challenge Dungeon "Hellfire Lair"
- Challenge Dungeon "Sunken Ruins"
+ 4 save slots (adds 4 additional save data slots)

name: WooLoop: Urban Pack
summary: This Urban-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is of various urban lifestyle times, builders and iconography! Explore what the big city has to offer!

name: Wordward Draw
summary: Explore 4 letter words.

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing - 23 Edition
summary: The Official Game of The World of Outlaws, built in collaboration with iRacing!

name: Wolf Simulator
summary: Attention, nature lovers! Get ready to embark on an extraordinary adventure as you step into the paws of a magnificent wolf in the untamed wilderness. In this immersive Wolf RPG Simulator game, it's time to unleash your primal instincts and conquer the challenges of survival!

name: World Dai-star: Yume no Stellarium
summary: World Dai-star: Yume no Stellarium is a rhythm game for iOS and Android.

name: World Guesser
summary: World Guesser is a multiplayer party royale game where you and your fellow contestants compete to deliver packet to successive target countries for the sake of being the last one to remain. It's a battle royale concept geography game that sends you on a plane trip around the earth.

name: WonderfulWhims
summary: WonderfulWhims is a standalone mod for The Sims 4 that offers plenty of social, relationship, and pregnancy enhancements in the forms of Attractiveness, Impressions, Personality Archetypes, Menstrual Cycle, Birth Control, and many more.

name: WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - The Makeover Collection
summary:
Contents:
-Cosmetics set (Magical Makeup, Hair Catalog)
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop( Fashion Store in Castle St. ) when you purchase it.
-Luxury Wedding Attire Set ( White, Pink, Blue )
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop( Clothing Store in Castle St. ) when you purchase it.

name: Would You Like to Run an Idol Café? 3
summary: Can Sweet Shoreline win the idol competition and save the cafe?

name: Worldwide Soccer
summary: A Brazilian version of Tony Meola's Sidekicks Soccer without the sponsorship by the player. The game itself has no modifications from the original version.

name: World Spin
summary: Simple and satisfying! Unwind your mind with this new brain training puzzle action game!

name: World Football 98
summary:
World Football 98 is a soccer game, released just before the 1998 Football World Cup.

It featured Kiko Narváez, the Spanish national team striker, prominently in the Kiko World Football version. The game was also later distributed as a gift when buying Danone yogurts under the name of Danone World Football where it was an ad game, as in the break between halves advertisements are shown.

name: World End Heart Girl
summary: After a certain mission, a bunch of Songstress' Songbird Angels were given their own HEART WORLDS to look after as a prize..... with loads of awesomefun humans in them...... wow....

name: Wonderland Secret Worlds
summary: The unique mix of puzzle solving and arcade/action is back in Wonderland Secret Worlds. A magical storm has blown into Wonderland and swept away the little Stinkers. It is up to you to rescue them. Control Wonderland's four heroes - Stinky, Loof, Qookie, and Peegue - through over a hundred new levels in the diverse worlds of Wonderland.

name: Wooo 2
summary: Wooo 2 is a 38 level joke WAD for Doom II, requiring a ZDoom based source port. The WAD is a sequel to WOOO, and just like its predecessor, the WAD relies on ridiculous enemy placement, gratuitous abuse of ZDoom features, and intentionally terrible map design. The WAD was uploaded on /idgames archive on September 1, 2014. At the Cacowards 2014 it became a runner-up for the Mockaward. The sequel, Wooo 3, was released two years later.

name: Wooo
summary: Wooo is 32 level joke WAD for Doom II, requiring a ZDoom based source port. Similar to Mock 2: The Speed of Stupid, the WAD relies on ridiculous enemy placement, gratuitous abuse of ZDoom features, and intentionally terrible map design. The WAD was uploaded on /idgames archive on October 25, 2013. At the Cacowards 2013 it was highlighted in a "Sing the Praises of Pants" sidebar. The sequel, Wooo 2, was released a year later.

name: Woodlawn: The End of the World
summary:
When scientists try to create and control magic, their first spell goes wrong, and monsters are accidentally brought to life and destroy cities. Now the military has to hold off and contain the monsters while scientists try to figure out how to undo the spell.

The enemies AI can detect the skill of the player and automatically adjust difficulty based on player performance.

name: World Soccer Champs
summary: Get ready for an exhilarating soccer experience in this addictive mobile game. Manage your team and strive for greatness as you participate in numerous football leagues and cups from around the globe, including local clubs and national teams.

name: World War Alpha
summary: Despite their conceptual differences, World War Alpha actually ties into both Sure Shot 3D and Wrecked to complete a trilogy of games. The treacherous ending of Sure Shot (whereby Major Merc Paramount abandons his partner on the island) sent our 2 heroes down separate paths. While Wrecked concerned itself with the island that was left behind, World War Alpha proceeds to tell the story of what happened to the army that flew away. The details are fleshed out in the game via a series of episodic cut-scenes, but the basic gist is that their maniacal appetite for world domination takes them deep into the past - where they expect to brutalize their primitive ancestors with their superior knowledge and technology! Fortunately for us, they get much more than they bargained for from our resourceful forefathers...

name: Worms Rumble: Action All-Stars Pack
summary:
Jump into the fight with your favourite action hero! Whether you’re bold, cunning, or wise, the Action All-Stars Pack has you covered.

This pack includes:
3 Outfits – Superhero, Wizard and Ninja (each with 3 different colour variants!)
3 Weapon Skins (Heroic, Magical and Cherry Blossom)
3 Emotes
3 Titles
3 Banners

name: Woodturning
summary:
The best woodturning simulator.
Complete customer orders.
Turn a piece of wood into the given shape.
Cut (carve), polish, paint and add a stencil to your work.
Earn money and improve your room.

name: Wobble Warriors
summary: Wobble Warriors is a 1-4 player ragdoll fighting couch co-op game. In this dungeon crawler, you and your friends play as some wobbly dragons on a mission to conquer the goblins who stole your gold. Jump, dash, ground pound, and bonk your way to victory by clearing each room.

name: World War 2: WW2 Strategy Games
summary: A World War II themed turn-based war chess game. You will play a commander during World War II, directing your troops to complete various tasks. You have the opportunity to reproduce every historical battle, command the ace generals and elite troops in history to win the victory!

name: Wolf West
summary: Follow Luna's vengeance journey to defeat the sheriff and bring back the forest balance. Accompanied by the Druid, explore and fight the world of the Wild West in the name of your fallen brothers and sisters.

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing 2023 - Ultimate Edition
WooLoop: Food Pack
summary: This Food-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image looks delicious and nutritious! Create your own culinary delights with this DLC.

name: World War 1: Ruined Part 1
summary: Embark on an enigmatic odyssey with "RUINED Part 1" DLC. Uncover secrets in a decaying world, battling foes and moral quandaries. Enhanced visuals, immersive gameplay, and a haunting soundtrack await. Redefine your understanding of "RUINED" in this gripping expansion.

name: World War 1
summary: Dive into the epic saga of 'World War 1.' Navigate a realm consumed by conflict, unite forces, and lead mighty champions. Delve into the enigma of the fractured world and wield destiny's reins. The battle for existence is underway.

name: Woks
summary:
Emperor Pong hid all the WOKS in the palace strong rooms, and placed members of his elite forces to guard them. You as the people's champion have been chosen to get their WOKS back.

There are nine rooms containing the WOKS, unfortunately some rooms have more guards than others, the first three have only one guard in each, the next three have two in each, the last three rooms have three guards in each. The only advantage you have is that the guards are highly disciplined and never change the route of their patrol, you must learn the routes if you have any chance of defeating them.

name: World2D Re
summary:
In this short game in a 2.5d world pass the levels and each level will face new challenges
increasingly difficult.

name: Word Search Puzzle: Find the Words!
summary: Word Search is a classic word puzzle to search for words! Spell the words and the word puzzles will be completed!

name: Word Dungeons
summary: Word Dungeons borrows attitude from dark and gritty RPGs, and adds these elements to a word game. Solve words, collect loot, power up your runes and discover the mysteries that lay within the dungeon. Can you escape?

name: Wolfenstein 3D
summary:
Wolfenstein 3D is a first-person shooter presented with rudimentary 3D graphics and a follow-up to the top-down infiltration game Castle Wolfenstein. The game is broken up into levels, each of which is a flat plane divided into areas and rooms by a grid-based pattern of walls and doors, all of equal height. Each level is themed after Nazi bunkers and buildings. To finish a level, the player must traverse through the area to reach an elevator. Levels are grouped together into named episodes, with the final level focusing on a boss fight with a particularly difficult enemy. While traversing the levels, the player must fight Nazi guards and soldiers, dogs, and other enemies while managing supplies of ammunition and health.

While later releases of the game included the Nocturnal Missions expansion, this initial release did not.

name: Wolfenstein 3D: Nocturnal Missions
summary: A prequel expansion containing chapters 4, 5, and 6. This expansion was sold separately for the original release of Wolfenstein 3D, but was bundled into the game for future releases.

name: Womb
summary: During a route next to Prasinos, a colonized little planet, Helena received the a order to investigate a S.O.S. sign streamed by the mothership Z9. When landing on site, she discovers that the situation was much worse than she thought.

name: Wolvesville
summary: Wolvesville is a multiplayer game for up to 16 players. Each game has different teams such as villagers or werewolves all fighting to be the last team standing. Use special abilities to uncover the roles of other players and convince your fellow players to work with you.

name: Wonder Wheel
summary: This is a wad of 4 maps; they are vaguely nature-themed and about 10 minutes and 100 monsters long each. No gameplay changes. Balanced for pistol starts.

name: World of Rune
summary: World of Rune is an MMORPG game with tons of different characters and mystical cute pets. You can play as a Swordsman, Mage, Archer and Cleric.

name: World Cup Italia '90
summary: Master System port of World Cup Italia '90. This soccer game lets you choose a team representing one of twenty-four countries around the world to participate in the World Championship tournament.

name: World Cup Italia '90
summary: World Cup Italia '90 is a port of World Championship Soccer which was released in Europe. This port, however, had a license from FIFA to use the 1990 FIFA World Cup as brand.

name: Workplace Fantasy
summary: The main stage of "Workplace Fantasy" is a fictional seaside town, which tells the story of a newly graduated intern working and living here, as well as communicating, interacting, and delving deeper into various residents of the town.

name: Wonder Wandelier
summary: You're an apprentice wand maker with a dream - and a huge debt to pay off in 30 days! Manage your store, gather materials in the dungeon, and craft magic wands to sell to customers. Haggle to get the best price and build reputation as a wand maker in this casual magic wand-shop simulation RPG.

name: World Ends Wednesday
summary: Join Hazel on a quest to uncover a mysterious treasure before other like-minded adventurers reach it first. The key to your victory lies in the mastery of timing-based RPG combat!

name: Wordchain
summary: Wordchain is a daily word game where players are given a starting letter and a scrambled set of additional letters. Players must use those letters to form a word from the starting letter. The last letter of that word becomes the first letter of the next word to be made.

name: Woodland Town
summary: Embark on a cozy journey of discovery and wonder in this enchanting exploration game. Immerse yourself in the lush embrace of a mystical town and the adjacent forest, where hidden objectives await your keen eye!

name: Wormhole: Battle for Planet Earth
summary: Wormhole: Battle for Planet Earth - This is a fantastic third-person action game. In the game you are waiting for aliens, teleporters, dark matter and hurricane action.

name: Woodland Isle
summary: Explore the enchanting world of Woodland Isle, a captivating exploration game that invites you to embark on a tranquil journey through a lush, mysterious island. Uncover hidden locations, from ancient campsites to majestic trees and the remains of giants.

name: World War 1: Ruined - Part 2
summary: Ruined Part 2 DLC: Free, Thrilling, and Here! Explore 3 new maps, experience an innovative game mode, and enjoy enhanced visuals/audio. Your journey continues with an epic storyline. Let's dive in! - RonStar Studios

name: Wordle DS
summary: A clone of Wordle for the Nintendo DS. The game features the same words as the official Wordle.

name: Woody's Incredible Journey to the Escape from Eternal Terror
World Quest
summary: A sidescrolling shoot 'em up where you control a fighter pilot assigned to attack alien bases. The player's ship can be upgraded so that it can fire in multiple directions and the player can use bombs. Along the way, humans can be saved for additional points.

name: Wordle
summary: An unofficial variant of Wordle for the NES.

name: Word Quest
summary: Are you ready to wield words as weapons and conquer the quest?

name: Wonder Witches
summary: Woohoooo! Welcome to the world of Wonder Witches! Collect magical potions, unlock witches with special broomsticks and enjoy the scenery. Watch out for those clouds in the sky and most important.

name: WooLoop: Industry Pack
summary: This Industry-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is of a different industry in action! Heavy machinery, highly skilled and vital to our day-to-day life!

name: Word Web by Powgi
summary: A new Powgi word game for fans of logic puzzles!

name: Word Spell Game: Yes or No ?
summary:
"Word Spell Game: Yes or No? – Experience the Ultimate Word-Spelling Challenge! Welcome to a world where precision meets speed in our dynamic Spelling Adventure game. Explore two thrilling modes: Category Mode and Survival Mode.
Category Mode: Dive into a variety of word categories, from animals to technology. Test your word wisdom and showcase your spelling mastery. Each round presents a new challenge, keeping your mind engaged and vocabulary enriched.
Survival Mode: Brace yourself for an adrenaline-packed test of your spelling skills. With only 10 seconds on the clock, you must swiftly decide whether the word is spelled correctly or not. The challenge intensifies with every correct answer, pushing your limits in this battle of wits.

name: World of Reinvention
summary: World of Reinvention is an adventure rpg for the ages set in a wonderous fantasy world briming with places to discover, creatures to encounter, and oh ever so much to learn. Who you will be is entirely up to you but be wary, the fate of this world is in your hands (probably).

name: Worm Visitor
summary: The Famicom version of Worm Visitor.

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Conqueror of Jiangdong
summary:
The second DLC, "Conqueror of Jiangdong," follows Sun Ce as he and his forces set out to conquer the territories of Jiangdong after the death of his father, Sun Jian.
This engaging story features new battlefields, weapons, equipment, and demons, in addition to a new Divine Beast, a more challenging difficulty level and an endgame content.

name: Wordler
summary: Wordler is a word puzzle game that is playable on the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment package. The game is a clone of the browser game Wordle.

name: Wounded Summer Baby
summary: Baby with bow

name: WoofChat
summary: Unleash your creativity in a customizable online nightclub. Be anyone, chat with other captivating players. Play on PC, iOS, Android—anywhere, anytime!

name: WorldCup Super Stadium
summary:
