WorldCup Super Stadium is an educational game that explores the history of the FIFA World Cup tournaments from 1930 to 1994.

Players navigate a menu-driven interface to select tournaments and view detailed information, including match results, team rankings, and notable players, presented through text and images.

name: Wolfen
summary: A warlord has harnessed ancient powers, and is turning his subjects into wolf like creatures. He must be stopped before his wolfen army grows beyond possible defeat.

name: Wolf Chapel Revisit
summary: A reimagining of the Wolf Chapel map from Hexen.

name: Wormi
summary:
An Apple iPad game for up to four players
Have you ever heard about a game called Snake?
Wormi brings well-proven game concept from an amazing 80s video game called SNAFU to a modern age with a twist.
Wormi was designed with local play in mind, with extensive options in single-player mode you can play solo or compete with three other friends simultaneously on one device thanks to precise and responsive controls.

name: World League Baseball
summary: Enjoy an excitement-filled baseball game rendered in a casual art style! Experience all the fun found only in ball games with simple and easy controls!

name: World of Yggdrasil
summary: Become emperor, criminal or merchant in the world of Yggdrasil... Choose your path in the world of Yggdrasil!

name: Word Space
summary: Guess the word before you lose all the petals from the sunflower. Go through 50+ levels and complete them all to learn new words and phrases.

name: World war zombie
summary: WorldWArZombie - another zombie game but with several maps and several fun and devastating accessories, only for real gamers

name: Worldcrusher
summary: Travel in space and scrap other planets to rebuild your own homeworld in this simple clicker RPG.

name: Woodside
summary: Welcome to Woodside, a third-person survival horror adventure. Explore, investigate and survive as Grace as she comes face to face with the supernatural terrors that plague a seemingly quaint British village.

name: World Cup '98 France: Road to Win
summary:
World Cup '98 France: Road to Win, not to be confused with FIFA Road to World Cup 98 is a football game released for the Sega Saturn.

World Cup '98 France recycles its core engine and much of its content from earlier Sega-published football games, particularly Sega Worldwide Soccer 98.

This is the last Saturn football game whose lineage can be traced back to 1995's Victory Goal. The next game in the series, Sega Worldwide Soccer 2000 was built from the ground-up by Silicon Dreams for the Dreamcast.

name: WooLoop: Halloween Pack
summary: This Halloween-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is eerie, kooky or otherwise spooky! Play this seasonal gallery if you dare!

name: Wordscapes Search
summary: Connect letters to find every word on the board and sail through thousands of classic puzzle levels set against stunning nature backgrounds.

name: Wolverine: Feral Instinct
summary: Uncover the mystery unfolding at the Weapon X facility and show your enemies exactly why you’re the best at what you do.

name: Wonderful Doom
summary: Wonderful Doom is a 2007 megawad for The Ultimate Doom created by Eugene Guschin (Wraith777), containing 36 levels created in the style of the original levels.

name: Wolf Pack
summary: 6 SP (1 secret) and 2 Dukematch levels. Features a new weapon (Assault Rifle replacing chaingun) and edited CON code to alter enemy strengths, ammo amount and weapon power. The levels end up leading you from an EDF facility to a secret installation and a prison until you reach a starport. From there you enter a spaceship where the showdown with an Overlord takes place. In the secret level, you travel to an arctic region via submarine.

name: Wound Man
summary: Wound Man is your guide on a gruesome adventure through the ages. Piece his epic story together while literally piecing him together. Poke, prod, stab and slice away to reveal his secrets. It's a jigsaw adventure! - but not for the faint of heart.

name: Wonder Wonder Punch
summary: A world where everyone holds a rank and every rank above you that dies moves you up the ladder. Fight, Upgrade and build your way to be the strongest person in the world. Weapons, items and abilities gathered in story mode can be used to hunt other players in PvP multiplayer modes.

name: World of Blocks
summary: World of Block is a sandbox game where the player has complete freedom to build their own world, using shapes, objects, and textures customized by the player.

name: Workplace Fantasy All Age Edition
summary: Workplace Fantasy takes a fictional seaside town as its main stage, telling the story of a newly graduated intern working and living here, as well as communicating, interacting, and delving deeper into the diverse residents of the town.

name: World Leaders
summary: Lead your nation to victory in this multiplayer turn-based war strategy game!

name: Womanizer
summary: The charming heartthrob made a bet with his best friend that within two weeks he would put five girls from the city's rhythmic gymnastics team, which had recently won national competitions, into bed. Will Victor win the bet on the lives of the girls?

name: Wormwood
summary: Two "orange and vaguely ﻿﻿spooky maps" made by Grain of Salt and Ribbiks for Halloween.

name: WonderCell
summary: This is a version of FreeCell for the Bandai Wonderswan - both mono and colour!

name: Wormwood: Expanded Universe
summary: A sequel to 2019's Wormwood, Expanded Universe is another Halloween-themed collaboration between Grain of Salt and Ribbiks

name: Wormwood III: The Horror
summary: A sequel to Wormwood: Expanded Universe by Grain of Salt and Ribbiks.

name: Wormwood IV: The Final Chapter
summary: A 10-level Halloween-themed wad for Doom II, Wormwood IV features maps by Ribbiks, Grain of Salt, and dannebubinga.

name: Wormwood V
summary: The fifth entry in the Wormwood series of Doom II wads, featuring maps by Grain of Salt and Ribbiks.

name: Wolf The Lone Hunt
summary: Play as wolf with the ability to transform into a werewolf. Explore, hunt your prey and overpower mighty foes.

name: World War: D-Day Part One
summary: Part 3 of a Reality single play FPS game set in World War II! The upcoming operation is D-Day on the beaches of Normandy! Defeat your enemies and get your weapons!

name: World of Warcraft: Cataclysm Classic
summary: The World-changing Cataclysm arrives in World of Warcraft Classic, with changes made from the original release based on fan feedback.

name: World of Warcraft Classic: Season of Discovery
summary: Seasonal content arrives to World of Warcraft Classic, adding new playstyles to previous classes, reimagined instances, new PvP areas, and more.

name: World of Warcraft: The War Within
summary:
Journey through never-before-seen subterranean worlds filled with hidden wonders and lurking perils, down to the dark depths of the nerubian empire, where the malicious Harbinger of the Void is gathering arachnid forces to bring Azeroth to its knees.

Deep beneath the surface lies treasure vaults waiting to be discovered with Delves. Explore these world instances solo or with up to four friends, along with an NPC companion, to defeat bosses and gain epic end-game loot.

Expand the potential of your alternate characters with account-wide progression across your family of characters on your Battle.net account with Warbands. Share your Warband Bank access, War Within Renown, achievements, collections, and more.

Rise to new heights of power with new Hero Talent trees. Each class specialization has access to two choices of self-contained Hero Talent trees inspired by iconic Warcraft universe archetypes.

name: World of Warcraft: Midnight
summary:
The second of three announced expansions of the Worldsoul Saga.

Introducing Housing!
Before you put down roots in your own cozy corner of Azeroth later this year, jump into our virtual tour for an early glimpse at the customization options that await you.

Explore New and Reimagined Zones
The battle between the Light and the Void spans across four zones as you discover new allies and confront ancient enemies.
- Silvermoon City
- Eversong
- Zul'Aman
- Harandar
- Voidstorm

New Features and Improvements
As the Void invasion descends upon Quel'Thalas, an array of new features add more depth and improvements to our evolving world.
- Prey
- Devourer Demon Hunter
- Haranir
- Dungeons and Raids
- New and Returning Player Experience
- Transmog Updates

name: World of Warcraft: The Last Titan
summary: The third of three announced expansions of the Worldsoul Saga.

name: Wormswarm
summary: Wormswarm is an experimental platformer about jumping on abstract wriggling worms while scoring points.

name: World Simulator 3
summary: Ability to create and run wordplay worlds (support for workshops); Attribute values between different worlds can be correlated and inheritable (gathering is a large universe, scattering is full of stars), or they can be isolated from each other. Small World Simulator is a lot of fun!

name: World of Warcraft: Dragonflight - Guardians of the Dream
summary:
The Emerald Dream is a verdant and powerful place that serves as a source of life and hope and is essential to Azeroth's continued survival. It has been protected for centuries under the watchful eyes of the Green Dragonflight. In those centuries, they have fought off the Old Gods, the Burning Legion, and other threats. Now vulnerable to attack once again from Fyrakk and his forces, Azeroth's champions must pull together to save it from destruction at all costs.

A special seed, planted by Tyrande, has grown into a new World Tree and is on the verge of crossing into Azeroth. Fyrakk and his forces, including his new allies—the Druids of the Flame, move beneath the boughs of the World Tree, inflaming the Dream denizens as they attempt to infuse the heart of the World Tree with fire and use it as a conduit to spread eternal flames throughout Azeroth.

name: WooLoop: Nature Pack
summary: This Nature-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Explore Autumn with these images of the outdoors! Create images of the natural world in all its beauty.

name: Wood Guy
summary: Defy the laws of physics with the wooden puppet and journey through this 2D platformer in a 3D world of handicrafts! Play alone or with friends .... or against friends!

name: Wonderland
summary: Dive into fear in Wonderland, a first-person horror game where you navigate an abandoned mansion, solving puzzles and uncovering mysteries. Face chilling challenges, explore haunted rooms, and decipher the mansion's dark secrets. Can you survive the terror and unveil the truth?

name: Worker Simulator
summary: "Worker Simulator" is an open-world video game where you play as Jack, a newcomer to Land No. 6. The game offers the freedom to explore the island, work in factories, trade with other players, earn money, buy or rent a dream home, and raise animals from young to fully-grown adults.

name: Wolf Sheep Cabbage
summary: Wolves eat sheep, sheep eat vegetables. Utilize your wisdom to simultaneously transport the wolf, the sheep, and the cabbage to the destination!

name: WooLoop: Advent Pack
summary: This Advent-themed gallery unlocks 24 additional levels for WooLoop! Working as an advent calendar, open one image per day to count down the days until Christmas! Celebrate the Chrismas Season in Style

name: Worm Game
summary: Worm Game is an intense escape mission from the vaults of worm hell, taking you on an increasingly difficult journey to sneak through the heavily guarded gates. Features infinite randomly generated levels, online leaderboards, speed run modes and racing against yourself or online with your friends.

name: World Pole Gaiden Rise! Mark of the Deck 2: Sanguine & Melancholia
summary: Saved from an unlikely death by a mischevious god of chance, Ascender Melancholia must battle up the World Pole to get back home. But the clock is ticking, as the terrible Fog curse has taken root in her lungs. Can she reach the top of the World Pole in time to seek a cure? Or will she be doomed to a horrible, soil-y death??

name: World War: D-Day Part Two
summary: A Reality single play FPS game set in World War II! This time, the airborne forces will be in action in Operation Overlord! Defeat your enemies and get your weapons!

name: Word Warrior: Zombie Typocalypse
summary: Defeat zombies with creativity! "Word Warrior: Zombie Typocalypse" is a wacky word-based rail shooter. Type anything you can think of to fight off the zombies and top the global leaderboard. Replay for bigger rewards but face deadlier zombies!

name: Wolf Knight Memoir
summary: Take command of the Wolf Knight to help him remember his dramatic past life through a story driven adventure and test your skills in this challenging Metroidvania game with die and retry platforming features happening in the fantastic 2D hand drawned world of Aurora.

name: World of Stickman Classic
summary: World of Stickman - classic war strategy with stickman heroes. Collect resources, build your base and hire a powerful army.

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Pre-Apocalypse Character Skins Pack
summary: Gear up with premium outfits from the time before the zombie apocalypse turned the world upside down.

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Burning Skulls Weapons Skin Pack
summary: Gear up your arsenal with some fiery flare with the Burning Skulls Weapons Skin Pack, featuring 4 premium skins.

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Valley of the Zeke Episode
summary: Introducing a new story episode including 3 new missions set in Arizona, featuring new characters.

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Valley of the Zeke Episode
summary: Introducing a new story episode including 3 new missions set in Arizona, featuring new characters. As a convoy of survivors flee Phoenix, they’re attacked by the infected and one of its patrol squads is separated from the group. They must race to their rendezvous in Tempe or risk being left behind.

name: World of Goo 2
summary: Use living liquid creatures to build bridges, grow towers, terraform terrain, and fuel flying machines. The world is beautiful, dangerous, and evolving.

name: World Engine Fantazion
summary: Adventure interactive game developed by Scitron & Art.

name: WorldShaper Idle
summary: A tile-based world-building idle game. Place forests, rocks, mystical flowers and much more. Discover new tiles by experimenting with their placement. Then try to use their bonuses to optimize your production, or just sit back and become more powerful! What will your world look like?

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Upheaval in Jingxiang
summary: The third DLC, "Upheaval in Jingxiang," depicts Liu Bei's forces as they fight back against the threat of Elixir that has gripped Jing Province since the death of Yu Ji.

name: Workshop Simulator VR
summary: Become the atelier artisan you've always wanted to be. Take on restoration contracts, scale up your toolkit, and expand your workshop in the calming, immersive experience of Workshop Simulator VR.

name: Working Stiffs
summary: "Working Stiffs" is a game set in an office building that has been infected by a virus via an email. Everyone who opened the email turned into zombies. As a player, your mission is to guide the survivors through the zombie-filled building to the exit, where a helicopter is waiting to evacuate them.

name: World War: An Age of Industry & Magic
summary: A collectible card game with a setting that draws from historical elements of the late 19th and early 20th centuries such as Spiritualism, the Victorian Era, the Industrial Revolution, psuedo-science and quackery of the time like Galvanism, both World Wars, and the sentiment of fin de siècle.

name: Worldsmith by Charles A. Debczak
summary: Worldsmith is a 2D open-world survival/adventure game where you write books to explore unique, procedurally-generated dimensions! Features building, crafting, exploration, mining, and more!

name: Wolf Peak: The Case of Ruth Choi
summary: In 1991 Ruth Choi was murdered and it was whittled down to 6 suspects, but the case was never solved. Watch interviews, go through evidence and build your case. A game where you are never told outright who the killer is. Use your own deductive skills to find out, who killed Ruth Choi.

name: World Tour
summary: This is a simple and fun elimination game.

name: World of Solaria: MMORPG 2D
summary:
Embark on a thrilling 2D pixel art MMORPG adventure. Immerse yourself in a vast fantasy world filled with epic quests, intense battles, and endless exploration.
Very simple and easy to handle!

name: WordZap
summary: A Game Boy port of the PC title WordZap. In the Game Boy version, players can choose between 3-, 4-, or 5-letter words. They can also enable or disable hints, allow or disallow plural forms of words and even choose the level of vocabulary used in the game.

name: Wolverine M.R.D. Escape
summary: The X-men group is hold in a complex filled with traps, robots, lasers and cameras. Wolverine tries to escape and set free his friends and he mustn't be spotted. When moving through the corridors he uses his typical claws by cutting a lot of lines and robots. Do all the things to not turn on the alarm.

name: Word Relay
summary: Word Relay offers a unique blend of casual, competitive, and educational elements. Each player enters a word in their turn that could maximize their score under some rules. Enjoy games with family and friends, be part of global competition, and expand your vocabulary with new words.

name: World of Tanks: Snatch Gift Pack
summary: Limited-time offer: Claim your "Snatch Gift Pack" DLC! This exclusive DLC features essential supplies so you can be prepared for any battle!

name: World of Dark
summary: This is a very fun shooting game, hoping to bring glory to the country?

name: Wolfenstein 3D
summary: A demake of the first level of Wolfenstein 3D in PICO-8.

name: World Without Reason
summary: A visual novel about a young adult living through several key moments in her life, as she tries to remember important details about her past.

name: World Left Behind
summary: Fight against the zombie apocalypse with 3 heroes against 5 unique zombies.

name: Worm War
summary:
Experience the excitement of "Worm War", where strategy and speed combine in a colorful, candy-inspired world. Navigate your worm with fluid 360-degree movement and outsmart AI opponents in this engaging single-player adventure.

Enhance your gameplay with special skills: Dash to surge forward, Shield for collision protection, and Magnetic to attract food effortlessly. Grow your worm, unlock diverse maps, and personalize your journey. With each game, challenge yourself to beat high scores and master the art of Worm War!

name: World in fire
summary: No boy has never had a superhero dream, now it's your turn to save the human world.

name: Woodland Sonata
summary: Embark on an odyssey where music weaves the tale. In this enchanting world, become a musician bestowed with a mystical flute, unraveling puzzles and mysteries. Command nature's elements, control animals, and shape the landscape with your melodies.

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Complete Edition
summary:
Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty is a historical fantasy action role-playing video game developed by Team Ninja and published by Koei Tecmo.

Set during a fictionalised version of the fall of the Han Dynasty, the plot follows an unnamed protagonist who battles historical characters and Chinese mythological creatures corrupted by demonic qi.

The Complete Edition of "Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty" includes all three paid DLCs: "Battle of Zhongyuan", "Conqueror of Jiangdong", and "Upheaval in Jingxiang".

name: Wonderia
summary: Wonderia is a MANGA style open-world sandbox for 1-8 players. Unique blend of sci-fi life-sim and dungeon exploration. Transform into alien adorably quirky creatures, craft, farm, fight, recruit space travellers, and build your cosmic adventure!

name: Words In Progress
summary: Word crafting puzzle joy that never wears off! Combine letters to create words. Survive as long as you can in Endless mode, or play against others in Multiplayer!

name: Woman's Body 3
summary: This is a card game with images of different female body parts that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards.

name: Woman's Body: For Adults 2
summary: Is a card game with images of various female naked body parts that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards.

name: Woman's Body: For Adults 3
summary: Is a card game with images of various female naked body parts that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards.

name: Woodturning 3D
summary: Carve your way to brilliance! Unleash your inner carpenter and shape incredible wooden sculptures!

name: Wolf Survival
summary: Experience the epic adventure of a wolf in Wolf Survival ! Hunt unique prey in diverse territories, follow the captivating story of the 3 dominant clans, and uncover the hidden corners of this vast open world by completing exciting challenges.

name: Wonderway
summary: Wonderway is a puzzle game where the direction of gravity can be changed. Get to the goal by moving and manipulating items which interact with gravity.

name: Woodsy Whatnots
summary: Quest across a mysterious wooded kingdom, full of wacky creatures, and spin-smash your way through even wackier monsters! Meet colourful companions in this Party-Based RPG, and use their abilities to face villainous overlords in the name of adventure.

name: World War Next
summary: World War Next is a low poly play to earn, multiplayer FPS set during a WW3 conflict, Choose from over 25 countries. Vehicles like tanks, helicopters, boats and armored cars help players get around quickly.

name: WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - Sugar Donut Fair
World Xplore
summary: Envision the real world in VR

name: World of Shooting
summary: A first-person shooting sports sim from the developers of World of Guns. Collect hundreds of realistic firearms and accessories, beat practical shooting and tactical training campaigns, set global high scores, and build your own ranges!

name: WooLoop: Science Pack
summary: Science GalleryThis Science-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Discover the inner workings of the world around us with this scientific pack!Wrap and weave images of a scientific nature!

name: World War II Shooting Simulator
summary: Do you have what it takes to survive the onslaught and rewrite history?

name: World of Warships: DLC to Celebrate the Year of the Dragon
summary: Celebrate the Lunar New Year by mounting the Lunar Warrior permanent camouflage on your preferred ship and introducing your foes to the Year of the Dragon. Unlock the DLC for free, then fight 10 battles to get 1x Lunar New Year container as an additional reward! Enjoy, Captain!

name: Worst Coach in the World
summary: Ready to leave skating forever, Valentina starts her first job at a resort, only to be reassigned as its rink manager.

name: World of Warplanes: Potez 540 Pack
summary: Potez 540 is a real giant in the sky: huge and durable, blistering with defensive turrets and carrying a hefty package of 500 pound bombs, it is dangerous to targets both in the sky and on the ground.

name: World Air War
summary: Embark on an exhilarating journey into the heart of aerial warfare with World Air War

name: WorldNeverland: lower Trimmed Wear Set - Mint
WooLoop: Aquatic Pack
summary: Aquatic GalleryThis Aquatic-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Explore the depths of our wonderful planet with this water-based gallery!

name: WordLeap
summary: This action-based word game will test your knowledge by giving you higher rewards for less common words. Jump from tile to tile, picking up letters as you go to spell out words that can be exchanged for points.

name: Wolves in Sheep's Clothing
summary: In this asymmetrical multiplayer game, players are either cunning wolves, disguising themselves among sheep to hunt, or vigilant farmers tasked with protecting their flock. Master deception and strategy in a tense battle of wits.

name: Woolly Boy And The Circus
summary: 'Wolly boy and the Circus' is a hand-painted style puzzle game. The game mainly tells the story of the protagonist, Our wolly boy, who is trapped in the "Big Pineapple Circus" and searching for a way out.

name: Woman's Body: For Adults
summary: Is a card game with images of various female naked body parts that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards

name: Woman's Body 2
summary: Woman's body 2 is the second part of the game series "Woman's body". This is a card game with images of different female body parts that will test your memory

name: Worshippers of Cthulhu
summary: LEAD the CULT OF CTHULHU. Decide the fate of your followers, perform eldritch rituals, and master the art of city-building in a world where the line between sanity and madness blurs. Can you endure the horrors you unleash?

name: World of Tanks: Advanced Marksman
summary:
Set your sights on glory... and on your enemy targets. This tank destroyer's rate of fire will shred your opponents until nothing's left but piles of scrap metal.

Bundle includes:
• German Tier VII Javelin Krupp-Steyr Waffenträger Tank Destroyer
• Premium Time - 30 Days
• (30) x1.5 Silver Boosters

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Jumpstart
summary:
Dive into Cold War mode's gameplay with an excellent all-round support vehicle. The T95E2 '57 has accuracy and penetration values that will do an incredible job at engaging the enemy while you attack from an optimal position.

Bundle includes:
• T95E2 '57 Post-War Era Western Alliance Medium Tank
• Premium Time - 3 Days
• Travis "Sparky" Nelson 3D Premium Commander

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: Woobies
summary: A bubble shooter game with fluffy balls

name: WorldNeverland: Flower Trimmed Wear Set - Sakura
Worst Idea
summary: A 2D platformer where two arms trading companies are fighting in the city of the future due to competition. You are hired as an agent who has to follow all orders and serve the interests of the company for money and a place in it.

name: WorldNeverland: Wa Mage Wear Set - Sakura
World of Shooting: Killhouse 50m Hangar Arena
summary: World of Shooting: Killhouse 50m Hangar Arena for Workshop.

name: World of Shooting: Practical Shooting Arenas
summary: World of Shooting: Practical Shooting Arenas contain 2 shooting ranges for Workshop.

name: World of Shooting: Practical Shooting Campaign
summary: World of Shooting: Practical Shooting Campaign has more than 80 stages for the pistol, shotgun and carbine, rifle, machine gun.

name: World of Shooting: Lifetime Shooting Club Member
summary: World of Shooting: Lifetime Shooting Club Member DLC gives several benefits: - access to the weapons marked with the bage Club Member Only - access to accessories marked with the bage Club Member Only

name: World's Goodest Pup
summary: A cozy roguelike deckbuilder where you enter dog shows! Collect new tricks, groom for stats, unlock breeds, and accessorize at shops as you make your way to the top dog podium. Fluffy, heartwarming runs await in World's Goodest Pup!

name: Word Sylla
summary: Hexa Word Sylla Word Submit Puzzle offers a dynamic gameplay experience that will keep you hooked for hours. Delve into the depths of your vocabulary and logic skills as you unravel syllabic mysteries and unlock the full potential of the English language.

name: Wobbles
summary: Play as a godly figure, guiding a line of adorable creatures called Wobbles across a landscape that you manipulate using various gadgets. As you do this, you progress the Wobbles civilization through the eras and advancing their technology, ultimately unlocking new gadgets for you to use.

name: Wonderland: Gold Saint In Adventure
summary:
Garen, who was in the Twin Wombs of the Holy Kingdom, inexplicably arrived at the mysterious place full of magma when he woke up and also wore a retro knight costume. , is the best thing to do in the future.
Garen exited the Cave of Flames and heard someone calling his name: it was the Cancer Saint, DeathMask. Deathmask was also transported to this strange world when he woke up from his sleep. It was very likely that all the Golden Saints were involved.
The best way to deal with the disease is through a first battle in a different world, Gallon and Dis fought their adventure in the mysterious different world of Fontainebleau. What is the problem? What is the problem? What is the problem?

name: Word Universe
summary: Play the amazing word game Word Universe for 10 min a day to sharpen your mind and boost your energy! Start connecting the letters!

name: Word Universe: CrossWord
summary:
Tired of daily challenges? Now it’s the time to relax yourself with Word Universe!

While the beautiful scenery backgrounds and music smoothes you, you will learn new words, challenge your brain and improve your vocabulary by finding hidden words. Unlock stunning landscape backgrounds to escape from home and relax your brain. We promise you'll say WOW!

name: WolfQuest: Anniversary Edition - Hellroaring Mountain

name: Wolfenstein 3D
summary:
The SNES version of Wolfenstein 3D has modified episodes and storyline, along with heavy censorship. The changes make this version a different game from the original DOS game, and was used as the basis for the Atari Jaguar, Macintosh, 3DO and Apple IIgs ports.
A Macintosh version would later unite both the SNES storyline and the original DOS storyline in a single release.

The Japanese version has even more censorship than the Western release, with a storyline changed even further.

name: Wolfenstein 3D
summary: The current version of Wolfenstein 3D for digital platforms include Wolfenstein 3D (a port of the expanded DOS version, with all of the six episodes) and the standalone expansion Spear of Destiny (without its extra missions).

name: Wolf Fang
summary:
Wolf Fang: Kuuga 2001 was released in Japanese arcades in 1991.The game was released for the Sony PlayStation on May 10, 1996, and to the Sega Saturn on March 28, 1997. Both conversions were developed by Xing Entertainment (famous for the arcade port collection known as Arcade Gears). The console versions have added features such as a new title screen, new introduction, an original redbook audio soundtrack and a staff roll after the endings.

In 2010, the game was added to the PlayStation Network to allow users to download to and play either on the PSP or PS3. In 2014, MonkeyPaw Games released it on PSN for Western audiences.

summary: Mafia Browser Game

name: Workshop Maps Pack
summary: Map pack consisting of maps removed from the Steam Workshop by the developer.

name: World of Jade Dynasty
summary: "World of Jade Dynasty" (Zhu Xian World) is a fairy-themed online game developed by Perfect World Games. It was launched for public beta on December 19, 2024. The game is developed using the UE5 engine, using various technologies such as physical rasterization and ray tracing rendering, dynamic shadow options, screen space and true 3D reflection.

name: Wolf Sim: Animal Battle Survival RPG
Wolf Souls: Arena
summary: Fight monsters in the colloseum. After each round upgrade your ablilities or wepon and prepare for other vawe of enemies. This DLC is new game mode into Wolf Souls game.

name: WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - Wa Mage Wear Set: Navy
WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - Floral Town-Wear Set: Brown
WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - Fluffy Brown-Rabbit Suit
Word Grid
summary:
The goal is to fill the entire grid with English words while aiming for the lowest possible rarity. Each word should conform to the corresponding category for both the row and column.

Each word will produce a rarity score based on its usage by all other Word Grid players.

name: Word Chase
summary:
Word Chase is a word building game where players attempt to find as many words in the game as possible and earn a high score.

Words must be at least 2 letters long. Each letter connects to any adjacent letter, including those beside, above, below, or diagonally. Connect letters to form words. Each letter is worth 10 points. Starting with the 6th letter in a word, each letter is worth 20 points. Words only count once, even if you find them using different paths on the grid.

name: Wooly Rockbottom and the Quest for the Golden Beard of Thor!
Work In Progress
summary:
It’s your first day in office and half of the staff is already on burnout...
Here is your gun, your contract.
Now go fire some people.

name: Wonderland X: Next Dream
summary: Wonderland X：Next Dream is a 3D fantasy MMO client game. It is an immersive map created with great ingenuity. You can challenge countless rare and exotic beasts and create a world that belongs only to you. Dream.

name: Word Rave
summary: Word Rave is a fast-paced word game with a killer soundtrack. Form words quickly in thrilling "Rave" mode or chill out with increasing difficulty in "Chill" mode. Featuring a cute cat mascot, get ready to unleash your inner wordsmith!

name: Workaholic Simulator: Leaving the Dream
summary: NOT your typical simulator! Is it your dream job or are you just working in your dream? Work fast, or face the consequences. Workaholic Simulator: Leaving the Dream is a surreal and dark descent into human psyche, burnout and the horror of the working culture.

name: Wolf Simulator: Silent Paws
summary: Survive in a wild world as nature's strongest hunter with Wolf Simulator: Silent Paws! Explore, survive and write your own legend! Join this epic adventure now and become the true hero of the forest.

name: Wood Shop Simulator
summary: Chop trees, craft amazing wood pieces, and grow your workshop! Whether you're playing it safe in the woods or risking it all in the city, your skills and reputation will shape your success. Upgrade your tools, hire a team, and auction your creations to become the top woodworker around!

name: World War T-Series
summary: Can you save PewDiePie and stop T-Series for good?

name: Would You Rather
summary: Would You Rather IO is a fun online "would you rather" game that you can play to make fun, difficult, and wacky decisions! This game was started in late 2020 as a pandemic project and is still relatively new. If you ever have any concerns, never hesitate to contact our customer support to let us know your thoughts!

name: Worm Food
summary: The tribe feels rumble under foot...they are worm food!

name: Wordlike
summary: A word roguelike. Make words, tune your bag of letters, and collect power-ups to beat increasingly difficult levels.

name: World of Magicka Bundle
summary: Paradox Interactive introduces a special “World of Magicka” bundle for the Magicka 5-year anniversary celebration. This Bundle which includes both Magicka and Magicka 2, all DLC and expansions for Magicka and for Magicka 2.

name: World of Slavic Glasses
summary: World of Slavic Glasses – a bullet-hell action game set in the world of Slavic folklore. You will fly on a stupa, fight hordes of undead creatures, and shop at Baba Yaga's store, which can surprise you as you upgrade it! Build your perfect character and try to survive all 20 waves!

name: Wobbly Construction!
summary: Reach the top of the construction site. Carefully place each step, watch out for obstacles on your way up, and try not to quit the game out of frustration.

name: World Pole Stone Dusk: Diadem of the Pole
summary:
The World Pole shattered, and with its destruction emerged a rusted fog that settled fast throughout the world.

Traverse through the desolate Stone Dusk to retrieve the sacred artifact destined for your grasp.

name: Word Whammer
summary: Jam on word-building skills in 3 action-packed games that adjust to your child's skill level.

name: World of Movies: Puzzle Game Challenge
summary: Relive iconic movie moments with 60 puzzles inspired by legendary films. Challenge your wits and immerse yourself in the magic of the seventh art!

name: Woods of War
summary: Woods of War is tower defense meets deck builder. Build your tree's defenses from cards you are dealt. As you defeat the orcs, earn new cards, customize your deck and unlock new levels of power. It is your elvish duty to fend off the deadly horde for in this forest, sap runs thicker than blood.

name: World of Shells
summary: World of Shells is my first Super Mario World hack. This hack has some hard disco shell sections.

name: Word Brawl
summary: Word Brawl is an action-packed word game by William Jacob. Collect letters, form words, and outsmart your rivals in chaotic, fast-paced battles. Punch your way to victory and prove you’re the best!

name: Worm Girlfriend Dating Simulator
summary: A short visual novel with physics-based movement about waking up as a worm and finding love.

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing 24 Gold Edition
summary: iRacing presents the Official Game of The World of Outlaws, featuring the World of Outlaws Sprint Car, Late Models and Super DIRTcar Big Block Modifieds, as well as 8 additional series including the all-new Micro Sprints, and many others.

name: Word Tower Puzzle
summary:
Word Tower Premium Puzzle is the best addictive word search game that you can play offline and without any annoying ads,
this new word search game is a great combination of classic word game, word quest game and word quiz game that's challenging your mind and makes you learn new vocabulary.

name: Wordatro!
summary: Discover Wordatro!, a simple and easy-to-get-into single-player roguelite. Form words to accumulate points and unlock bonuses. With over 50 bonuses and challenges to refresh each game, Wordatro! is perfect for fans of word games and strategy.

name: World War Z: Desert Defenders Weapons Pack
summary: Defend humanity against the horde of Zeke with flair by decking your gear out with the Desert Defenders Weapons Pack, featuring the Kukri melee weapon and 4 premium weapon skins, one for each weapon.

name: World War Z: Victory Lap Weapons Skin Pack
World of Warships: Legends - Dawn's Guardian
summary: Prepare for the battles to come with Japanese Tier V Premium battleship Hyūga and a fresh supply of camouflages, credits, Boosters, and Global XP.

name: World of Warships: Legends - Eagle Union's Power
summary: Get unique content from the Azur Lane universe: U.S. cruiser AL Baltimore and her Commander—with 80% off!

name: World of Warships: Legends - Iron Will
summary: Show your iron will in combat—equip yourself with Soviet Tier II Premium cruiser Varyag, camouflages, Boosters, and Premium days!

name: World of Warships: Legends - Italian Autumn
summary: Reinforce your collection with an exclusive Italian Premium destroyer!

name: World of Warships: Legends - Jump-Start 7
summary: Enhance your fleet with Kolberg A—a Premium version of German Tier II cruiser Kolberg, and stock up on credits, camouflages, Boosters, and Premium Account time.

name: World of Warships: Legends - Lead the Way
summary: Get this add-on to receive a random American Commander, Premium Account days, and a set of various Boosters.

name: World of Warships: Legends - Heavy Hitter
summary: Get large destroyer Z-39 with some loot to aid you in battle!

name: World of Warships: Legends - Pilgrim From Devon
summary: Strengthen your fleet with British Tier VII Premium cruiser Plymouth and get additional camouflages, Boosters, and Premium Account days.

name: World of Warships: Legends - United Force
summary: Join forces on land and at sea with this bundle for both World of Warships: Legends and World of Tanks Modern Armor! It includes a Premium ship, a Premium tank, and more useful items.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Volusad Thassius
summary:
None can rival the discipline and courage of the Ultramarines. Harness their legendary prowess with Volusad Thassius in command of your tank!

Bundle includes:
• Volusad Thassius 3D Hero Commander
• Volusad Thassius 2D Standard Commander
• Emblems: Insignia of the Ultramarines (3)
• Emblems: Icon of the Ultramarines Emblem (3)
• Inscriptions: Courage and Honour Inscription (3)

3D Hero Commanders start with three open Skill slots and earn Commander XP at a +30% bonus rate.

2D Standard Commanders start with one open Skill slot and earn Commander XP at the standard rate.

Emblems and Inscriptions can be applied to any vehicle that can use Cosmetics.

2025 Games Workshop Ltd

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Quick Start
summary:
It fires quickly, it moves quickly. If you can't wait to jump into battle, take command of the BT-SV!

This rare World War II light tank is excellent for learning how to play as an active scout. Get it in the Quick Start bundle, and you'll also receive Premium Time to increase your battle earnings and Silver to stock up on ammo, Consumables, and more.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- Soviet Tier III BT-SV Light Tank
- Premium Time - 3 Days
- 100,000 Silver

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Ready for Combat
summary:
He might not need a tank to fight, but he'll make good use of any vehicle he commands. Customize the Major "Butch" Alan Commander with Skills to optimize your tank's performance! The Ready for Combat bundle also gives you Premium Time, Silver, and boosters to prepare you for the battles ahead.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- Major "Butch" Alan 3D Hero Commander
- Premium Time - 1 Day
- x8 Commander XP Boosters (10)
- x3 Vehicle XP Boosters (10)
- 100,000 Silver

NOTE: Hero Commanders start with three open Skill slots and earn Commander XP at a +30% bonus rate.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Vipers Starter Pack
summary: Get a grip on this DLC bundle packed with Boosters and Premium Account time to help you earn more from every match.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Tank of the Month: T-62M-1
summary:
"Flexibility" is the name of the game when you command the T-62M-1. This Cold War medium tank features a well-protected turret and mounts an accurate, hard-hitting gun that can fire guided missiles as well as standard rounds. Switch between defense and offense as the battle demands!

Make the T-62M-1 yours with the Tank of the Month bundle. You'll also receive Silver Boosters and Premium Account time for extra earnings and Gold to fine-tune your vehicles with everything you need.

Bundle includes:
• T-62M-1 Escalation Era (Era 2) Eastern Alliance Medium Tank
• 850 Gold
• 3 Days of Premium Account
• (10) x1.5 Silver Boosters

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Tank of the Month: M41D
summary: This light tank for World War II mode has the accuracy, view range, and reload time to make you a quick-firing active scout and a key support player on your team.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Scout ‘n' Swarm
summary:
Take command of the M22 Locust and master the role of the active scout! The high rate of fire on this fast-moving tank will make it nearly impossible for your enemies to escape.

Scout ‘n' Swarm also gives you days of Premium Account to increase your battle earnings and Silver to stock up on ammo, Consumables, and more.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- American Tier III M22 Locust Light Tank
- 3 Days of Premium Account
- 200,000 Silver

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Patricia Laserian
summary:
Only fire and retribution await the Enemies of the Emperor. Deliver His vengeance to your opponents with Patricia Laserian of the Adepta Sororitas in charge of your tank.

Bundle includes:
• Patricia Laserian 3D Hero Commander
• Patricia Laserian 2D Standard Commander
• Emblems: Ecclesiarchy's Hand of Vengeance (3)
• Emblems: Sister Lucia (3)
• Inscriptions: Adepta Sororitas (3)

3D Hero Commanders start with three open Skill slots and earn Commander XP at a +30% bonus rate.

2D Standard Commanders start with one open Skill slot and earn Commander XP at the standard rate.

Emblems and Inscriptions can be applied to any vehicle that can use Cosmetics.

2025 Games Workshop Ltd

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Union of Land & Sea
summary: Prepare for epic battles on both the ground and seas with content from World of Tanks Modern Armor and World of Warships: Legends, including a Premium tank and Premium ship!

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Tank of the Month: K-91 Version II
summary:
Ready to command a "heavium" tank? The K-91 Version II gives you an impressive mix of solid turret armor, good mobility, and a reliable gun, allowing you to switch between offense and defense with a versatile play style.

Make the K-91 Version II yours with the Tank of the Month bundle! You'll also receive Silver Boosters and Premium Account time for extra earnings and Gold to fine-tune your vehicles with everything you need.

Bundle includes:
• K-91 Version II Soviet Tier VIII Medium Tank
• 850 Gold
• 3 Days of Premium Account
• (10) x1.5 Silver Boosters

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Tank of the Month: AltProto AMX 30
summary:
With its reliable gun and strong frontal turret armor, the AltProto AMX 30 makes an excellent sniper to play in hull-down positions. Use its mobility to find the perfect spot for your ambush ... then catch the enemy by surprise by hitting 'em hard!

Make the AltProto AMX 30 yours with the Tank of the Month bundle. You'll also receive Silver Boosters and Premium Account time for extra earnings and Gold to fine-tune your vehicles with everything you need.

Bundle includes:
• AltProto AMX 30 French Tier VIII Medium Tank
• 850 Gold
• 3 Days of Premium Account
• (10) x1.5 Silver Boosters

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Frostbite Starter Pack
summary:
You'll have "snow" problem getting the most out of your battles this winter. Jump into the latest season of World of Tanks Modern Armor with the FREE Frostbite Starter Pack!

This cooler-than-cool DLC bundle is packed with Boosters and Premium Account time to help you earn more from every match.

Bundle includes:
• 3 Days of Premium Account
• (5) x2 Silver Boosters
• (5) x3 Vehicle XP Boosters
• (5) x4 Commander XP Boosters

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Darkness Rising Starter Pack
summary:
Afraid of the dark? Face your nightmares with your FREE Darkness Rising Starter Pack for World of Tanks Modern Armor!

This DLC gives you Boosters and Premium Account time for greater earnings. With this content, you'll be laughing in the face of danger!

Bundle includes:

• 3 Days of Premium Account
• (5) x2 Silver Boosters
• (5) x3 Vehicle XP Boosters
• (5) x4 Commander XP Boosters

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Damage Under Cover
summary:
Want to learn how to play hull down? This legendary British tank will get you there! Position the FV201 (A45) behind rocks, ridges, or other forms of cover, and unleash its firepower to support your team.

Damage Under Cover also gives you days of Premium Account to increase your battle earnings and the Major "Butch" Alan Commander, a master of subterfuge that you can customize with Skills to optimize your tank's performance.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- British Tier VII FV201 (A45) Heavy Tank
- Major "Butch" Alan 3D Hero Commander
- 30 Days of Premium Account

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - First Brawler
summary:
Hit hard. Earn big. The heavy armor and high-damage gun of the IS-2 are just what you need to make your mark in any frontline fight.

Bundle includes:
• Soviet Tier VII IS-2 Heavy Tank
• Phantom of Falun 3D Hero Commander
• Premium Time - 30 Days
• (10) x1.25 Silver Boosters

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Enhanced Gains
summary:
It fires quickly, it moves quickly. If you can't wait to jump into battle, take command of the BT-SV!

This rare World War II light tank is excellent for learning how to play as an active scout. Get it in the Quick Start bundle, and you'll also receive Premium Time to increase your battle earnings and Silver to stock up on ammo, Consumables, and more.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- Soviet Tier III BT-SV Light Tank
- Premium Time - 3 Days
- 100,000 Silver

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Ambush From Afar
summary:
When you command the SU-130PM, you command a vehicle built to unleash hell and relocate before the enemy even knows what hit 'em!

Get this punishing World War II tank destroyer in the Ambush From Afar bundle. It comes with the customizable Klimov 3D Commander and 14 days of Premium Time to increase your earnings in every battle.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- Soviet Tier VIII SU-130PM Tank Destroyer
- Klimov 3D Premium Commander
- Premium Time - 14 Days

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo. Premium Commanders start with two open Skill slots and earn Commander XP at a +15% bonus rate.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Master Flanker
summary:
Take your battlefield strategy up a level with the nimble, fast-firing Cromwell B. Team up with your wolfpack and head straight for the enemy's most vulnerable points.

Bundle includes:
• British Tier VI Cromwell B Medium Tank
• Jon “Frosty” May 3D Premium Commander
• Premium Time - 3 Days
• (10) x8 Commander XP Boosters
• (10) x3 Vehicle XP Boosters
• (10) x2 Silver Boosters

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: Wonderful Monsters: The Flower Crossing
summary: In a meadow full of colourful flowers, lives a community of small and colourful monsters that maintain a harmonious relationship with nature.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Super Heavy Hitter
summary:
Is the frontline calling your name? Then make sure you've got the armor for the fight! The Mauerbrecher is a heavy tank built for close-quarters combat, with armor to soak up the damage and a hard-hitting gun to deal it right back.

Super Heavy Hitter also gives you high-value Boosters to increase your earnings from every battle you use them.

name: World of Warships: Legends - European Strength
summary: Strengthen your Pan-European fleet with a skilled Commander! This set includes essential in-game resources and a Pan-European Commander crate, guaranteed to drop a Pan-European Commander.

name: Word to Angel
summary: Play as five heroes in this musical pacifist RPG taking place in a 2D alternative version of the world where some friendly angels and a very shy god conduct balance and harmony together.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - American Muscle
summary:
They're going to feel it! With the T14's fast-firing gun and armor protection, you're ready to deliver all the pain in your mid-tier matches.

American Muscle also gives you days of Premium Account to increase your battle earnings.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Ready at the Command
summary:
With a Commander assigned to your tank, you're primed to head into battle with an advantage over your enemies. And Margaret LeBlanc is here and awaiting your orders.

Ready at the Command gives you a 3D Commander that you can customize with Skills to optimize your tank's performance, plus valuable Boosters and days of Premium Account to increase your battle earnings.

name: World At War: Normandy
summary: Nintendo Switch Exclusive! Experience the gritty realism and overwhelming graphics of Open Battlefield brutality!

name: Worshippers of the Gain
summary: Assume the role of a visitor to a small town in the middle of nowhere. For reasons unknown, no visitors seem to stay small for long, and it's up to you to discover why... or just eat some burgers instead.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Tank of the Month: NM 116 Panserjager
summary: This turreted tank destroyer for World War II mode combines outstanding mobility, excellent penetration, and a high rate of fire in a vehicle ideal for those who consider the battlefield their personal hunting ground.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - TMNT Starter Pack
summary: This DLC gives you Boosters and Premium Account time for extra earnings, plus themed Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Cosmetics, all in a bundle that's better than an entire free pizza.

name: World Reborn
summary: After a cataclysmic event fractures the world into many fragile realities, you've been recruited to be part of a community of heroes to save one of the realities—and our own—from a nefarious force called the Rot.

name: Wordfright
summary: A reimagining of the classic 'Hangman' game turned into a horrific thrill ride.

name: World of Warships: Legends - A Tale of Bravery
summary: Enhance your fleet with U.S. Tier IV Premium destroyer Hill, named after Edwin J. Hill, a hero of Pearl Harbor. You'll also receive an American Commander crate, Promotion Orders, camouflages, and more.

name: World Hockey '88
summary: Turn back the clock! Take a shot! Face-off against friends and family side-by-side or over the (inter)net in this modernized celebration of video games of hockey past!

name: World Flag Master
summary:
How Many Flags of the World Do You Know?
A Fun Brain-Training Game to Learn Flags While Playing

name: World of Tanks Modern Armor - Tactical Expert
summary:
If one gun allows you to launch a blistering assault, what can you do with three? Take command of the Orochi O-Ni and find out!

The Orochi O-Ni is a massive heavy tank for World War II mode that boasts multi-turret functionality. Switch among its three turrets to discover new tactics and unleash the full potential of its firepower.

Tactical Expert also gives you the Gunpei Takeda Commander, a formidable figure that you can customize with Skills to optimize your tank's performance.

name: World of Tanks Modern Armor - Supreme Beast
summary:
When The Warlord Panther stalks the battlefield, all cower before its might! This Japanese medium tank intimidates enemies in World War II mode with its mobility and high potential damage output per minute. No prey can escape!

Supreme Beast also gives you valuable Boosters and days of Premium Account to increase your battle earnings.

name: Would You Still Love Me?
summary: Short narrative adventure game about your partner turning into a tiny creature.

name: Wor Games
summary:
Play either single player (with CPU team mate) or 2 player co-op.

This game is inspired by the 1981 Midway arcade game Wizard of Wor and the fantastic 1984 version for the commodore 64.

I have fond memories of playing this game with my dad in the 1980s. He's now 85 at the time of release!

This is for you, dad xxx

name: World Fantasy: DigiWar
summary: Collect Digimons across different generations, and progress with them! Train your partners to become the pinnacle and conquer your opponents!

name: Wolfenstein 1-D
summary: Wolfenstein 1-D is a demake of the video game Wolfenstein 3D created by American developer Mike Lacher that features the game in a minimalist one-dimensional style. It features the same character, William "B.J." Blazkowicz, and plot from the 1992 video game, but in a single line of pixels, where different colored pixels denote doors, enemies, ammo, health, and fired bullets.

name: Woohoo!: Game - Fourteens
summary: Fourteens is a game where you select pairs of cards that equal 14. The two cards in a pair must be in the same row or column. When you select a pair, the two cards of the selected pair will be removed.

name: Workers & Resources: Soviet Republic - Biomes
summary: From the sweltering deserts of Arabia to the unforgiving tundras of Siberia and the tropical jungles of Southeast Asia, build your glorious Soviet Republic in new and diverse biomes!

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Metal Dragon
summary:
Release the fury! Use the Type 59D's punchy gun, ERA armor, and good mobility to become the dragon of the Cold War battlefields.

You will also receive days of Premium Account to boost your earnings and the Zhu Teng Long Commander, a dedicated warrior ready to be trained in Skills that will elevate your tank's potential.

name: World of Warships: Legends - Eastern Leaders
summary: Power up your Pan-Asian fleet with a seasoned Commander! This set includes a Pan-Asian Commander crate, guaranteed to drop a Pan-Asian Commander, along with gorgeous camouflages and useful Promotion Orders.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - The Roar of History
summary:
Tear into the opposition! The M4A2E4 Ripper is a variant of the iconic Sherman tank with a paint job inspired by real-world military history. This collector's vehicle has a rate of fire that will shred enemy defenses.

The Roar of History also gives you valuable Boosters and days of Premium Account to increase your battle earnings.

name: World Quest: Hidden Cities
summary: From ancient ruins and majestic castles to colorful markets and serene gardens, each destination offers unique mysteries to discover. With dozens of breathtaking locations and over 1,000 hidden objects to find, the wonders of the world are waiting for you.

name: Would You Call Him a Bad Man?
summary: This game is the official music video for Ian Hinden's "Would You Call Him a Bad Man?" It's a fast-paced indie musical minigame collection that is part pixel art, part anime visual novel. Are you skilled enough to unlock Ava's Happy Ending?

name: Worfy Games
summary: Collection of works by Worfy

name: Wood and Flesh: A Candleforth Short Story
summary: Wood and Flesh: A Candleforth Short Story is a point & click puzzle adventure with hand-drawn 2D graphics and a cozy horror setting that tells a short story set in the Tales from Candleforth universe.

name: Wonderland
summary: Wonderland is a top-down turn-based strategy game that requires real-time action, where you'll play as a little girl to learn her inner story and discover the secrets of Wonderland.

name: Wonders of the World: Collector's Edition
World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Warlords Starter Pack
summary: This DLC bundle is packed with Boosters and Premium Account time to help you earn more from every match. Claim it now, because battle favors the bold.

name: Word Tuah
summary: An infinite guessing game in which the player must guess a brain rot word within six attempts, with each failed guess giving them information as to whether the letters they have used appear in the correct word, and where.

name: World War Z: Sin City Apocalypse Episode
summary: A new story episode set in Las Vegas, featuring new survivors battling the zeke on the strip and in a casino! In the shadow of the outbreak, swarms of infected wander the empty streets of Las Vegas, while the living search for a way out.

name: World War Z: Vegas Skin Pack
summary:
Deck your gear out in pure Sin City fashion with the Vegas skin pack! Featuring a glamorous Vegas outfit for Sara Benedict, along with 4 dazzling weapon skins, one for each weapon:
- 1911 Protector Pistol
- PAC-15 Sporting Carbine
- WASP-180 Defensive SMG
- 1877 SBL Repeating Rifle

name: Wortgewandt
summary:
Wortgewandt is all about the art of forming meaningful words from a jumble of letters in the shortest possible time.
The game is specifically tailored to the German-speaking world – including the common Anglicisms that are also omnipresent in German.

name: World Cup Soccer 2026
summary: Get ready to experience the thrill of international soccer like never before in World Cup Soccer 2026! Whether you're battling it out in a high-stakes World Cup tournament or just enjoying a casual friendly match, this game brings all the excitement of the beautiful game to your console.

name: World of Warships: Legends - Captain's Essentials
summary: Prepare for upcoming battles with this set of essential supplies, including camouflages, Boosters, Commander XP, and days of Premium Account.

name: WonderEnd 0
summary: The prequel to WonderEnd. Enter the world of dreams and discover the origins of the creatures that haunt your nightmares. You play as A000, following his memories along a path of destruction. How will he turn into the ultimate evil? Find clues and hidden secrets that will lead you to the truth, if you are willing to accept it...

name: World of Warships: Legends - Agile Guardian
summary: Climb aboard Soviet destroyer Storozhevoi and stock up on credits, camouflages, and more essential resources.

name: Word Challenge
summary: In Word Challenge you are given 6 letters, the objective is to create 3-6 letter words from the letters provided as fast as you can. There are 40,000 to find in this fast and rewarding word game! You can go into a head to head battle of words with one of your friends in the 'Challenge Mode'. Can you come out on top?

name: Word Vomit
summary: Your home is getting moldier day by day. Air is uncomfortable to breath. Your room is only place where you feel somewhat safe from his neverending wrath. This can't keep going.

name: Worldwide Rush
summary: Worldwide Rush lets you experience passenger transportation and management on a global scale. Expand your company, meet the growing travel demand, compete against other companies, and discover new continents with its unique vehicles. The entire world is yours to control.

name: World of Dogs
summary: WORLD OF DOGS is a high-velocity immersive sim where speed isn’t balanced—it’s weaponized. You are the first fully grafted human, stitched together from dead champions, dumped into a collapsing city where every faction is fighting for a future that hates you.

name: Wordle for Commodore 64
summary: It's Wordle for the Commodore 64. Featuring both random and daily words. A list of more than 14,000 five-letter words is supported, the more obscure subset of which is guessable but never the answer.

name: World At War: Cobra
summary: Nintendo Switch Exclusive! Take part in the historic and intense tank battles of Operation Cobra, pitting the Sherman M4A2 against the formidable Tiger II!

name: Wordbound
summary: Wordbound is a mixed reality puzzle game where the world is made of words. Take a journey to unscramble the world, solve daily challenges, and craft your own puzzles to share with friends!

name: Word Scores
summary: A casual strategy word game. Spell words, score points, and avoid filling up the board. Enjoy the satisfying and relaxing game play.

name: Word Play
summary: Spell words, get upgrades, score points, and survive until the end. Every round is different. How far can you make it?

name: World of Gibbets
summary:
Take a deep breath, focus..then SHOOT!

Oh dang! You missed and just killed a stranger :o

name: Wonderlang Korean
summary: Learn Korean through immersive quests, interactive dialogues, and spaced repetition combats. Help a young hero lift a magical curse by mastering Korean. Customize your learning experience and explore a vibrant world filled with unique characters. Start your journey to Korean fluency today!

name: World of Warcraft: Assault on Blackwing Lair
summary: Deep within the fiery heart of Blackrock Mountain, the black dragon Nefarian conducted twisted experiments with the blood of other dragonflights. Intent on seizing the entire region for his own, he marshaled the remaining Dark Horde, a rogue army that embraced the demonic bloodlust of the old Horde. These corrupt orcs, trolls and other races battled against the Firelord Ragnaros and the shadowy Dark Iron dwarves for control of the smoldering mountain. Before he was vanquished by fearless heroes, Nefarian created the twisted chromatic dragons and a legion of other aberrations in his bid to form an army powerful enough to control Azeroth and continue the legacy of his infamous father, Deathwing the Destroyer.

name: World of Warcraft: Rise of the Blood God
summary: Years ago, in the ruined temple of Atal'Hakkar, loyal priests of the Blood God Hakkar the Soulflayer attempted to summon the wrathful deity's avatar into the world. But his followers, the Atal'ai priesthood, discovered that the Soulflayer could only be summoned within the Gurubashi tribe's ancient capital, Zul'Gurub. Newly reborn in this jungle fortress, Hakkar took control of the Gurubashi tribe and mortal champions of the trolls' mighty animal gods. The Soulflayer's dark influence was barely halted when the wise Zandalari tribe recruited heroes from the Horde and the Alliance and staged an invasion of Zul'Gurub.

name: World of Warcraft: The Gates of Ahn'Qiraj
summary: The great desert fortress of Ahn'Qiraj, long sealed behind the Scarab Wall, was home to the insectoid qiraji, a savage race that had once mounted an assault to devastate the continent of Kalimdor. But something far more sinister lurked behind Ahn'Qiraj's walls: the Old God C'Thun, an ancient entity whose pervasive evil had suffused Azeroth since time immemorial. As C'Thun incited the qiraji to frenzy, both the Alliance and Horde prepared for a massive war effort. A mixed force of Alliance and Horde soldiers, dubbed the Might of Kalimdor, opened the gates of Ahn'Qiraj under the command of the indomitable orc Varok Saurfang. Their charge: lay siege to the ruins and temples of Ahn'Qiraj, and vanquish the terrors of ages past.

name: World of Warcraft: Shadow of the Necropolis
summary: In the Lich King's haste to spread the plague of undeath over Azeroth, he gifted one of his greatest servants, the lich Kel'Thuzad, with the flying citadel of Naxxramas, a horrific base of operations for the Scourge. Consistent attacks from the Scarlet Crusade and Argent Dawn factions weakened the defenses of the floating fortress, enabling an incursion that led to Kel'Thuzad's defeat. However, a traitor among the ranks of the knightly order of the Argent Dawn absconded with Kel'Thuzad's cursed remains and fled to Northrend, where the fallen lich could be reanimated.

name: World of Warcraft: The Burning Crusade - The Black Temple
summary: In his quest to reign over all of Outland, Illidan the Betrayer had established a mighty stronghold for his forces within the Black Temple, a former draenei citadel. Yet his influence began to wane after the defeat of his most trusted lieutenants, including the traitorous former leader of the blood elves, Kael'thas Sunstrider. The resulting window of opportunity permitted Akama, an elder sage of devolved draenei known as the Broken, to rebel against the self-styled "Lord of Outland." Along with Illidan's former jailor, the stoic night elf Maiev Shadowsong, Akama helped a group of heroes infiltrate Illidan's seat of power and put an end to the Betrayer's reign once and for all.

name: World of Warcraft: The Burning Crusade - The Gods of Zul'Aman
summary: Following years of battles alongside the old Horde, the troll warlord Zul'jin retired to the city of Zul'Aman, capital of the Amani trolls, where he called upon mysterious dark powers to rebuild his army. While the eyes of Azeroth focused on the fight against the Burning Legion and the expedition to Outland, treasure-seekers invaded Zul'Aman, rekindling Zul'jin's hatred of the outside world - particularly the high elves of Quel'Thalas. Upon hearing that these newly christened "blood elves" had become part of the Horde in his absence, the infuriated Zul'jin declared war on both Horde and Alliance.

name: World of Warcraft: The Burning Crusade: Fury of the Sunwell
summary: Fresh from his defeat in Outland, Kael'thas Sunstrider returned to the blood elf city of Silvermoon. Rather than lead his people to glory as he had promised, the disgraced prince betrayed them. Kael'thas plotted to use the legendary Sunwell, source of the blood elves' magical power, to summon the demon lord Kil'jaeden into Azeroth. Aided by a joint task force of blood elves and draenei, the Shattered Sun Offensive, Horde and Alliance heroes narrowly stopped both Kael'thas and Kil'jaeden, purifying the Sunwell with the help of the draenei prophet Velen.

name: World of Warcraft: Wrath of the Lich King: Secrets of Ulduar
summary: The march of Horde and Alliance armies through Northrend led to a number of victories, but these successes paled before a discovery made by the explorer Brann Bronzebeard within the ancient titan complex of Ulduar. This mysterious fortress had long served as the prison of the Old God Yogg-Saron, a being of unfathomable evil whose influence had spread into the continent of Northrend itself. With Brann's assistance, small bands of Alliance and Horde champions infiltrated Ulduar to confront Yogg-Saron, who blasted the invaders with cryptic visions: the millennia-old creation of an artifact known as the Dragon Soul, the assassination of Stormwind's King Llane, and a glimpse of the Lich King's future.

name: World of Warcraft: Wrath of the Lich King - Call of the Crusade
summary: In preparation for the final offensive against the Lich King, the Argent Crusade—a union of holy warriors from the Order of the Silver Hand and the Argent Dawn—assembled a base near Icecrown Citadel to gather resources and identify the champions who would serve at the vanguard of their army. Highlord Tirion Fordring organized a tournament to test potential heroes of the Horde and the Alliance, but agents of the Scourge quickly emerged to sabotage the event. The undead attack culminated with the appearance of the monstrous crypt lord Anub'arak, who attempted to exterminate Tirion's elite force before it could be assembled.

name: World of Warcraft: Wrath of the Lich King - Fall of the Lich King
summary: As the final battle against the Lich King approached, the human sorceress Jaina Proudmoore and the Banshee Queen Sylvanas Windrunner journeyed to the icy heart of Northrend. Both had come for different reasons: Jaina hoped to discover whether a part of her former friend and lover, Arthas Menethil, still lived; Sylvanas longed to take revenge on her old enemy. With the aid of these two heroes, Azeroth's champions stormed Icecrown Citadel and vanquished the Lich King's minions. Their confrontation with the Lich King involved thousands of souls consumed by Arthas's blade, Frostmourne. Ultimately, Arthas was slain, and the heroes who triumphed over him learned a chilling truth about the existence of the undead Scourge.

name: World of Warcraft: Cataclysm - Rise of the Zandalari
summary: Alarmed by the terrible losses of life among all trolls, the Zandalari tribe traveled around the world to reunite their race and rebuild their once-powerful empire. The Zandalari restored the fallen cities of Zul'Gurub and Zul'Aman, and begun to conduct bloody raids on territories that had once been "theirs." The burgeoning troll force hoped to lead a great war against the other races of Azeroth, but the honorable Vol'jin of the Darkspear tribe stood against their murderous agenda, and recruited champions from both the Horde and the Alliance to invade the ancient cities and stop the onslaught.

name: World of Warcraft: Cataclysm: Rage of the Firelands
summary: After a ferocious series of battles, Azeroth's heroes banished Ragnaros the Firelord and his elemental minions from Mount Hyjal. Yet, threats to Hyjal persisted, including traitorous druids who had abandoned their allies and joined forces with the elementals. Fearing another elemental invasion, the defenders of Azeroth made a daring assault into Ragnaros' blazing realm: the Firelands. Among the seething flames of this elemental domain, Ragnaros was at his most powerful; only the greatest champions of the Horde and the Alliance, aided by druidic champions like Malfurion Stormrage, could dare hope to defeat the Firelord.

name: World of Warcraft: Cataclysm: Hour of Twilight
summary: At the peak of his insanity, Deathwing the Destroyer fought to drive the world into twilight - a devastated future bereft of all life. The Dragon Soul, a powerful artifact lost in the past, was the only weapon capable of truly stopping Deathwing, and so the guardians of Azeroth - the Dragon Aspects - sent a number of valiant heroes racing through time to retrieve it. Despite being attacked by the mysterious Infinite Dragonflight as they travelled the timeways, the champions returned the artifact to the present and delivered it to the wise shaman Thrall. With his aid, the Dragon Soul was deployed against the Destroyer during a brutal battle that began in Azeroth's skies and continued into the roiling heart of the Maelstrom at the center of the world. Through the combined efforts of the Aspects and their allies, the madness of Deathwing was finally brought to an end.

name: World of Warcraft: Mists of Pandaria - Landfall
summary: The conflict between the Horde and the Alliance entered a bloody new chapter in Pandaria. As the two factions' armies clashed on the shores of the continent, Warchief Garrosh Hellscream dispatched elite troops to find the Divine Bell—an ancient mogu artifact capable of endowing his soldiers with unimaginable power. Garrosh's bold and reckless actions, however, had dire consequences for the Horde, including the outbreak of violence against the Darkspear trolls and the expulsion of the blood elves from the once-neutral mage city of Dalaran. Although Garrosh claimed the bell, Prince Anduin Wrynn and the Alliance secret agents of SI:7 closely tracked the warchief's every move. On the highest peaks of Kun-Lai Summit, the brave prince thwarted Garrosh's plans, leading to the fabled mogu artifact's destruction.

name: World of Warcraft: Mists of Pandaria: The Thunder King
summary: While war between the Horde and the Alliance raged across Pandaria, the scattered mogu plotted a return to their terrible former glory. They rekindled their historical alliance with the Zandalari trolls, who managed to resurrect the tyrannical mogu emperor, Lei Shen the Thunder King, in the hopes of restoring mogu dominion over the continent. The valiant Shado-pan rushed to suppress their enemies, creating a task force, the Shado-pan Assault, originally composed of pandaren warriors and later supported by heroes of the Horde and Alliance. These fearless champions strove to defeat the Thunder King, though they also simultaneously served their factions' interests on Pandaria. Jaina Proudmoore led the Kirin Tor Offensive on a quest to uncover the source of all mogu power (and keep it from the Horde), and Lor'themar Theron took the Sunreaver Onslaught in search of mighty mogu weaponry to aid a daring plan…an insurrection against Warchief Garrosh Hellscream.

name: World of Warcraft: Mists of Pandaria: Escalation
summary: Garrosh Hellscream's quest for power in Pandaria leads him to excavate part of the sacred Vale of Eternal Blossoms in search of a sinister artifact, a decision that puts the Horde at odds with the Shado-pan and other influential pandaren. Meanwhile, in the Horde capital of Orgrimmar, Chieftain Vol'jin and the Darkspear trolls are declared traitors and hunted by the Kor'kron, Hellscream's personal guard. Vol'jin's people retreat to Durotar and the Barrens to gather supplies and reinforcements for their counter-strike, relying on the support of their former warchief, Thrall, and a particularly tenuous pact with the Alliance, whose interest in ending Garrosh's rule may not bode entirely well for the Horde...

name: World of Warcraft: Mist of Pandaria: Siege of Orgrimmar
summary: Orgrimmar, heart of orcish civilization on Azeroth, was set ablaze by revolution. When Warchief Garrosh Hellscream revived the heart of the Old God Y’shaarj to empower his army, he desecrated Pandaria’s sacred Vale of Eternal Blossoms. This affront, alongside Garrosh’s increasingly dangerous conquests, led Horde rebels and Alliance stalwarts to assail the great walls of Orgrimmar, hoping to dethrone the tyrant before he ravaged an entire world. Alongside Thrall, champions of the Horde and Alliance fought their way to the Warchief’s lair beneath the city, where the battle grew so desperate that Garrosh absorbed the energies of the Old God to halt his downfall. It was not enough. At the behest of King Varian Wrynn, a defeated Garrosh was brought to trial before the August Celestials of Pandaria – but the scars of his rule will bleed for some time.

name: World of Warcraft: Warlords of Draenor - Fury of Hellfire
summary: The warlock Gul’dan persuaded the Iron Horde's remaining leaders— who were enduring crushing defeats against the champions of Azeroth—to serve the Burning Legion. Their servitude, they believed, would give them one last chance to turn the tide of battle. Only Grommash Hellscream proved difficult to break, and so Gul’dan imprisoned him, hoping to make an example out of the former warchief. Gul’dan took control of Hellfire Citadel, intending to use it as a staging area for the Legion to invade Draenor. He then proceeded to summon the demon lord Archimonde. Meanwhile, the heroes of Azeroth assaulted the citadel’s gates, invading from both land and sea. Aided by Khadgar, Yrel, Durotan and a freed Grommash, Azeroth’s champions battled their way through the horrors unleashed within Hellfire Citadel. After a harrowing struggle that nearly destroyed Draenor, the heroes were able to cast down Archimonde. Yet, even as he fell, the demon hurled the treacherous Gul’dan through a portal. His pact with the Legion was far from being fulfilled.

name: World of Warcraft: Legion: Return to Karazhan
summary: As conflict raged across the Broken Isles, the Burning Legion focused its efforts on Karazhan, Medivh's ancient seat of power, hoping to find anything they could use to keep the tide of battle moving in their favor. Khadgar and a small band of heroes were successful in stopping this menace, which gave the forces still fighting on the Isles the momentum they needed to strike. Heroes, aided by First Arcanist Thalyssra, Tyrande, and Lady Liadrin, led an insurrection against Grand Magistrix Elisande, regent of the ancient city of Suramar. With the city liberated, the heroes then struck at The Nighthold—ending Gul'dan's reign of terror at last. Azeroth's champions now possess the Eye of Aman’Thul—and the power they need to close the Tomb of Sargeras forever.

name: World of Warcraft: Legion - The Tomb of Sargeras
summary: Though Gul'dan was defeated at the Nighthold, and the heroes of the Alliance and the Horde recruited new allies to their cause—including Illidan Stormrage—the Legion's menace was far from over. Kil'jaeden the Deceiver, one of Sargeras' most trusted lieutenants, bolstered the Legion's defenses at the Broken Shore, hoping to use the Tomb of Sargeras and the power within it to end all life on Azeroth. The Armies of Legionfall , a special force of Azeroth's greatest heroes, fought their way into the Tomb--and found that the Deceiver had nearly accomplished his goal. Kil'jaeden transported the heroes to Argus, the fel-wrought Legion homeworld, intent on exterminating them all, but the Eredar Lord met his end at the hands of Khadgar, Velen, Illidan and Azeroth's champions.
