To save those on Argus and to seize an opportunity to fight the Legion on his terms, Illidan did the unthinkable—he used a device known as the Sargerite Keystone to open a rift that brought the worlds of Argus and Azeroth together. The Alliance and the Horde are now at a crossroads. They must strike at Argus with all of their might, or risk destruction by the persistent threat of the Legion.

name: World of Warcraft: Legion: Shadows of Argus
summary: Led by Prophet Velen, the champions of Azeroth embarked on a journey to the shattered world of Argus, home of the demonic Burning Legion, to put an end to their crusade against life. There, they joined forces with the Army of the Light—a host of Lightforged warriors who spent millenia fighting the Legion across the stars, and whose ranks included the legendary paladin Turalyon and ranger-captain Alleria Windrunner. Together with the champions of Azeroth, the Army of the Light mustered their scattered forces and embarked on a desperate quest to storm the Legion’s seat of power: Antorus, the Burning Throne. There, the heroes discovered that the fallen titan Sargeras had corrupted not only the soul of the world of Argus, but the titan Pantheon as well. After a tremendous struggle, the heroes of Azeroth defeated the soul of Argus and freed the titans, who imprisoned Sargeras for his transgressions—and appointed Illidan Stormrage as his jailor. As a last act of defiance, the Dark Titan plunged his sword into Azeroth, inflicting a deep wound in the planet that would leave her fate uncertain...

name: World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth: Tides of Vengeance
summary:
Lord Admiral Jaina Proudmoore led Alliance forces on a daring gambit to besiege the golden pyramid of Dazar’alor. They disabled most of the Zandalari fleet with clandestine explosives and distracted the Horde’s armies in the swamplands of Nazmir. By the time the Horde’s champions discovered the deception, the Alliance had already reached the steps of Dazar’alor. The ruler of Zandalar, King Rastakhan, fought to the death rather than surrender his ancient kingdom. Though their attack dealt a crippling blow to the Zandalari, the Alliance was forced to retreat as the Horde took back the city and mortally wounded High Tinker Mekkatorque.

Determined to regain the upper hand in the war, Warchief Sylvanas Windrunner plotted to undermine the Alliance from within. She revealed a plan to twist the mind of Derek Proudmoore—Jaina's long dead brother, newly raised into undeath—and unleash him as a weapon against his family. Baine Bloodhoof refused to permit Sylvanas's warped scheme to unfold, so he chose to free Derek and return him to Jaina. When his defiance was discovered, the tauren chieftain was imprisoned as a traitor.

Meanwhile, naga invaders assaulted the coastlines of Kul Tiras and Zandalar in increasing numbers. Repelling those attacks led Azeroth's champions to rediscover a lost artifact: Xal'atath, Blade of the Black Empire. The dagger's maddening whispers drew a band of heroes into the Crucible of Storms, where dark forces gathered to awaken the long-imprisoned Old God, N'Zoth. While the threat appeared to be contained, N'Zoth's numberless servants will not rest until their master rises once again...

name: World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth - Rise of Azshara
summary:
In the aftermath of the Battle of Dazar'alor, Warchief Sylvanas Windrunner ordered Nathanos Blightcaller to set sail with the remnants of the Horde fleet. Using Xal'atath, Blade of the Black Empire as a compass, the Horde hoped to turn the war in their favor. The Alliance fleet engaged in pursuit, and both groups were ambushed by the naga as the sea opened beneath them. Trapped in Nazjatar, the ancient home of the naga, both factions were met by an ancient enemy: Queen Azshara, ruler of the naga and servant of the Old God N’Zoth.

Meanwhile, Sylvanas Windrunner planned to execute Baine Bloodhoof for freeing Jaina Proudmoore’s risen brother Derek. Unbeknownst to her, Alliance and Horde forces were already on route to rescue the tauren chieftain. Upon meeting on the battlefield, the outfits led by Thrall and Jaina realized that only by working together they could hope to destabilize Sylvanas's command over the Horde, and decided to join forces.

As Queen Azshara continued to dare those stranded in Nazjatar to face her, the champions learned from Magni Bronzebeard that a titan console was keeping N’Zoth prisoner within the Eternal Palace. As they fought their way through the Palace, the heroes discovered too late that it was a trap—though Queen Azshara was defeated, she successfully tricked the heroes into activating the console, releasing N’Zoth from his imprisonment. The Old God retrieved Queen Azshara and disappeared into the shadows, ready to once more unleash his terrifying might upon Azeroth. Left with no choice but to join forces completely against this new threat, the Alliance and the Horde headed into battle… but first, Sylvanas had to be stopped.

name: World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth - Visions of N'Zoth
summary:
Freed at long last from his titan-wrought prison, the Old God N'Zoth returned to his seat of power—Ny'alotha, the Waking City. There he gathered his forces and prepared to unleash a new age of madness upon the mortal world.

Elsewhere in Azeroth, a different battle raged on. Varok Saurfang, after rescuing Baine Bloodhoof, recruited assistance from Thrall, Anduin—who mustered the Alliance—and Horde dissidents. Saurfang's was a battle for honor, for the very soul of the Horde. The combined army traveled to the gates of Orgrimmar where Saurfang challenged Sylvanas Windrunner to Mak'gora, a duel for the title of Warchief. Empowered by a mysterious force, Sylvanas struck a lethal blow to the old soldier after proclaiming that "the Horde is nothing". She discarded the mantle of Warchief and left Orgrimmar, losing support from all but a few clandestine loyalists.

With the armies of both the Horde and Alliance depleted from the long war, N'Zoth sensed the perfect time to strike. As his shadowy servants assaulted the Forge of Origination in Uldum and the Engine of Nalak'sha in Pandaria, the heroes of Azeroth were aided by the return of Wrathion. The black dragon provided the means to resist the Old God's seductive promises of power and his nightmarish visions of a horrific future. The heroes of Azeroth stormed Ny'alotha and fought through the twisted armies of the Black Empire. In the end, they channeled the full power of the Forge of Origination through the Heart of Azeroth, defeating N'Zoth and purging his corruption from the world.

The leaders of the Horde and Alliance signed a treaty to bring the Fourth War to an end. The Battle for Azeroth was over, but the whereabouts of Sylvanas were still unknown....

name: Wonder of Blue
summary: Delve into Wonderland with Liddell in this Dungeon Crawler Roguelike. Defeat great adversaries in graceful melee combat.

name: Worn Out
summary: A presence lingers in the dark, waiting. It asks. It doubts. It knows. What happened? Why are you here? Do you deserve this? The answers are yours to decide. What you choose matters. Every path leads somewhere. But will you like where it takes you?

name: World Alone: Dreampools
summary: World Alone: Dreampools is a single-player Backrooms experience focused on dreamlike liminal pools. The game features a narrative told through cinematic sequences and immersive environments.

name: WormZone: Snake Drift
summary: Slide, drift, and grow your colorful snake as you battle in players from around the world. Eat food, dodge enemies, and become the longest worm in the zone!

name: World Tree Inferno
summary: 操控你的角色与团队，在芬布尔之冬的末日世界中进行探索，遇见各种各样的朋友和敌人，进行解谜与回合制战斗，为神明带去诸神黄昏！

name: Worker: 7549
summary: 7549 was one of the worker class servants. That was until this mine turned from a peaceful workplace into a headquarters of rebellion. This place is now filled with the remnants of the relentless war between humanity and robots. Illuminate your path through the darkness and dust.

name: World War Z VR
summary: Based on the hit game World War Z that has now captivated over 25 million players, World War Z VR is an immersive single-player first-person shooter experience with reimagined locations to explore. Take on huge swarms of zombies across three difficulty levels and choose your operator, weapons, and perks to create unique playthroughs.

name: Worms World Party
summary: A port of Worms World Party, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: World at War: Operation Global Storm
summary: Create the strongest armed forces and fight ONLINE against millions of players at real-world locations throughout the world!

name: World War II Armored Recon
summary: North Africa, 1942. Command a U.S. tank. Lead your men against the Axis powers. Learn the hard lessons of war. The odds are against you. A text-based historical novel, 700,000 words and hundreds of choices, without graphics or sound effects.

name: Worldshadow
summary: Explore the vibrant streets of Manhattan in an immersive open world experience. Navigate the city's , engage in thrilling missions, and uncover secrets in a dynamic, living environment. Your choices shape the world around you, offering a unique adventure with every playthrough.

name: Wolf and The Warren
summary: Sam Bane is travelling cross country to start her new job. But, disaster! Her car broke down and she's been stranded in the woods. As luck would have it, Sam's stumbled across the forest's best kept secret...A quaint little hotel called ‘The Warren’ and it's owner Kylie.

name: Wonderland
summary: A psychological horror game where each memory is a trap. Explore a broken world between dreams and nightmares to find your missing brother—before it’s too late.

name: Wolf Girlfriend
summary: From an average guy to the hero of a legendary prophecy, your fate takes a wild turn after saving an injured wolf. The bite you received seals your destiny, transforming you into a werewolf with the full moon approaching ! Now, with three mysterious wolf girls vying for your attention, you'll have to navigate this intense love triangle to break the curse and survive !

name: Worm Blaster
summary: Save the galaxy from the E.W.E. ("Evil Worm Empire”) by fighting through 5 challenging storms of slimy grubs, all the way towards your final battle against Commander Big Worm himself.

name: Woogi World
summary: Woogi World is a browser-based educational MMO launched in 2008 by the nonprofit organization Children’s Way. Designed for elementary school students, the game combines interactive learning with social gameplay in a colorful, safe virtual world. Players create customizable avatars called "Woogies," decorate their digital homes, and join themed clubs such as reading, science, and music.

name: Wonderland on Desktop
summary: Wonderland on Desktop is a cozy farm sim idler game! The interface will locate at the bottom of your screen. Take care of your farm when working, studying, playing, experiencing the fun of multi threads! Cultivate magnificent thing on this little land on your screen!

name: Word Search Daily HD
summary: Try to find all the hidden words. Play a new themed puzzle every day, then dive into the archives to catch up on six months of past puzzles.

name: World Class Solitaire HD
summary: Play Klondike-style solitaire in cities around the world. Fill your passport to climb the ranks.

name: Worm Wars
summary: Worm Wars is an Io arcade game where you join the fight to become the biggest worm in Worms War. You must eat as much food as possible to grow bigger. Slither your way towards the power-ups to get an edge. This .io game is addictive!

name: Wonders of Waldwea
summary: Take on the role of a struggling museum's curator who receives a mysterious challenge to identify artifacts from the ancient civilizations of Waldwea. Dive through a broad range of academic texts in order to identify the artifact's culture and the era it was produced in. Will you save the museum?

name: Worms Across Worlds
summary: Follow the Worms’ serendipitous odyssey through the multiverse, embarking on a quest where who knows who... or what they’ll run into. Play a large story campaign solo or with a friend, or in multiplayer with friends locally and AI opponents.

name: Words of Wonders: Search
summary: Take a visit to the Wonders of the World and solve the mystery that words hide. Test your vocabulary with word searches and challenge yourself.

name: World's Greatest Temples Mahjong
summary: Learn about the great temples of the world as you play mahjong. This game features seven different game modes and multiple levels.

name: World's Greatest Cities Mahjong
summary: Learn about the greatest cities in the world while playing mahjong. This features multiple game modes, many levels and special power-up tiles.

name: Woodrot
summary: You're the maintenance man for an apartment complex that has mysteriously been transported to the middle of the ocean. Woodrot is a surreal adventure game about getting to know your neighbors who all seem to blame themselves for their recent relocation.

name: Wood for Nobody Else
summary: Wood for Nobody Else is a physics-based wood chopping experience reflecting on hating your job and the dread of tomorrow. You have one week. Good luck.

name: World of Warcraft: The War Within - Ghosts of K’aresh
summary:
In The Ghosts of K’aresh, the campaign continues as more pieces to a troubling puzzle fall into place. Players immerse themselves in The War Within story as it leads up to the next chapter of the Worldsoul Saga—Midnight.

There’s some unfinished business to be had on K’aresh and the specter of an old enemy looms large. Forces with ill-intent are determined to bring forth Dimensius, the All-Devouring once more to finish off the ethereals. Should he arise, Azeroth will also be in peril from this dangerous Void Lord.

name: Workhorse
summary: Do your best to earn the most money, and your debt will gradually increase with each round. Combine your possessions into the best combo to win. Unlock achievements and talent trees to make the game smoother, or challenge higher difficulty levels after completing it.

name: Work Wrecker
summary: In this 2D beat 'em up, become a maverick in the absurd corporate world! Grab your weapon, smash through chaos, and unleash destruction!

name: World of Elemental
summary: World of Elemental is an indie single-player card game. With four major races, different talents and traits, various playstyles, and over 100 pieces of equipment and items, you have plenty of choices. As long as you have enough strategy and wisdom, you will become the hero who turns the tide!

name: World Heroes Supreme Justice Extra
summary:
The time tyrant Zeus seeks to conquer all. With an army of thugs, assassins, soldiers, ninja, and some of history's fiercest warlords on his side, no ordinary hero stands a chance. Good thing you aren't ordinary. Armed with an array of jaw cracking strikes, bone snapping slams, and awe inspring special techniques, you'll march through time itself to settle the score.

Don't just be a hero, be a world hero!

name: World Wonders: Hidden Histories
summary: Dive into 'World Wonders: Hidden Secrets,' a puzzle adventure through history's greatest civilizations with engaging hidden object challenges.

name: World of Blind
summary: This is a game that simulates blind people. In the dark game, you can discover different animals and natural environments through the sounds coming from the surroundings, and unlock related achievements. you can simulate the movement of blind people

name: World Wonders: Hidden Histories 2
summary: Explore global landmarks, find hidden treasures, and uncover historical secrets!

name: Wolvenrise
summary: The game takes place in a dark, medieval-inspired village shrouded in air of suspense and mistrust. The atmospheric setting immerses players in a high-stakes battle of survival, where every decision and accusation can mean the difference between victory and defeat.

name: Wordscoop with Gelato the Otter
summary: Classic word-searching returns, cadet!

name: WonderLang Japanese
summary: Learn Japanese through immersive quests, interactive dialogues, and spaced repetition combat challenges. Help a young hero lift a magical curse by mastering Japanese. Customize your learning experience and explore a vibrant world filled with unique characters. Start your journey to JP fluency today!

name: Word Puttz
summary: Word Puttz is a hybrid word-tile and mini-golf puzzle game developed by Jackbox Games. Players progress through levels by creating crossword-style words on a grid, aiming to reach a designated goal marked as a golf cup. The game features a character named Octoputtz—an octopus—who operates themed mini-golf courses that introduce various gameplay elements such as environmental obstacles and unconventional challenges. As players advance, they can earn stars, interact with in-game objects like mollusks, and unlock additional stages or worlds.

name: Wonderfall
summary: A third-person adventure game in a dystopian 1920s Paris consumed by Entropy. As buildings crumble into sand, Léon, a young orphan with the ability to manipulate this sand embark on a quest for truth and confront the remains of a city collapsing beneath his feet.

name: Word Worm
summary: A cross between a word search puzzle and trivia game, alongside your little worm buddy.

name: Wolley's Dungeon Adventure
summary: The land of Ballonia was thriving and peaceful, until the evil sorcerer Malvolio corrupted the land and its inhabitants. Wolley, the last Ballonian, gifted with special powers, sets off on a journey to restore and reclaim Ballonia from Malvolio's grip!

name: World of Tanks 2.0
summary: Start the next chapter of World of Tanks in the interactive Operations Room—a central place to reflect on your journey, prepare for what's ahead, and gear up for Update 2.0

name: World of Tanks: Heat
summary: World of Tanks: HEAT is a free-to-play PvP vehicle shooter with powerful abilities and explosive team combat. Pilot customizable tanks and unleash Agent skills in 10v10 online battles, where tactical warfare meets FPS-style intensity. Take control. Rewrite the rules.

name: Wolf Mate
summary: Escape from the locked school by solving puzzles while running away from Freya.

name: Word Salad
summary: Swipe the letters in the grid to reveal the words hidden within the daily themed puzzles.

name: World Wonders Hidden Histories 3
summary: Explore world landmarks, search for hidden artifacts, solve mysteries and uncover forgotten stories of ancient civilizations.

name: WordCross
summary: Crosswords meet battle royale! Think fast, play smart, be the last one standing!

name: Wolf Simulator 2025: Wild RPG Survival
summary: The hunt begins - are you ready?

name: Wonderstries
summary: Harvest natural resources and build machines to rebuild society following a terrible war that left the world scarred.

name: Word Bomb
summary: Word Bomb is a fast-paced multiplayer online word game where you must type a valid word before the bomb explodes. Test your vocabulary under pressure!

name: World War Legion
summary: Join fast-paced World War 2 action-packed combat. Play World War Legion -- AAA experience on any hardware. Best-in-class multiplayer gunfight. WW2 weapons gunsmith. Next-level extreme performance. Lightning-speed loading time and a whole lot more.

name: Woven Horizons
summary: In a land stirred by a shared dream of hidden treasure, lead a team of heroes in this tactical turn-based roguelite RPG. Evolve attacks in combat, explore mysterious lands, uncover relics and gear, and defeat hand-crafted bosses guarding the secret.

name: Workshop Works
summary: Build your dream Food Truck, Conversion van, or Trailer! Customization – Resize, recolor, and tweak objects to fit your vision perfectly. Undo & Redo System – Easily correct mistakes or experiment with different layouts. Real-time Price Calculation – Track material costs as you build

name: World of BoreCraft
summary: Retro 2004 flash-like parody that asks the question, how much will you sacrifice to become the greatest WoB player ever?

name: World Eater
summary: WORLD EATER is a bossfight game about an underpaid astronaut fighting a giant worm in space. Fight your way through varying planets and defeat the colossal worm!

name: Word Flyer
summary: Word Flyer is an educational game designed to improve children's word recognition and spelling skills. Players control birds perched atop letter towers on both sides of the screen. The game presents single letters or words up to four letters long, which float towards the player while increasing in size. Using a joystick, players must quickly select the correct letters from their towers to match the oncoming words. As players successfully match words, a progress bar fills, unlocking more challenging stages. The game features five progressively difficult levels, starting with simple letter matching and advancing to longer words. Word Flyer supports both single-player and two-player cooperative modes, encouraging teamwork and shared learning experiences.

name: Wobble Wars
summary: Wobble Wars is a chaotic, physics-based multiplayer brawler where rolling, bouncing, and bashing are the keys to victory. Compete in hilarious arenas, master momentum-based movement, and customize your wobble warrior in the ultimate spherical showdown!

name: WonderLang Polyglot
summary: Learn languages through immersive quests, interactive dialogues, and spaced repetition combats. Help a young hero lift a magical curse by mastering a new language. Customize your learning experience and explore a vibrant world filled with unique characters. Start your journey to fluency today!

name: World 23
summary: Battle through decaying mega-cities, abandoned metro tunnels, and guarded enemy facilities in this fast-paced top-down hack and slash. As Theo and Leo, you master abilities and switch weapons during combat to match your play style and the challenge ahead.

name: WordWar
summary: Word War is a unique party game based on making words. Fight for the letters in the Arena and try to create words with them in order to score points.

name: Wordsearch Attack
summary: Take words to a new dimension. Find words on 2D boards, hexagonal boards, or wrapped around 3D boards.

name: Wonderful Richman
summary: "Wonderful Richman" is a casual board game inspired by Monopoly, featuring a unique Paco Card Deck System, supporting eight-player co-op, introducing brand-new Building Layer Gameplay, offering 50+ randomized buildings, and including 30 distinct animals. Roll the fate dice and rule the field!

name: Wove
summary: A cozy platforming adventure where you explore various worlds as a small doll-like traveler, solving puzzles and unlocking outfits. Play solo, or share the journey with others along the way.

name: Wonders of the Deep
summary: Wonders of the Deep is a third-person underwater exploration adventure with puzzles, marine wildlife, and diving mechanics in a mysterious world.

name: World of Motors
summary: The World of Motors. game designed to suit your requirements. The new challenge makes you collect money to buy new cars and unlock new levels.

name: Word
summary: Type the Bible and record your best WPM for each verse!

name: Word Warp
summary:
Do you like word search games? In Word Warp, you must find more than 3000 words in 10 lan-guages (27000 Words).
Choose your favorite category out of 8 or mix them all together for the ultimate word find chal-lenge.
Three difficulties will help you adjust the game to your skills.

name: Word Search
summary:
Can YOU guess the phrase? Relax your brain and test your knowledge in this new one-of-a-kind word game!

Solve puzzles from all your favorite categories – like TV Shows, Movies and Famous Landmarks. Each hidden word you find in the word search takes you closer to revealing the secret phrase! Whether you enjoy word finds, jumble games, crossword puzzles or trivia games, this is the perfect way to fill a short break or pass the time while waiting.

name: Word Wiz
summary:
How many words can you make with these letters: V O L D E ? Relax your brain and expand your vocabulary by solving endless fun word puzzles!

Word Wiz is a word connect game that combines the best of word searches, crossword puzzles and anagrams. The game is designed to keep the language and word finding parts of your brain active, so each time you play you build new skills in problem-solving!

name: World Of Sports
summary: Four international events of death-defying skill and confidence. Cliff Jumping, Ski Slalom, BMX Racing and Surfing, published by the masters of computer sports...EPYX!

name: World War V: Last Call
summary: Lighthearted comic war action! Battle across voxel and pixel worlds to stop the V Empire's ambition. Break terrain, uncover items, and face unique bosses. Behind the cute visuals lies a truly challenging game waiting for you!

name: Word2
summary: Browse the Bible in most languages and many versions! Pick up where you left off by choosing "Resume on Start". Set/change default language. Reading mode or typing mode. Type verses, improve typing speed and store your best and average WPM. I love Jesus!

name: World's Toughest Quiz
summary: World's Toughest Quiz is a free-to play trivia game where you have to give the correct answer for a difficult question.

name: Word Blitz
summary: Word Blitz is a puzzle word game about swapping letters and making new words. You will need to make the best of the letters and resources provided, and progress as far as you can. Do you have what it takes?

name: Work Life Balance
summary: “Are you truly happy?” — A near-future dystopian RPG of corporate satire. In a world where work is everything, 【Work Life Balance】 may be the key to happiness—or a crafted illusion. Join the mysterious “Work Life Balance Fellowship” and uncover the truth.

name: Wood & Flesh Chapter 2
summary: A new story in the Tales from Candleforth universe. Continue the story of Wood and Flesh: A Candleforth Short Story in this new chapter, in a point & click puzzle adventure with hand-drawn 2D graphics and an unsettling cozy horror setting.

name: Word Quest Pirates
summary: Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate pirate word master?

name: Woofy Run
summary: Woofy Run is a multiplayer dog racing game where speed, strategy, and sabotage come together. Set traps, avoid obstacles, and race to be one of the top 10 fastest players on every map! Select your favourite dog and join the race!

name: Woolly
summary: Raise a flock of colourful sheep in this slow-paced idler. Look after your sheep, gather their fleeces and complete your collection.

name: Work Sucks, Let’s Play Dou Dizhu!
summary: Work Sucks, Let’s Play Dou Dizhu! The world's smallest card table, hidden in your taskbar Turn your taskbar into an invisible card table! Play 5+classic card games at a height of centimeters！

name: Workplace Hazard
summary: Are you an old CRT monitor with a penchant for picking up boxes? Do you long for the days when you could place those boxes in an exit portal and engage your jetpacks early because you're impatient? If you answered yes to any of these questions, you're really weird! But try Workplace Hazard anyway!

name: Wolf With Inn
summary: Wolf With Inn is a cozy fantasy tavern simulator. Become a werewolf, discover new recipes, cook hearty meals, and grow your inn! Welcome noble white knights and adventurers—and send them into the clutches of the forest "monsters."

name: Word Quest
summary: A fast-paced action typing game where you cast spells against hordes of monsters! Complete quests, unlock abilities and repay your debt to the merchant to be set free! Put your typing skills to the test in this challenging fantasy game.

name: Wonder Warp
summary: An Alien Threat Has Emerged in the City of Cynosure! Run and gun through a series of mazes to defeat the monsters.

name: Wowo Island
summary: A alpaca arrives at a place called Wowo Island and begins a leisurely and happy adventure. You can level up and there are many magical weapons and monsters on the island. Start your adventure now.

name: Working Sakuya
summary:
After hiring a new maid you forge a strong and intimate bond with her throughout your daily life.

This game is a Touhou fangame visual novel game consisting of animation for adults.

name: Word Warp
summary: A short and entertaining typing game, where you need to type your way through space to find a way home. Upgrade your vessel and overcome enemy resistances with your linguistic arsenal. Hack away in this roguelite deep space typing bonanza.

name: Word Maker
summary: Relaxing game where you can test how much english words you know. Spend your points on automation and let the computer do the work for you.

name: Wool
summary: Swing through urban landscapes using a needle and your wool as a grappling hook to stop the environmental pollution from ruining your peaceful island life - as fluffy sheep do.

name: Wonder Library
summary: Wonder Library is a storytelling adventure game that blends picture books with interactive gameplay, set in a magical library on a peaceful island. Players embark on a journey of self-discovery and healing as they explore the enchanting world and uncover stories that come to life.

name: Wonderland
summary: Explore a world of swords and sorcery, and build your unique adventurer’s guild!

name: Wolf Fang: Kuhga 2001
summary: Wolf Fang: Kuuga 2001 was released in Japanese arcades in 1991. It was released in arcades outside Japan and re-titled Rohga: Armor Force. The arcade versions outside Japan however, have a number of things cut. There is no story intermissions between the stages and there is no stage selection leading to 4 different endings found on the Japanese version, but the game cycles through all 12 stages like in the Japanese version's expert mode.

name: Work Girl
summary: In the game, players can experience a unique plot in a city with high degree of freedom. Players can manipulate the hostess and many men to produce various stories. The game has exquisite drawings, a variety of clothes, players can trigger a variety of different events in a specific place and time.

name: Woman Simulator
summary: Experience life as a woman - cleaning, cooking, laundry, and no time to rest. Full immersion into the world of everyday chaos!

name: Worldcup Volleyball '95
summary:
World Cup Volleyball '95 is a volleyball simulation game developed by Data East and released in 1995 for arcades.

World Cup Volleyball '95 is a simple volleyball game. The game utilizes a top-down side view of the field and a two button scheme, with 12 countries for the player to choose.

name: Word Quest Space
summary: The stars are calling!

name: World Heritage True or False Quiz
summary: Uncover the Truth of World Heritage! A Two-Choice Challenge on Global Facts!

name: World Sprint
summary: Run, jump, and slide through colorful worlds in this fast-paced 3D endless runner! Unlock unique characters, helpful pets, and powerful upgrades using in-game coins. Chase achievements, climb local leaderboards, and see how far you can sprint in World Sprint!

name: Worlds
summary: Worlds-is a psychological horror with a deep story, where nothing is accidental. The narrative is delivered in an unconventional way — not through dialogues or a narrator, but through the environment and subtle details And remember, nothing in this game is done for no reason.

name: Wolf Sheep & Cabbage
summary: Wolf, Sheep, and Cabbage is a classic logic puzzle game. The goal is to help a farmer safely move a wolf, a sheep, and a cabbage across a river using a small boat. The boat can carry only one item at a time, and the farmer must be present for any crossing. The challenge is to make sure the wolf is never left alone with the sheep, and the sheep is never left alone with the cabbage.

name: Woodworm
summary: Woodworm is a grid-based puzzle game about carving bite-sized wooden sculptures. Chomp your way through blocks of wood to create new shapes, while managing gravity and tricky geometry!

name: Wordy Weapon
summary: A word-crafting roguelite! As the Wordsmith, fill in the blanks with Adjectives & Nouns to forge ridiculous weapons with RPG-style names and defeat your enemies.

name: WonderLang Spanish
summary: Learn Spanish through immersive quests, interactive dialogues, and spaced repetition combats. Help a young hero lift a magical curse by mastering Spanish. Customize your learning experience and explore a vibrant world filled with unique characters. Start your journey to Spanish fluency today!

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Sin City Apocalypse Episode
summary: A new story episode set in Las Vegas, featuring new survivors battling the zeke on the strip and in a casino! In the shadow of the outbreak, swarms of infected wander the empty streets of Las Vegas, while the living search for a way out.

name: WonderLang Portuguese
summary: Learn Brazilian Portuguese through immersive quests, interactive dialogues, and spaced repetition combats. Help a young hero lift a curse by mastering Portuguese. Customize your learning experience and explore a vibrant world filled with unique characters. Start your journey to fluency today!

name: Word95
summary: Play word games and get points to build a dictionary one word at a time

name: Wood Clicker
summary: Hold to chop wood, earn resources, and grow your idle lumber empire in this relaxing 2D idle clicker game!

name: Woodland Warriors
summary: WOODLAND WARRIORS is a two-player co-op combat adventure game featuring cute forest critters and intense hack and slash. Go on a quest with three woodland friends to find and investigate the sources of the strange happenings. Slash the enemies, solve the mystery, and save Woodland Forest.

name: WonderLang German
summary: Learn German through immersive quests, interactive dialogues, and spaced repetition combat challenges. Help a young hero lift a magical curse by mastering German. Customize your learning experience and explore a vibrant world filled with unique characters. Start your journey to German fluency today!

name: WonderLang Italian
summary: Learn Italian through immersive quests, interactive dialogues, and spaced repetition combats. Help a young hero lift a magical curse by mastering Italian. Start your journey to Italian fluency today!

name: Word Tango
summary: Complete words by dragging the missing letters to their correct spots. Available in 40+ languages, with the ability to see English translations of words once a level is complete.

name: Wooldge's World
summary:
Daniel aka "Wooldge" to his friends, finds himself lost in the world of video games where he must run and jump through a variety of classic gaming inspired levels to save his brothers.

To help him on his adventure Daniel can summon the power of Thor by wielding the mighty Mjolnir allowing him to defeat enemies with ease!

name: Wobbler
summary: Accelerate while turning, and decelerate while going forward. These unique physics are simple & forgiving, yet hard to master. Wobble your way to first place as you find the optimal routes through a series of unique levels, and challenge other players for the best times!

name: Woodswalker
summary: Woodswalker is a strategy-based survival horror game in which quick thinking is key. Listen closely to your surroundings, defend yourself with your searchlight, budget your limited power, and solve environmental puzzles to discover the truth of the forest.

name: Word Quest Fantasy
summary: Wield enchanted swords, explore ancient castles, and unravel word puzzles charged with mystical power. Each grid hides words that bring you closer to becoming a true hero of the realm. Defeat challenges, unlock secrets, and let your imagination guide you through a storybook world where every word is part of your adventure. Are you ready to prove yourself in the ultimate fantasy word quest?

name: Work Work Work
summary: WORK WORK WORK is a retro pixel-art adventure game where you experience the surreal cycle of work, life, and death. Find clues, gather information, and explore the Triquetra company to discover the truth, and find out that maybe there's more meaning in working, and living.

name: Woodland Rebels
summary: Survive an untamed world where humans, animal villagers and wild animals all coexist, but not in harmony. Craft, farm, cook, and assign roles to villagers. Explore various biomes and muster an animal rebellion to fight back against human invaders in this open world survival game.

name: WonderKing
summary: Genre: Free 2D Side-Scrolling MMORPG Key Features: Class selection and job advancement system Quest-based story progression Party play and guild system A wide variety of mounts, pets, and costume customization PvE dungeons and PvP content available

name: Worship Demon
summary: Worship Demon is a 2D survivor game blending anime art and immortal cultivation. Choose one of the Four Great Demonic Sects, cultivate powers, hunt lost treasures and spells, defeat foes, and forge your unique immortal journey with hundreds of skill-item combinations.

name: Worming from Home
summary: Be the Worm of Wall Street in this silly simulation game about working a remote finance job. Throw your spineless body around the keyboard to invest in the stock market and earn obscene amounts of money. Buy upgrades, train skills, and worm your way up to the promotion you've always dreamed of!

name: Wool Craze
summary: Immerse yourself in strategic puzzle universe of Wool Craze: Wool Puzzle 3D Game, a yarn sort puzzle game for fans of wool sort puzzle mastery! This game, a perfect blend for aficionados of wool puzzles and the art of knitting, offers an innovative 3D puzzle-solving experience. Explore realms where vivid colors explode and dynamic 3D wool sort challenges. Observe the beautiful knitting balls, formulate your knitting games strategy, and feel the relaxing thread jam pleasure in this wool sort puzzle game.

name: World War Z x The Walking Dead
summary: A new crossover episode with AMC's The Walking Dead. Battle for survival against the undead as Rick Grimes, Daryl Dixon, Michonne, and Negan in three unique story chapters featuring iconic locations from The Walking Dead. Fight through hordes of dangerous new, slower-moving but no less lethal Walkers across The Prison, Alexandria Safe Zone, and Grady Memorial Hospital with two new melee weapons (Negan’s Bat Lucille and Michonne's Katana), and two new weapon skins (Rick's Revolver and Daryl's Crossbow). But be wary of the new special Zeke: the dreaded Spiked Walker.
